story: Hi my name is Jeffrey "OgSlym" Rivera, I have been apart of the gaming community for the past 14 years most of it spent as player. Over the past 6 years I have spent my time on the management side of thing along with a focus on professional growth and creating an environment for many young and talented individuals to grow. I have spent years absorbing knowledge from educational institutions as well as a career in the personal care industry. After many years learning, I finally decided to take the leap a create a brand that strongly focuses on putting the players first. So you might ask what I mean by putting the players first. From my experience there are many things lacking in the gaming industry and many brands capture young talented individual under a ruse. the goal is to create an environment that takes care of the talents mental health and physical health while allowing them to showcase the vast talent they have to offer the world. I am starting this campaign with the hopes of securing the proper funding to provide the resources to our player while we pursue 3 world championships. For reference we have team and players competing in Valorant, Call of Duty, and Fortnite. I have spent the last year trying to do my best while funding the team entirely by myself with the support along side me of my loving wife, but I know there is more I can do and hopefully with your contribution we can continue to change the gaming community.

story:
Sunflower is a VN on Steam.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1118910/Sunf...

 

Suflower is a Visual Novel centered around a girl named Alina. Alina is a southern belle and loves walking around her sunflower fields near her house. When Alina is not relaxing at her house, she is busy attending LVN University. Alina is a student enrolled in the LVN News Reporting program. With her friends Ivanna and Nadiya, they try their best to investigate a mysterious student that has caused trouble for them in the past.

Sunflower was built using the very powerful Visual Novel Maker engine. Comic book art was used making KumaKuma Manga Editor. It features musical scores by Bittersweet Entertainment and Joel Steudler. 5 new backgrounds were commissioned by gin-1994 for this game. This game is also proud to present CGs by DemonLordDante.

 

Expected Release date is December 3.

story:
Spuds Unearthed is a fully interactive VR game in which you manage your galactic Spuds tribe. You choose a crew with unique perks and abilities and send them to explore other planets and fight against anything that other players have left behind.

Specialize and upgrade your crew using ancient artifacts called tokens and dispatch them onto a battlefield. Produce weapons combined from various bizarre parts like cranks, springs and anything else you can find to support your fellow creatures and make sure they come back to your home planet alive.

During your adventure, you will fight rotten Spuds, called Zombuds as well as compete with other players’ defenses in an ever-changing world. Who knows what else you will discover during your travels?

 

 

Spuds Unearthed is filled with different characters, enemies, vehicles and much more to discover during your VR environment galactic conquest. Here are just of those elements currently available in Early Access on Steam, as well as what we have planned for our Indiegogo campaign...

 

Let us portray you the Spuds - a fierce species that constantly fight amongst themselves for fun and a sense of fulfillment. They admire battling so much that their constant excavations and exploited battlegrounds led to the destruction of their planet of origin - The Soil.

After its ‘big bang’, the Spuds fled from Home Planet on their Baseships and experienced the creation of a new galaxy - one created from pieces of their former homeland.

Now, they rely on your commands and are more than happy to provide you with their various skills. Gather them and make your planet grow with each won battle to ultimately create a living potato empire!

 

 

 

Spuds are not the only way to crush your enemies. To fight effectively, you will have the possibility of creating Turrets - weapons of mass destruction mix-and-matched from various elements, each providing different effects and unique playstyle. You can construct as many as you like, but your spaceship can only take two of them to each battle.

 

 

 

Vehicles are heavy weapons to use against your enemies. You can currently spawn both Tanks and Planes in the current Early Acces version, but we’re eager to create more for diversity in the galactic mayhem.  

 

 

You’ll be gearing up often to venture forth into the unknown to take back land for the Spuds, but exactly who will you be fighting against?

 

 

 

 

You’re not alone in the galaxy! Planetary Conquest is the main play mode, where you’ll encounter other players activities and their defense systems left on the planets. However - your galaxy is shared in asynchronous gameplay, there is no direct PvP.

 

After the battle, you and your crew will return to the Home Planet -  a micro-world constructed by the Spuds to help them plan their new quest of galactic domination. Home Planet is filled with Factories and Upgrade Centers that produce gear needed for Defense System assembly. It is the center of the world for your tribe,  that will grow in front of your eyes with each next victory.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our team began life as an experimental VR game development division at Polish software house Setapp. After initially developing games for the Gear VR mobile device, some of the team wanted more. Since then, our passion and craving for real, unique ‘Big VR’ game experiences with replayability and original design drove us to form Gamedust where, for the past two years, we have brought three titles to market.

 

Now, with ~20 people working at Gamedust, we are as excited as ever to develop new, ground-breaking gaming experiences. Each department has its own lead, workflow, unique ways to deliver the best quality possible. Our Spuds gameplay features are curated collectively to ensure that they look the best as well as functional at the same time. We have managed to build a reputation as being one of the most responsive VR developers on the market and are visible frequently with new content on Reddit.

 

We believe that Spuds Unearthed provides a truly unique mix of VR-focused design, seamless user experience and a world full of wacky potatoes fighting for their own piece of land. However, the current Early Access version of the game is lacking several elements that we believe will help elevate it to the next level for VR gamers. We would love to hear your feedback and collaborate on the final stage of the game’s development together to create something capable of being sustained for a long time, for current and future players.

 

 

Your financial support would expand the world of Spuds with new enemies, vehicles, and gameplay mechanics. The basic funding target and each stretch goal after that are filled with new gameplay and lore elements that will enrich Spuds Unearthed and make this game everything that we’ve always dreamt about. Let’s unearth those hot potatoes together!

story:
"What should I do if I wake up alone in the forest? "


Life did not prepare us for this. But my game will do it.

Hello, my name is Stepan, I'm a developer with 15 years of experience. I took part in development of games and other projects, including my own experimental game in the internet-culture setting, but now I want to tell you about more classic game I want to create.

In a nutshell, the game is a guide on the basics of survival on the terramorphic planets using primitive technology. 

This is a survival game. The player finds himself on a terramorphic planet, in a frightening, unfriendly, dark, foggy, ghastly world. And most importantly, if the hero meets the night outside the shelter, he will be attacked by creepy night creatures that will kill him in the dead of night.

The player will have to craft objects for survival according to primitive technologies - from improvised means without using any tools, even a simple knife or matches, literally from shit and sticks. Everything in this world wants to kill the hero and only inner voice will help him save himself. It tells the hero to think about the ways to survive here and now, which means ensuring a shelter, fire, water, food and also tools, clothes and meds.

General Information

Genre:  survival, crafting. 

Setting:  mysterious, ghastly worlds of terramorphic planets with dangerous inhabitants, with traces of accidents of advanced civilizations. All plants and creatures look as if they've been restored by someone who used incomplete DNA data of the Earth flora and fauna, perhaps partially from inorganic materials. And this someone didn't really understand how our life works, but the world of this planet nevertheless survived and keeps evolving.

Tagline:  guide on the basics of survival on the terramorphic planets. 

View:  2.5D with flat figures, with a possibility of turning the camera on certain corners, camera angle - sideways behind. 

 

With your help we will be able to create a truly outstanding game that will not only give deep experiences, but also help you in your life​.

 

What We Need & What You Get

All funded money will be spent on art, sound design and programming. I want the game to have unique, recognizable art and fine tuned sound, and because of that I need your support.

By becoming our backer you will not only get thanks and early access to the game, you will also became our partner and a meaningful part of the community that can influence what this game will be in the future. 

 

More About The Game

  • Craft based on primitive technologies - the player will have to craft objects for survival according to primitive technologies - from improvised means without using any tools, literally from shit and sticks.
  • Hero dies if he ends up without a shelter during the night. Everything wants to kill him and only inner voice will help save the hero.
  • Mysterious, ghastly worlds of terramorphic planets with dangerous inhabitants. Hero wakes up on the terramorphic planet where everything looks the same as it is on the Earth, yet everything is different. All plants and creatures look as if they've been restored by someone who used incomplete DNA data of the Earth flora and fauna, perhaps partially from inorganic materials. And this someone didn't really understand how our life works, but the world of this planet nevertheless survived and keeps evolving.
  • Three characters with different characteristics of: level of thirst and hunger, levels of blood flow, thermal control, intoxication and mental state
  • Injuries and diseases are an important element of gameplay.
  • 9 landscapes
  • 13 monsters
  • 18 landscape objects to interact with
  • 45 objects for craft

Stretch Goal Progress

  • 30 000$ - hand-drawn animated characters and creatures
  • 40 000$ - the first scenario of salvation
  • 50 000$ - the second scenario of salvation
  • 60 000$ - the third scenario of salvation
  • 70 000$ - the forth scenario of salvation

Each scenario of salvation means a pack of additional items, landscapes, the number of which is the same as in the basic game. Available scenarios are: to wait for help, to build own ship from the wreckage, to get saved by another civilization, to give new life for the planet with genetics.

Risks & Challenges

There is always a chance of unexpected problems that could occur and potentially delay the game. But I'm already 15 years in the development, so I know what to do in case something goes wrong. If we will lose someone from our team, we will find a replacement person with similar skills. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign – we need all the support we can get
  • Share our page on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Vk and other sites! 

 

Here is our links, please subscribe and follow to help us get the word out and make some noise

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ex_vivo

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ex.vivo.survival/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/exvivo_survival

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ex.vivo.survival/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUneheLYMgV-Dj...

Vk (ru): https://vk.com/ex_vivo_survival

Telegram (ru): https://t.me/ex_vivo_survival

 

Thank you!

story:
Play the Mac/PC Demo on Steam

Play the Mac/PC Demo on Itch.io
Right-Click to Open the Demo in a New Window!

Our Press Kit is Here.

 

Hi! I'm Masa Murda! Once upon a time my people were traveling through space trying to find a new planet to live on because we totally wrecked our old one. We landed on some skunky world right before we ran out of fuel. The place didn't even have oxygen!

Turned out okay, though--cuz we were followed.

BY A BUNCH OF FREAKING CANNIBALS! 

We needed a place to live and the Providers needed meat, so they fast-track terraformed and set us up real nice on the new world...y'know, so they could eat us.

Thanks to our tech-savvy cannibal buddies we have food, shelter--oxygen, and we only have to kill around one person a month to feed to them. Pretty sweet, right! 

Governor Faleena Dancy has the super-fun job of handling the cannibal lotteries each month. She's got a lot of incentive to get things right, because our cannibal friends threatened to eat her if she screws up. 

Actually, they'll eat all of us if she screws up. Did I mention they turn into berserk monsters when they get too hungry? They rampage and start eating people alive--it's hilarious!

Faleena's actually pretty good at her job--probably too good, because we colonists hate her. Her best friend is one of the cannibals! 

People figure Faleena's a cannibal sympathizer and talk about revolting all the time. As if she didn't have enough problems! AH HA HA HA HA HA HA!

I'm the editorializer at the colony news station, and I think this cannibalism stuff is a hoot! I'm also the one who's going to be giving you all your nifty puzzles to solve, and I'll be there after the endings whenever you screw up. Guess we'll be seeing a lot of each other! 

Cannibal Lottery is 15 lengthy chapters of psychological horror filled with harrowing choices and bonus puzzles. Earn stats, activate flags, and manage your budget in a way that will keep both your people and the cannibals happy.

All choices matter, and will affect the likelihood of a colonist revolt, a cannibal rampage, a mental breakdown, a hostile cannibal takeover, a wildcard event, or your becoming a sacrifice yourself. 

Determine who among your staff is an ally or an enemy while also deciding whether or not to form an alliance with the cannibal leader.

Decide how much or little to trust your best friend, the cannibal Dal-Tor, and choose how to use resources to benefit the future of colony or the cannibal-human alliance.

Throughout it all, you'll face truly horrific choices, unthinkable situations, and cringe-inducing horror which is only made palatable through the antics of Cannibal Lottery's zany mascot, Masa Murda. 

  • Every Choice Effects a Stat or a Flag
  • Full of Twists that Will Make Your Jaw Drop
  • 15 Chapters and 3 Bonus Chapters to Unlock
  • Puzzles, After Death Scenes, Dynamic Effects
  • 150,000 words, Hundreds of Images 
  • 50+ Steam Achievements, Dozens of Endings
  • An Original Sound Track

Governor Faleena Dancy
The Providers appointed Faleena to the governor position after eating the former governor, Faleena's husband, Ludrin. To the surprise of everyone, Faleena not only accepted her husband's former post, but appears to be governing in favor of the cannibals who ate him. The reasons why are likely only known by her closest friend, the cannibal Dal-Tor. Faleena does her best to govern the colony while raising the baby born after her husband's death. 

Provider Emissary Dal-Tor
Dal-Tor is the intermediary between the cannibals and humans and spends most of her time in Faleena's office. Thousands of years old, she's found meaning in the deep relationship she has with Faleena and her daughter. Both cannibals and humans question what her true interest is in Faleena.

Vice Governor Malek
While the governor is appointed to her seat, the vice governor Malek was elected by the people. He always places their concerns over that of the cannibals, causing him to often butt heads with Faleena. Malek's power is limited, but he uses his influence as best he can. 

Assistant to the Vice Governor Sharin
Sharin is technically Faleena's assistant also, but has shown a strong preference toward serving Malek over her. At 75 years old Sharin is deeply troubled by a policy that switches a younger lottery winner with a parent or grandparent. Faleena's support of this policy has caused strife between them. 

Lord Crieghton, Ruler of the Providers
Crieghton is the cannibal Faleena must answer to when she takes risks with the lotteries. His goal is to feed his 34 people as much food as possible, and he resents the small rations they endure while the colony grows. Crieghton can order the 'Sacrificial Replacement' of Faleena if she breaks any of the rules in the agreement made between the colonists and Providers.

Lottery Commissioner Gray
Gray has the unenviable job of facilitating the sacrifices after a lottery winner is chosen. His weight is not an issue to him, but he wishes he didn't have to deal with Dal-Tor constantly mentioning how much she wants to eat him.  

Media Liaison Zalby
Zalby's job is to coordinate between the governor's office and the colony press. It's unknown if they are loyal to Faleena or Malek, but the news that airs about Faleena is primarily negative. 

Ednea
Now close to one year's old, Ednea is the baby girl Faleena learned she was pregnant with shortly after her husband died. 

News Editorializer Masa Murda
Masa Murda's official job is making Faleena's life difficult by reporting on her in the worst light possible. While the other news anchors maintain an air of objectivity, Masa is happy to make edgy jokes at the governor's expense. Her unofficial job is to give players puzzles and talk to them after they get an ending. 

Budget

Over $10,000 has already gone into the creation of Cannibal Lottery, and this has been used entirely to pay our artists.  We learned from our last two games that a dedicated artist who will stick with you for the whole game is not cheap.  

The $2,000 goal of this Indiegogo will not cover all our expenses, but it will be enough to get this done.  We hope that we can exceed $2,000 to keep us from going too deep in the hole to create this game.

  • Paid already - $10,000 
  • Remaining Art - $12,000
  • Programming - $4,000
  • Music Samples For Music Production - $500
  • Editing/Testing - $2,000
  • Marketing - $1,000
  • Indiegogo Fees - $200

Total - $29,700

Paid Already -$10,000

Total - $19,700

Indiegogo -$2,000 

Total - $17,700

Kickstarter - $10,800 (Hopefully)

Total - $6,900

Monthly Contribution $1,000 x 7 Months = $7,000

The monthly contribution is what we're allocating from revenue received from our other two games.  If we fail to receive enough income from our games to pay for Cannibal Lottery the creator will finance things from credit and savings.  

Nothing will prevent this game from being completed.  We have a proven track record.  Go to the Risks and Challenges section for more information on that.

Team

Yamila Abraham - Heading the project is me, Yamila. I've made my living as an author for 14 years and then switched to making games full-time in September 2017.  

I love writing horror (and romance).  I think cannibals are a monster with huge untapped potential.  I love the psychological implications of being eaten and stories about unavoidable sacrifice.  

I'm the writer, music producer, and project lead for Cannibal Lottery.  This is our third game and we're pulling out all the stops to make it a great one!  

Of course, I wouldn't have a hope in heck of pulling this off by myself.  I rely on my awesome team to make these games.  

ViviChibi, me, and Steve are the core team for all Y Press Games games and have been together from the beginning.

ViviChibi - ViviChibi is the programmer for all Y Press Games games. She's able to pull off amazing things with the Ren'Py software.   

Steve Warky Nunez - When and if we hit the voice acting goal, Steve will be the one to find our talent and handle all production aspects of getting lines for the game.  A prominent voice actor himself, he has amazing connections in the VA world.  

MJ Barros - The overall look of Cannibal Lottery is dictated by the artwork of our line artist, MJ.  An artist from Chile, MJ has made producing art for Cannibal Lottery their full-time job.  We're thrilled by their dedication and talent.

Zsardito - Zsardito is our main colorist.  They've done incredible work on defining the unique 'horror' palette of Cannibal Lottery.

ShinigamiKitty - ShinigamiKitty is our loyal flatter. They lay down the flat colors for the colorist to work from.  This is ShinigamiKitty's second game working with us after they were drafted from the backers of the To Trust an Incubus Kickstarter.  

Le Perrugine - The Italian art studio Le Perrugine is another line artist we've tapped to create sprites and assets.  They're ready to step in to cover main line-art duties if MJ has any problems.  We've learned you always need backups to prevent delays on shipping games!  This is Le Perrugine's second game with us (but they were a graphic novel artist for us when we were Yaoi Press).

Elle Rei - Elle is our incredibly talented background artist.  She designed the unique look of Lushland Colony.  This is Elle's second game with us.

Fairfaxleasee - Fairfaxleasee is another backer drafted from To Trust an Incubus, and is fast becoming a member of the core team. They are the editor, cheat map maker, tester, and achievement designer for Cannibal Lottery.

Rewards

$10 - Your Name in the Credits & Wallpaper Set. This will be a set of 5 digital desktop wallpapers in 1024x768,  1366x768, and 1920x1080 sizes.

$25 -  Steam Code for Cannibal Lottery. You'll get your name in the credits, the wallpaper set, and the game!  

$50 -  Art Book, Original Sound Track, and Cheat Map.  You'll get your name in the credits, the wallpaper set, a Steam key for the game, the digital art book, the original digital sound track, and the digital cheat map!  

The art book will not only include game art, but will describe the journey of creating the Cannibal Lottery game.  If you've read the My Magical Demon Lover or To Trust an Incubus art books you know they're incredibly insightful.

The Sound Track may include a voice actor blooper reel if we're able to have voice acting.  

The Cheat Map will include a clickable table of contents and describes how to get all the endings, achievements, and how to solve all the puzzles.

$100 - Beta Tester.  You'll get your name in the credits, the wallpaper set, a Steam key for the game, the digital art book, the original digital sound track, the digital cheat map, and you'll be an official beta tester for Cannibal Lottery!

Beta Testers get VIP access to the game as it's being created.  Author Yamila Abraham relies heavily on beta testers to tell her what needs to be changed in order to make the final game as strong as it can possibly be.

It can't be overstated how important beta testers are to the development of the game, however, most testers do not participate in helping mold the game, and simply enjoy early access to playable betas.  They enjoy chapters of the game months before the release date.

In past games, beta testers have had significant influence over plot, characterizations, art, and dialogue. We listen to beta testers and adapt the game based on your input.  To Trust an Incubus delivered four beta versions to testers prior to launch and granted access to a private Google Doc for input.

Risks & Challenges

Our ideal timeline for the project is here.

The reason you should trust us to deliver this game on time is our track record:  

My Magical Demon Lover - Promised May 2018 - Delivered May 2018

To Trust an Incubus - Promised November 2018 - Delivered November 2018
(Full Disclosure: The game was delivered on time, but physical rewards were shipped eight days late. We tried our hardest to avoid this, but made sure backers understood why there was a delay and how the problem was being solved every step of the way.)

We know you've probably backed a lot of projects that end up being a year or more late or are never delivered at all.  That's not how Y Press Games operates.  

It would take the death of the project lead or some other catastrophe to cause us to fail in our delivery.  We put a phenomenal effort in getting to rewards to backers on time, and we don't skimp on quality to meet those deadlines.  Our deadline includes time to meet all Stretch Goals.

You will get Cannibal Lottery on or before November 2019.  If there is an unavoidable delay it will be short.  If there is a long delay someone has died, is dying, or there is a natural or unnatural disaster of a biblical scale.  We take our delivery dates very VERY seriously.

Tumblr -  https://www.tumblr.com/blog/ypressgames

Twitter - https://twitter.com/ypressgames

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ypressgames/

What Even Is This?

It's a dystopian political visual novel inspired by the famous 1950s short story, To Serve Man, by Damon Knight (turned into an episode of The Twilight Zone and featured on a Simpsons Halloween episode) and the 1948 short story, The Lottery, by Shirley Jackson (with radio, TV, and film adaptions). 

The story To Serve Man is pretty famous, but if you're not familiar it's about an alien race that comes to Earth and uses their advanced technology to end all of Earth's problems.  They claim to have benevolent motives and a cryptographer, Patty, thinks this is true when she translates one of their book titles as 'To Serve Man.' 

By the end of the story, too late to save a high-ranking government official from boarding an alien ship, Patty delivers the revelation that she translated the rest of 'To Serve Man' and it's a cookbook.  It's 'serve' as in 'serve a meal.' 

Shirley Jackson's The Lottery is less notorious, but you might have read it in High School English.  

A small New England town holds a ritual where families must draw lots and which ever family draws the black dot goes through two more rounds to decide which of their family members will be sacrificed.  Once it's decided all the towns people stone them to death.

It's never revealed why they're sacrificing someone, but some assume it's a sacrifice to ensure a good harvest or general prosperity.

Mix these two stories together, add some sci-fi, and you have Cannibal Lottery.  It fits with a common theme in a lot of my stories where I write about someone having to make a terrible sacrifice willingly.  

In horror you can take this sacrifice theme to some pretty horrific places, like in the Saw movies I'm too squeamish to watch, where someone has to cut off a limb to escape some kind of worse consequence.

I didn't want to make a gory horror game like that.  I wanted it to be more psychological--something that makes you shudder.  I wanted to present a reality that is so inverse that the unthinkable become reasonable.

I wrote a short story prequel version of Cannibal Lottery when a friend running an online queer sci-fi magazine invited me to submit a 3,000 word queer sci-fi story.  

The story just flowed out of me in less than an hour, but by then I realized there was nothing queer about it and never submitted.  I shared it with some people and got a lot of positive feedback.  

It seemed like the perfect set-up for a highly original horror visual novel.  Unlike the genre ebooks I wrote for many years, visual novels are more open to really off-center ideas.  The niches aren't as tightly established as in, say, romance novels.

This is a concept that's been in my heart for a few years and the story is still 'flowing' as I write it now.  I hope you'll play the demo and help support our effort to make this unique game!
story_txt:
Play the Mac/PC Demo on Steam

Play the Mac/PC Demo on Itch.ioRight-Click to Open the Demo in a New Window!
Our Press Kit is Here.
 

Hi! I'm Masa Murda! Once upon a time my people were traveling through space trying to find a new planet to live on because we totally wrecked our old one. We landed on some skunky world right before we ran out of fuel. The place didn't even have oxygen!
Turned out okay, though--cuz we were followed.
BY A BUNCH OF FREAKING CANNIBALS! 


We needed a place to live and the Providers needed meat, so they fast-track terraformed and set us up real nice on the new world...y'know, so they could eat us.
Thanks to our tech-savvy cannibal buddies we have food, shelter--oxygen, and we only have to kill around one person a month to feed to them. Pretty sweet, right! 

Governor Faleena Dancy has the super-fun job of handling the cannibal lotteries each month. She's got a lot of incentive to get things right, because our cannibal friends threatened to eat her if she screws up. 
Actually, they'll eat all of us if she screws up. Did I mention they turn into berserk monsters when they get too hungry? They rampage and start eating people alive--it's hilarious!
Faleena's actually pretty good at her job--probably too good, because we colonists hate her. Her best friend is one of the cannibals! 

People figure Faleena's a cannibal sympathizer and talk about revolting all the time. As if she didn't have enough problems! AH HA HA HA HA HA HA!
I'm the editorializer at the colony news station, and I think this cannibalism stuff is a hoot! I'm also the one who's going to be giving you all your nifty puzzles to solve, and I'll be there after the endings whenever you screw up. Guess we'll be seeing a lot of each other! 

Cannibal Lottery is 15 lengthy chapters of psychological horror filled with harrowing choices and bonus puzzles. Earn stats, activate flags, and manage your budget in a way that will keep both your people and the cannibals happy.
All choices matter, and will affect the likelihood of a colonist revolt, a cannibal rampage, a mental breakdown, a hostile cannibal takeover, a wildcard event, or your becoming a sacrifice yourself. 
Determine who among your staff is an ally or an enemy while also deciding whether or not to form an alliance with the cannibal leader.
Decide how much or little to trust your best friend, the cannibal Dal-Tor, and choose how to use resources to benefit the future of colony or the cannibal-human alliance.
Throughout it all, you'll face truly horrific choices, unthinkable situations, and cringe-inducing horror which is only made palatable through the antics of Cannibal Lottery's zany mascot, Masa Murda. 

Every Choice Effects a Stat or a Flag
Full of Twists that Will Make Your Jaw Drop


15 Chapters and 3 Bonus Chapters to Unlock
Puzzles, After Death Scenes, Dynamic Effects

150,000 words, Hundreds of Images 

50+ Steam Achievements, Dozens of Endings
An Original Sound Track


Governor Faleena DancyThe Providers appointed Faleena to the governor position after eating the former governor, Faleena's husband, Ludrin. To the surprise of everyone, Faleena not only accepted her husband's former post, but appears to be governing in favor of the cannibals who ate him. The reasons why are likely only known by her closest friend, the cannibal Dal-Tor. Faleena does her best to govern the colony while raising the baby born after her husband's death. 

Provider Emissary Dal-TorDal-Tor is the intermediary between the cannibals and humans and spends most of her time in Faleena's office. Thousands of years old, she's found meaning in the deep relationship she has with Faleena and her daughter. Both cannibals and humans question what her true interest is in Faleena.

Vice Governor MalekWhile the governor is appointed to her seat, the vice governor Malek was elected by the people. He always places their concerns over that of the cannibals, causing him to often butt heads with Faleena. Malek's power is limited, but he uses his influence as best he can. 

Assistant to the Vice Governor SharinSharin is technically Faleena's assistant also, but has shown a strong preference toward serving Malek over her. At 75 years old Sharin is deeply troubled by a policy that switches a younger lottery winner with a parent or grandparent. Faleena's support of this policy has caused strife between them. 

Lord Crieghton, Ruler of the ProvidersCrieghton is the cannibal Faleena must answer to when she takes risks with the lotteries. His goal is to feed his 34 people as much food as possible, and he resents the small rations they endure while the colony grows. Crieghton can order the 'Sacrificial Replacement' of Faleena if she breaks any of the rules in the agreement made between the colonists and Providers.

Lottery Commissioner GrayGray has the unenviable job of facilitating the sacrifices after a lottery winner is chosen. His weight is not an issue to him, but he wishes he didn't have to deal with Dal-Tor constantly mentioning how much she wants to eat him.  

Media Liaison ZalbyZalby's job is to coordinate between the governor's office and the colony press. It's unknown if they are loyal to Faleena or Malek, but the news that airs about Faleena is primarily negative. 

EdneaNow close to one year's old, Ednea is the baby girl Faleena learned she was pregnant with shortly after her husband died. 

News Editorializer Masa MurdaMasa Murda's official job is making Faleena's life difficult by reporting on her in the worst light possible. While the other news anchors maintain an air of objectivity, Masa is happy to make edgy jokes at the governor's expense. Her unofficial job is to give players puzzles and talk to them after they get an ending. 

Budget
Over $10,000 has already gone into the creation of Cannibal Lottery, and this has been used entirely to pay our artists.  We learned from our last two games that a dedicated artist who will stick with you for the whole game is not cheap.  
The $2,000 goal of this Indiegogo will not cover all our expenses, but it will be enough to get this done.  We hope that we can exceed $2,000 to keep us from going too deep in the hole to create this game.

Paid already - $10,000 
Remaining Art - $12,000
Programming - $4,000
Music Samples For Music Production - $500
Editing/Testing - $2,000
Marketing - $1,000
Indiegogo Fees - $200

Total - $29,700
Paid Already -$10,000
Total - $19,700
Indiegogo -$2,000 
Total - $17,700
Kickstarter - $10,800 (Hopefully)
Total - $6,900
Monthly Contribution $1,000 x 7 Months = $7,000
The monthly contribution is what we're allocating from revenue received from our other two games.  If we fail to receive enough income from our games to pay for Cannibal Lottery the creator will finance things from credit and savings.  
Nothing will prevent this game from being completed.  We have a proven track record.  Go to the Risks and Challenges section for more information on that.


Team
Yamila Abraham - Heading the project is me, Yamila. I've made my living as an author for 14 years and then switched to making games full-time in September 2017.  
I love writing horror (and romance).  I think cannibals are a monster with huge untapped potential.  I love the psychological implications of being eaten and stories about unavoidable sacrifice.  
I'm the writer, music producer, and project lead for Cannibal Lottery.  This is our third game and we're pulling out all the stops to make it a great one!  
Of course, I wouldn't have a hope in heck of pulling this off by myself.  I rely on my awesome team to make these games.  
ViviChibi, me, and Steve are the core team for all Y Press Games games and have been together from the beginning.
ViviChibi - ViviChibi is the programmer for all Y Press Games games. She's able to pull off amazing things with the Ren'Py software.   
Steve Warky Nunez - When and if we hit the voice acting goal, Steve will be the one to find our talent and handle all production aspects of getting lines for the game.  A prominent voice actor himself, he has amazing connections in the VA world.  
MJ Barros - The overall look of Cannibal Lottery is dictated by the artwork of our line artist, MJ.  An artist from Chile, MJ has made producing art for Cannibal Lottery their full-time job.  We're thrilled by their dedication and talent.
Zsardito - Zsardito is our main colorist.  They've done incredible work on defining the unique 'horror' palette of Cannibal Lottery.
ShinigamiKitty - ShinigamiKitty is our loyal flatter. They lay down the flat colors for the colorist to work from.  This is ShinigamiKitty's second game working with us after they were drafted from the backers of the To Trust an Incubus Kickstarter.

story:
Kingdoms of Aurillia: The Beginning is a mobile game focused on gameplay with a lot of ways to have fun, as well as beautiful graphic and detailed world which will be stunning to play in.
You can build your own City, train tons of workers or handle all resources on your own. 
You can meet enemies during exploration of the world, but most of the time you will be under attack by raiders and pirates who want to capture your village. Try different solutions because there are different ways to solve problems.

We have a vision of the mobile, easy to learn, hard to skill game, where you can choose and skill up your hero. It doesn't matter if you are playing singleplayer, multiplayer, at home, on a bus. Your skills and attributes will be saved in cloud and can be loaded in your another device.

The game is mainly focused on different ways of gameplay, you can be an unbeatable hero or a great leader, but your village is still your main goal. If you lose your village, the game ends. The village will be attacked every night and you can choose defensive, economic or offensive way how to deal with this danger, it's all up to you.


In PvP mode, your village will be attacked by an enemy village. You will gain access to the barracks, where you can train your army which will be automatically sent to defeat your opponent.
You can still build your village, like in Story mode and gather rare resources all around the map, but your opponent can have the same idea as you so be careful.

The game is created in Unity engine. We chose this engine because of the price, platform support, and our experiences with it gained during our other projects. The game will be available on Google play store as well as App store for free.

Are you ready?

Aurillia is a complex and beautiful world intertwined with great natural power from the highest peak of the North Mountains to the deepest hole of the Lava Plants. And don't forget the Flying Forests, one of the most beautiful places of the Aurillia's lands.

So are you ready for your excitement journey?

story:
<The Devil, most powerful creature ever on earth>


Game Story

One day, the Devil decides to kill himself.

Unfortunately he cannot kill himself, as well as none to kill him in hell. 

So the Devil decides to train human heroes to kill him.

And executes his secret plan…

What is the Devil's intention? And can he fulfill his wish?

<The heroes are cute and bright unlike their names.>


Development Story

Hi! We are "whed", the company working to make this world funnier and happier everyday.

The mobile games that has been released these days are all quite similar. All of them has different shapes with same type of rules and goals.

  • The user controls heroes while playing the game. But the purpose of the game becomes to train heroes into a higher level then to enjoy the game itself.(These days the users do not control and just watch the heroes fight automatically)
  • The user will consider how to level-up heroes, but no matter how hard they try, heroes will be developed as same as others.(Therefore, no need to worry)
  • Even though the user plays the game well enough, they will give up at the point where they have to use their own money to continue the game.

We are tired of the mobile games pouring out everyday. That's why we decided to make a whole new type of game that never existed in this world. Everyday we thought about 'making a game different from the others'. We decided to cut out all useless elements and leave only the fun elements. After a long time of discussion and consideration, we decided to make the game 'Devil Decides to Die'.



Genre 

The game setting rule 'The enemy has to be raised as to be stronger to win the game' is different from other games. So we call this new type of game 'feeding' or 'tsundere'.

*Feeding : giving food behavior of others to grow

*Tsundere : (ツンデレ, [tsɯndeɽe]) is a Japanese character development process that describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing their warm side over time. The word is derived from the terms tsun tsun (ツンツン), meaning to turn away in disgust, and dere dere (デレデレ) meaning to become 'lovey dovey'.


<Monsters looks strange but cute at the same time. They have to fight with the heroes without knowing why they are fighting, what the Devil's intention is and most of all fail during fighting with the heroes.>

Platform

We will release iOS & Android at the moment.


Game Rules

The user becomes the Devil and participate monsters in the game. The heroes cannot be controlled. Even though the main character of the game is the heroes. The heroes fight with monsters automatically, and also grow while fighting.

The user does not have to care about the heroes' ability. When monsters drop items and skills, the heroes get them.

The heroes use the items and skills to fight monsters, also automatically.

The user has to send out various types of monsters in order not to kill the weak the heroes. You will lose the game if the heroes all die. The user shall feed the heroes with monsters properly so that the heroes level up and survive.

Pray for the heroes to become stronger and stronger to kill the Devil.

Distribution Strategy

We will not work with big distribution companies. We will not expose commercials inside the game repeatedly to deceive users. It is also the opportunity together with the huge distributor, but also poison. Even though heir support can be effective, they have to take commission is large enough to seem unfair as part of start-up companies. Our goal is to distribute the game into many languages and many countries by ourselves. If we check the possibility at any one country, then we are willing to do with the distributor. The funding target is $200,000 dollars. The Korean and English version will be launched in first quarter, 2016. Extra $10,000 added will bring one more language version of the game. Japanese, Chinese, German, Spanish, French, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Turkish 


About whed

whed is the start-up company who wants to make people fun everyday. The first step of whed is making games. In our opinion the most competitiveness of game is 'Directing'. That's why half of our people 'Directors'. whed runs development sector through outsourcing.


Thanks

Please help us achieve our goal of $200,000! We know $200,000 is huge number but this is for a develop, world-wide promotion and service of this new genre of game. We want to share our vision with you.


게임소개

어느날 갑자기 마왕은 죽기로 결심했다. 하지만 스스로 목숨을 끊을 수도 없을 뿐 아니라, 마계에서는 마왕을 죽일 수 있는 생명체는 아무도 없었다. 결국 마왕은 잠재력이 강한 인간 용사들을 단련시켜 본인을 죽일 수 있도록 하는 비밀 계획을 시행에 옮기는데! 마왕은 대체 왜 이러는 걸까? 그리고 무사히 원하는 바를 이룰 수 있을까?


기획의도

안녕하세요. 세상을 즐겁게 만들려고 매일같이 애쓰는 whed입니다. 근래에 출시되는 모바일 게임들은 대부분 비슷한 설정으로 진행됩니다.

1)유저는 용사를 조종해서 단지 레벨업 하기 위해 몬스터들과 싸움을 계속합니다.(요즘은 조종도 안하고 자동으로 싸우죠.)

2)유저는 용사를 레벨업 시키면서 어떻게 키울지 고심하지만, 고민이 무색하게 결국 '국민테크트리'를 따라 모두 똑같은 방향으로 성장시키게 됩니다.(결국에는 고민도 안하게 되지요.) 

3)재밌게 게임을 하다 어느 순간 현금을 쓰지 않으면 더 이상 진행을 못할만큼 어려워져서 포기하게 됩니다.(게임 회사도 먹고 살아야겠지만 좀 심하잖아요.)

우리는 이런 모바일 게임들에 완전히 질려 버렸습니다. 모두 껍데기만 다른 예쁘기만할 뿐인 게임들에 말이죠. 그래서 우리는 이 세상에 없는 장르의 게임을 만들기로 했습니다. 우리의 일상은 "기존 방식과 다르면서 재미있는 게임을 만들고 싶다"는 고민의 연속이었습니다. 고민할 필요 없는 것들은 과감히 생략하고 재미있는 요소만을 남겨놓기로 했습니다. 그 길고 긴 인고의 시간을 보내고, 드디어 야심작 "마왕 죽기로 결심하다"를 만들게 됐습니다.


장르

"게임에서 이기기 위해서는 적이 강해지도록 키워 주어야 한다"는 설정은 저희가 아는 바로는 기존에 찾아볼 수 없는 장르입니다. 그래서 우리는 이 새로운 게임의 장르를 "feeding " 혹은 "츤데레"라고 부릅니다.

*Feeding : 적에게 고의로 죽어 적을 강하게 만드는게 목적적인 게임입니다.

*츤데레 (ツンデレ) : 재패니메이션이나 일본의 미소녀 게임에서 찾아볼 수 있는 등장인물의 인격 유형 가운데 하나를 일컫는 유행어입니다. 이 말은 ‘새침하고 퉁명스러운 모습’을 나타내는 일본어 의태어인 츤츤(つんつん )과 ‘부끄러워하는 것’을 나타내는 일본어 의태어 데레데레(でれでれ)의 합성어입니다. 즉, '츤데레 게임'은 퉁명스럽게 적과 싸우는 듯 보이지만, 사실은 적이 더 강해지도록 노력해야 하는 게임입니다.


플랫폼

현재 계획으로는 iOS와 안드로이드를 지원합니다.

아트 컨셉

*용사들

용사라는 이름을 달기에는 과할만큼 귀엽고 명랑한 모습을 하고 있습니다. 어딘가 하나씩 부족해 보여서 유저들의 보호본능을 자극 하기에 부족함이 없어서 한껏 성장시키고 싶은 마음이 들게 하는 디자인입니다.

*몬스터

기괴하지만 미워할 수 없는 몬스터들입니다. 영문도 모른채 용사들과 싸워야 하고 마왕의 계획 때문인 것도 모른채 열심히 노력해도 늘 용사에게 패배하는 모습이 안 쓰럽기도 합니다.

*타이틀

용사들과 몬스터가 전반적으로 귀엽다면 타이틀은 진지하고 싶었습니다. 어이없는 설정과 귀여운 캐릭터와 다르게 우리가 매우 진지하게 이 게임을 만들고 있다는 것을 보여줍니다.


게임룰

유저는 마왕의 입장이 되어 몬스터를 출전 시킵니다. 용사는 조정할 수 없습니다. 주인공은 용사인데도 말이죠. 용사는 자동으로 몬스터와 싸우고, 이기면 자동으로 성장합니다. 유저는 용사의 파라메터에 신경 쓸게 전혀 없어요. 허약한 용사가 죽지 않고 무럭무럭 강해질 수 있도록 적절한 조합으로 몬스터를 출전시켜야 합니다. 용사가 몬스터와 싸워서 모두 죽으면 실패합니다. 어찌됐든 용사들이 죽지 않도록 몬스터들을 먹여 줘야 합니다. 무럭 무럭 강해진 용사가 무사히 마왕을 무찌를 수 있도록 기도하세요.

배급전략

우리는 강력한 퍼블리셔와 손을 잡지도 않을 것이고, 반복적인 게임 내 광고 노출로 유저를 현혹하지도 않으려고 합니다. 퍼블리셔가 제공하는 막강한 지원은 달콤하지만, 퍼블리셔에게만 유리한 계약 조건들은 스타트업이 감내하기에는 너무나 큰 위험이 되기도 합니다. 우리는 스스로의 힘으로 최대한 많은 언어로 최대한 많은 나라에 출시할 계획입니다. 우리가 출시한 여러 나라중에 어느 한 곳에서라도 '마왕 죽기로 결심하다'가 가능성을 보인다면 그때에 퍼블리셔와 계약해도 늦지 않을 것이라 생각합니다. 펀딩 목표액은 20만 달러 입니다. 한국어와 영어로 2016년 1Q에 출시할 예정입니다. 추가 1만 달러마다 일어, 중국어, 독어, 스페인어, 프랑스어, 아랍어, 러시아어, 포르투칼어, 이탈리아어, 터키어다음 순서대로 언어를 하나씩 추가할 예정입니다.

회사소개

안녕하세요 '웨드'입니다. 저희는 '널리 사람을 즐겁게 하라'는 목표를 갖고 만들어진 회사입니다. 그 첫걸음으로 게임 개발을 시작합니다. 우리가 생각할 때 게임에서 가장 중요한 경쟁력은 '기획력'입니다. 그래서 우리의 직원들중 반은 기획자들입니다. 앞으로 회사가 커지더라도 기획자들 중심의 조직으로 만들어나갈 계획입니다.


함께 해요!

여러분과 함께 게임의 신세계를 열 준비가 모두 되어 있습니다. 
숟가락만 얹어 주세요~
story_txt:
<The Devil, most powerful creature ever on earth>

Game Story One day, the Devil decides to kill himself.
Unfortunately he cannot kill himself, as well as none to kill him in hell. 
So the Devil decides to train human heroes to kill him.
And executes his secret plan…
What is the Devil's intention? And can he fulfill his wish?




<The heroes are cute and bright unlike their names.>

Development StoryHi! We are "whed", the company working to make this world funnier and happier everyday.
The mobile games that has been released these days are all quite similar. All of them has different shapes with same type of rules and goals.

The user controls heroes while playing the game. But the purpose of the game becomes to train heroes into a higher level then to enjoy the game itself.(These days the users do not control and just watch the heroes fight automatically) The user will consider how to level-up heroes, but no matter how hard they try, heroes will be developed as same as others.(Therefore, no need to worry) Even though the user plays the game well enough, they will give up at the point where they have to use their own money to continue the game.  We are tired of the mobile games pouring out everyday. That's why we decided to make a whole new type of game that never existed in this world. Everyday we thought about 'making a game different from the others'. We decided to cut out all useless elements and leave only the fun elements. After a long time of discussion and consideration, we decided to make the game 'Devil Decides to Die'.





Genre The game setting rule 'The enemy has to be raised as to be stronger to win the game' is different from other games. So we call this new type of game 'feeding' or 'tsundere'.
*Feeding : giving food behavior of others to grow
*Tsundere :  (ツンデレ, [tsɯndeɽe]) is a Japanese character development process that describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing their warm side over time. The word is derived from the terms tsun tsun (ツンツン), meaning to turn away in disgust, and dere dere (デレデレ) meaning to become 'lovey dovey'.

<Monsters looks strange but cute at the same time. They have to fight with the heroes without knowing why they are fighting, what the Devil's intention is and most of all fail during fighting with the heroes.>


PlatformWe will release iOS & Android at the moment.


Game Rules



The user becomes the Devil and participate monsters in the game. The heroes cannot be controlled. Even though the main character of the game is the heroes. The heroes fight with monsters automatically, and also grow while fighting.




The user does not have to care about the heroes' ability. When monsters drop items and skills, the heroes get them.


The heroes use the items and skills to fight monsters, also automatically.


The user has to send out various types of monsters in order not to kill the weak the heroes. You will lose the game if the heroes all die. The user shall feed the heroes with monsters properly so that the heroes level up and survive.

Pray for the heroes to become stronger and stronger to kill the Devil.

Distribution Strategy
We will not work with big distribution companies. We will not expose commercials inside the game repeatedly to deceive users. It is also the opportunity together with the huge distributor, but also poison. Even though heir support can be effective, they have to take commission is large enough to seem unfair as part of start-up companies. Our goal is to distribute the game into many languages and many countries by ourselves. If we check the possibility at any one country, then we are willing to do with the distributor. The funding target is $200,000 dollars. The Korean and English version will be launched in first quarter, 2016. Extra $10,000 added will bring one more language version of the game. Japanese, Chinese, German, Spanish, French, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Turkish 



About whedwhed is the start-up company who wants to make people fun everyday. The first step of whed is making games. In our opinion the most competitiveness of game is 'Directing'. That's why half of our people 'Directors'. whed runs development sector through outsourcing.










Thanks Please help us achieve our goal of $200,000! We know $200,000 is huge number but this is for a develop, world-wide promotion and service of this new genre of game. We want to share our vision with you.




게임소개

어느날 갑자기 마왕은 죽기로 결심했다. 하지만 스스로 목숨을
끊을 수도 없을 뿐 아니라, 마계에서는 마왕을 죽일 수 있는 생명체는 아무도 없었다. 결국 마왕은 잠재력이 강한 인간 용사들을 단련시켜 본인을 죽일 수 있도록 하는 비밀 계획을 시행에
옮기는데! 마왕은 대체 왜 이러는 걸까? 그리고

*츤데레 (ツンデレ) : 재패니메이션이나 일본의 미소녀 게임에서 찾아볼 수 있는 등장인물의 인격 유형 가운데 하나를 일컫는 유행어입니다. 이 말은 ‘새침하고 퉁명스러운 모습’을 나타내는 일본어 의태어인 츤츤(つんつん )과 ‘부끄러워하는 것’을 나타내는 일본어 의태어 데레데레(でれでれ)의 합성어입니다. 즉, '츤데레 게임'은 퉁명스럽게 적과 싸우는 듯 보이지만, 사실은 적이 더 강해지도록 노력해야 하는 게임입니다.




플랫폼현재 계획으로는 iOS와 안드로이드를 지원합니다.

배급전략

우리는 강력한 퍼블리셔와 손을 잡지도 않을 것이고, 반복적인 게임 내 광고 노출로 유저를 현혹하지도 않으려고 합니다. 퍼블리셔가 제공하는 막강한 지원은 달콤하지만, 퍼블리셔에게만 유리한 계약 조건들은 스타트업이 감내하기에는 너무나 큰 위험이 되기도 합니다. 우리는 스스로의 힘으로 최대한 많은 언어로 최대한 많은 나라에 출시할 계획입니다. 우리가 출시한 여러 나라중에 어느 한 곳에서라도 '마왕 죽기로 결심하다'가 가능성을 보인다면 그때에 퍼블리셔와 계약해도 늦지 않을 것이라 생각합니다. 펀딩 목표액은 20만 달러 입니다. 한국어와 영어로 2016년 1Q에 출시할 예정입니다. 추가 1만 달러마다 일어, 중국어, 독어, 스페인어, 프랑스어, 아랍어, 러시아어, 포르투칼어, 이탈리아어, 터키어다음 순서대로 언어를 하나씩 추가할 예정입니다.


회사소개안녕하세요 '웨드'입니다. 저희는 '널리 사람을 즐겁게 하라'는 목표를 갖고 만들어진 회사입니다. 그 첫걸음으로 게임 개발을 시작합니다. 우리가 생각할 때 게임에서 가장 중요한 경쟁력은 '기획력'입니다. 그래서 우리의 직원들중 반은 기획자들입니다. 앞으로 회사가 커지더라도 기획자들 중심의 조직으로 만들어나갈 계획입니다.








함께 해요!
여러분과 함께 게임의 신세계를 열 준비가 모두 되어 있습니다. 

숟가락만 얹어 주세요~

story:
Access the free demo:

  • NA:  battlenet://starcraft/map/1/264957
  • EU:  battlenet://starcraft/map/2/186221
  • Or Manually:  Starcraft 2 > Arcade > Search "Bloodbath Demo"

Bloodbath is a new type of Starcraft 2 micro game (Free To Play).

Cards provides users with units to engage in warfare.

The combat system rewards a tactical approach to micro and multitasking.

    My name is Will Mackle, and I am the creator of Bloodbath.  I am an avid competitive gamer, and have a degree in software engineering from McMaster University.  Though I have been successful in implementing a playable foundation, I require financial support to complete the implementation of my design.  I am motivated to create a great game for the community, my career, and to dedicate to my best friend, who passed away from cancer in 2008:  Starcraft: Broodwar 'Use Map Settings' games were a platform for many positive and constructive experiences we shared, and I would like to contribute a similar platform for other gamers.  I provide this context to illustrate the breadth, and magnitude of motivation I have to create a quality product... this game matters to me both objectively, and emotionally.

What BloodBath is, and How To Play.

Funding Goals

  • New cards and heroes utilizing the new Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void units.
  • Implementation of Zerg cards and heroes (already designed).
  • At the start of the game, you select a booster; a small set of spell cards to accentuate the strategic capacity of your deck.
  • Two new maps providing fresh and exciting battlefields.
  • A Bloodbath Open Tournament will be held to celebrate its release.
  • A Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void Showmatch Night will also take place... because watching pro starcraft is awesome.

    • Coding the cards is not as easy as it may appear.  This is because the galaxy editor does not directly facilitate the object-orientation required to digitally represent a card.  In the code, cards work like a series of dominoes; aligned sequential events.  This means it can take hours to implement one card, but it is worth the effort, because of the beautiful unit control the engine offers. 

    Level 1 Release:  December 2015

  • Every Hero has the capacity to gain experience and level-up.  WC3-Style revival.
  • Data editor wizards will revise the hero abilities to suit their original designs.
  • Four new maps providing fresh and exciting battlefields.
  • The SC2: LotV Showmatch Night is upgraded to a Tournament.
  • A high-quality, heavy metal soundtrack, comprised of epic guitar riffs and thunderous war drums, sets the the atmosphere for Bloodbath.

    • *If this level is reached, I will pay a data editor to assist in creating the best possible set of heroes for Bloodbath.  I have designed many unique and tactically dynamic abilities, but their implementation is best suited for someone specialized in data editing (my speciality is triggers).

    External to gaming, my friends generally come from music.  Because of this I have communication with many quality metal bands, with the willingness, skills, and diversity in style to provide a complete custom soundtrack for Bloodbath.

    Level 2 Release:  December 2015

  • Players can join "Drafts":  Mini, automated tournaments in which players battle with decks constructed from booster packs.
  • Play 2v2's where you and your ally share a turn, but have separate decks.
  • Observes can watch and broadcast matches with access to in-game information and statistics.
  • All cards are ranked like the Starcraft 2 Ladder, to facilitate appropriate distribution in booster packs during drafts.
  • The SC2: LotV Tournament is expanded!
  • A high-quality, heavy metal soundtrack, comprised of epic guitar riffs and thunderous war drums, sets the the atmosphere for Bloodbath.

    • A draft is the optimal format for strategic variation in card games.  Engage in all permutations of possible micro scenarios, as drafts result in unique, custom decks.  Learn more about the draft format here:  https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Magic:_The_Gather...

    Level 3 Release:  January 2016   

  • Create your own decks to be accessed whenever you play!
  • Unlock special cards from playing, to accentuate your custom decks.
  • Win booster packs in drafts; the fastest way to expand your card pool.
  • Blizzard's Warcraft 3 assets are utilized to implement WCS heroes and cards!
  • Bloodbath has an online ladder; see how you and your deck stack up.
  • 8 maps, in conjunction with custom decks, and a wide array of game modes, results in premium replayability:  A consistently dynamic gameplay experience. 


    • My current goal is to develop Bloodbath to this level.  It is my dream to contribute a game of this depth and replayability.  If you share in the excitement and interest, with regards to the concept, design, and future of Bloodbath, please assist in funding its further development.

    These levels of funding are the minimum required to establish the offered additions.  Any contributions beyond these levels result in an exponential increase in quality/refinement of such additions.  More resources allow me to recruit additional artists, developers, and data wizards to create a pristine, professional contribution towards the SC2: Legacy of the Void community.

    Level 4 Release:  February 2016

    Contribution Perks

    [$5]  Supporter Screen

    Be immortalized in Bloodbath:

    The victory screen randomly pulls supporters' usernames (and optional message) from a database, to be dispayed to the players.

    Your message can be anything... even a link!  Share a website, live stream, or perhaps your mother's craigslist ad.

    [$12]  Bloodbath Coaster

    Bloodbath pairs optimally with Irish Whiskey.

    Unleash the fury, while preserving your desk's surface.

    Includes: Supporter Screen

    [$25]  Custom Starting Hero Skin

    Users who support to this level will be distinguished in game, 

    as their starting hero will have aesthetic variations relative to the default version 

    Includes: Coaster + Supporter Screen

    [$50]  Bloodbath T-Shirt

    Wear the Bloodbath logo and channel the fury of your micro in your general existence.

    Includes: Custom Hero Skin + Coaster + Supporter Screen 

    [$100]  Personalized(Username) Bloodbath Etched Shotglass

    Drink some whiskey, tequila, or the blood/tears of your enemy... whatever you're into.

    The bloodbath logo, in addition to your username 

    will be professionally etched into the shotglass.

    Includes: Custom Hero Skin + Coaster + Supporter Screen 

    There are other, limited perks available.

    If you like Bloodbath, but don't have the capacity to contribute financially, please share the trailer with your friends.  Thanks and have fun!

story:
Hey everyone. I Am Lucid. I am 16 years old starting out what I want to be my career. I am from Florida in the United States. I started YouTube because I really enjoy gaming and I also really enjoy lifting people up and making their day better. So I started YouTube wanting to do those things as a job.
     God gave me a talent so  I started a youtube channel to put out content just because the first video I ever made was pretty fun to do. So then I just kept on doing it. I have a passion for this sort of thing.
        I didn't want to get stuck with a boring 9-5 job. So I decided I would try my luck at YouTube. It got discouraging at times but then there were people that told me not to let anything discourage me.. As I started watching my analytics I saw that if I were to lose one subscriber I would always gain like three. So it didn't discourage me anymore.
        I love making videos. It is so much fun. So I'm going to keep on producing content. I hope to make my passion my job. If you would like to support me in this journey I would be very appreciative. If I reach my goal I will be able to efficiently start YouTube and be able to actually make a difference. There are so many things I need, but all of them cost so much. 

       I put my goal as 5000 dollars, which wouldn't actually get me everything I need, but it would get me a lot of the things needed in YouTubing. I need a good computer that can not only record and stream, but also play games, I need an xbox console seeing as how I record Xbox one gameplay too, I need cameras, microphones, monitors, a desk, headphones, editing software, recording software, photoshop software, games, lightening equipment, green screen, gaming peripherals, sound dampening items, and some more. If you help support me I do have perks that you can receive, some of my merch items, a personal thank you, a shoutout, things like that.

         Your Contribution will help me in my journey on YouTube. You will be not only affecting my life, but also the thousands of people hat watch my videos in the years to come. You will help lift people up and make people have a good day. You will also help me pursue my passion as a career.  

        There are other ay to help rather than money. I get it, you may not have money to donate, and that is one hundred percent ok. Don't feel bad. You ca help in other ways. You can subscribe to my youtube channel by using the link in my bio, you can sread the word bout this campaign, and you can follow me on social media. You can help in may ways besides financially.

story:
Battle Tank Arena is a highly strategic, 2 acre indoor arena that puts 20 tanks and drivers in fierce combat against each other for a 20 minute battle.

 

       The game gets more intense with every 3 hits you take because your speed and firing capability drops one percent, while that doesn't seem like much at first, you soon realize that you need everything you have to survive the twenty minute battle. Are you the prey or the predator?

 

This game was created by John Kennedy. Battle Tank Arena is the collection of 4 years of research and design and it brings together movies, video games, simulators and actual tanks that are designed for a real intense arena gaming experience that has never before been created like this and because of this we started this Indiegogo campaign because we can't build this without you.

So if you're into military tank battles, video games, amusement rides or alien death rays, please help us bring this game to life.  We think you'll love it as much as we do.

 

HOW IT WORKS

You climb into a tank, drive onto the arena

and shoot to disable other tanks without getting disabled yourself!

 

With a top speed around 5-7 mph and 400-500 rounds of RFID ammo, you target enemy tank sensors while protecting your own.

Tank to tank communications and a full field of view of what's in front of you displayed on a 30" display screen.

  • Fully enclosed inside your battle tank while you drive and shoot.
  • 500 rounds of RFID encoded ammo so you know when you actually score a hit!
  • Lots of target sensors so you better keep moving!
  •  
  •  
  • Don't watch a tank battle movie. Drive, shoot and decide the outcome!
  •  

We wanted to put this project on Indiegogo because it's the fastest way for us to get Battle Tank Arena off the drawing board and into your hands.  We think the arena will be great, but we need your help making it a reality.

So, if a world full of weaponized arena battle tanks with RFID ammo is a world you want to live in, please back this project and help us build this game. 

 

  • What we need to build our working prototype is $100,000. This will allow our Research and Development company to design and build our electric battle tank from completed CAD designs to a working driving and shooting battle tank complete with sensor and targeting software that will integrate with all the tanks in the arena for the scoring and damage . This will allow us to begin production of 40 battle tanks for the arena.

 

  • Our research and development company's manufacturing facility in China, is a high-tech state of the art production facility that will produce our arena tanks from RFID sensors to  tread system to a completed arena battle tank that will roll off the line with 43 others to give us our complete complement of tanks at our facility in South Carolina.

 

 

  • What You Get:
  • GREAT REWARDS, be sure to click on the perks to see what incredible deals come with each perk!
  • You get arena game cards on special collectable crowdfunder cards.
  • The top two perks also offer a signed thankyou from the creator for backing the project.
  • Beta test our arena tanks for up to 45 days before we open to the public. (notifications when all productions tanks are ready to test will be sent out to all crowdfunders)
  • Higher level rewards will be on special limited metal game cards that will offer even crazier perks.
  • We will also be offering a special perk, the full size mock-up as our top reward for creating the prototype. 
  • Once the final blueprints from the prototype are generated, we will no longer need the prototype and will give it away at our grand opening in a drawing from all our crowdfunders for a lucky crowdfunder to take home where they can drive and shoot in their own backyard!
  •  

The Impact

  • No more Ferris wheels, roller coasters or bumper cars as the top form of amusement.
  • The next generation of interactive gaming you have been waiting for.
  • With our patents already pending for the Battle tanks and arena center, we will be the ONLY amusement center in the world that has an actual tank arena where you along with  19 other people show off your skill and tactics as tank commanders by disabling the enemies tanks!
  • Only YOU will bring the battle tank and the arena to life as an amusement center.
  • Now we can bring you a new form of fun and excitement for the whole family that isn't a video game or another been there, done that theme park. Help us bring you the action and adventure that you deserve and have only dreamed about.
  • We will start our first arena in the U.S, our second facility will be in London. 

Risks & Challenges

Production of the arena is simple once our prototype is completed. The biggest challenge for us is getting the prototype to operate 12 hours on a single charge with a 250lb occupant, but our R&D company are confident they will get that mastered so we don't have to waste time changing out batteries. Our research and development company tells us that either way we can have our working prototype within 50 days so then its on to full production of our arena tanks!

Our main challenge left on the prototype though is financial, that is why we came to Indiegogo, because here is where the community helps the creative seed grow into the reality tree.

We have already been in contact with our suppliers for our perks to make sure that no matter how many people pledge, everyone gets their perks quickly after the campaign ends,  we don't want this to be a campaign where you spend the next six months to two years getting fifty emails about production updates and delays. If you back this project, we want you to feel assured that your tank perk package will come within 30 days of campaign completion (exception is shipping of the mockup perk, see perk shipping details for mockup). This is why we're not offering multibeam laser weapons or crazy complicated reward tiers that would make the distribution process take unreasonably long.  We're keeping it as simple as possible: support our project and in return we'll send you the tank perks of your choosing as fast as possible, you deserve at least that much for supporting us!

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Not everyone will be able to fund us but that is ok too. If you still want to see this Battle Tank Arena amusement center created then help spread the word and make Battle Tank Arena go viral! You spreading the word on our project is just as powerful your money could be!
  • Battle Tank Arena was envisioned and brought this far for YOU to enjoy, lets finish this by bringing the arena across the finish line.
  • Use the share tools to help spread the word because if you don't, then this will just be a dream, never a reality!

Only YOU will bring the battle tank and the arena to life as an amusement center.
Now we can bring you a new form of fun and excitement for the whole family that isn't a video game or another been there, done that theme park. Help us bring you the action and adventure that you deserve and have only dreamed about.
We will start our first arena in the U.S, our second facility will be in London. 


Risks & Challenges
Production of the arena is simple once our prototype is completed. The biggest challenge for us is getting the prototype to operate 12 hours on a single charge with a 250lb occupant, but our R&D company are confident they will get that mastered so we don't have to waste time changing out batteries. Our research and development company tells us that either way we can have our working prototype within 50 days so then its on to full production of our arena tanks!
Our main challenge left on the prototype though is financial, that is why we came to Indiegogo, because here is where the community helps the creative seed grow into the reality tree.
We have already been in contact with our suppliers for our perks to make sure that no matter how many people pledge, everyone gets their perks quickly after the campaign ends,  we don't want this to be a campaign where you spend the next six months to two years getting fifty emails about production updates and delays. If you back this project, we want you to feel assured that your tank perk package will come within 30 days of campaign completion (exception is shipping of the mockup perk, see perk shipping details for mockup). This is why we're not offering multibeam laser weapons or crazy complicated reward tiers that would make the distribution process take unreasonably long.  We're keeping it as simple as possible: support our project and in return we'll send you the tank perks of your choosing as fast as possible, you deserve at least that much for supporting us!

Other Ways You Can Help
 

Not everyone will be able to fund us but that is ok too. If you still want to see this Battle Tank Arena amusement center created then help spread the word and make Battle Tank Arena go viral! You spreading the word on our project is just as powerful your money could be!

Battle Tank Arena was envisioned and brought this far for YOU to enjoy, lets finish this by bringing the arena across the finish line.
Use the share tools to help spread the word because if you don't, then this will just be a dream, never a reality!

story:
Download the demo here: https://lockecole88.itch.io/dojo-master

My Story

Ever since I was young, I wanted to create games for a living. Starting out with pen & paper adventures in Dungeons & Dragons and moving on to the StarCraft map editor got my feet wet in programming, and now years later, I am a professional Web Developer! I may have missed the mark a bit on the type of Developer I became, but I still am passionate about games, and like to work on creating my own in my spare time. My biggest problem is that I don't have a lot of spare time, and I still have lots of bills to pay! Despite that, last November, I spent a month making game for a Game Jam, and I loved it! (game programming is much more fun than web programming) Dojo Master is the product of that jam, and the demo here is a polished up version of what I submitted.

My goal of this campaign isn't just to raise funds, but to try and raise awareness and see how interested people are in my game. I received a lot of positive feedback from people (and not just friends and family, but random Internet strangers! The most important people in the world!) and would really like to continue working on this project to really flesh it out. Unfortunately, I am going at a snails pace now because I don't have any funding, and I am too afraid to risk going all out on it as if it doesn't pan out, then I'll be out of a home!

Anybody who contributes to this project will not only be helping in turning this demo into a full game, but will be part of a community! I want people to really be a part of this game, and have a part of it for them!  You don't even have to contribute money to the project either, I'm all about giving perks to people who help just by spreading the word as well (more on that below). So I hope you'll play the demo, like what you play, and want to contribute in whatever way you can. I think you'll like what you get for contributing as well!

What We Need & What You Get

I set a flexible goal of $12,000 for this campaign. This is to cover expenses for a 4-month period to get the game into a full beta state: main game complete, but playtesting will be needed for combat balance and bug-finding. And by expenses, I mean allowing me to work full-time on this project and commissioning for things like art and music. Should the entire goal not be met, that will just slow things down. My estimated 4 months beta completion could become anywhere from 6 - 12 months based on how much is raised. BUT, if a lot of positive feedback and hype is raised, that might be enough incentive for me to bite the bullet, max out my credit cards, and hope for the best (i.e that I won't lose my home and be put in crippling debt... more crippling debt... I still got 2 years of student loans to pay off).

Okay, but now for the fun part: THE PERKS! If you do decide to help fund the project, you will be a part of the game in some way! That's right, a piece of you will be coded into the game - perhaps you will make a smarmy student, a legendary weapon, a badass enemy, or a rando NPC who can't find the bathroom! The possibilities are limitless! (note: possibilities are not limitless, and are based on how much funding and/or how much hype you generate)

Your Impact

Your help in this project will bring to life a new Dojo Management RPG, and isn't that actually a kind of unique game? (Please let me know if there are any games like this out there. I would like to play them) And if the game does well, you just helped usher in a new indie game studio! Good job! You'll be making dreams come true, and gamers like yourself very happy!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest obstacle is time - I have gotten pretty good at estimating project lengths during the 8+ years I've been a Web Developer, but depending on the amount of money raised and unforseen life circumstances occurring, this project could take a bit of time to turn from demo into full game. I am confident that if funding meets its goal, that I will reach a full beta in 4 months time. I will be making frequent updates here and in my dev log on itch.io to keep you all up-to-date on what's happening.

Other Ways You Can Help

So, if you like this project, funding is great, but getting the word out there is just as important! And I don't want anyone who can't fund to be left out of the community building aspect of this, so perks are available to those who promote the game across social media as well! Make some noise on the facebooks, twitters, instagrams, and myspaces (whatever the kids are using these days) - tell your friends and family in the "real world" - tell your favorite "influencer" and have them spread the word!

  • Be sure to use the IndieGoGo Share Tools (located to the right of the "Back It" and "Follow" buttons near the top of the page) to get the best tracking results for your referrals! Much like the backer perks, the more money your referrals bring in, the better perk YOU will get! Each referral dollar you bring in counts a 50 cents towards a perk you will get, up to the "Create a NPC" tier.
  • If you don't care about getting that granular and tracking all those referral results, just take a screenshot (and you can blur out any names or personal details in the screenshot) of your tweet or facebook post (or whatever), and send it to dojo_master@catcastlegames.com and you will get to "Name a Student"

Community

I have created a subreddit /r/dojo_master/ where people can post stories, screenshots, critiques, ideas, or just to talk about Dojo Master! I'd especially love to hear If you have ideas for things you'd like to see in the game, bugs & glitches you encounter, and your critiques both good and bad! People who are active in the community and contribute in a meaningful way will receive additional perks - not sure exactly what they will be, and unlike referrals which can be tracked, it will be based on my subjective view of things - but if you're actively contributing in some way, I'll get you something!

Future of the Game

The demo is just a glimpse of things to come, in the full game expect:

  • At least 5 more dojos to fight as part of the main story (and maybe some SECRET dojos???)
  • A story full of intrigue, drama, and comedy!
  • Better and more procedurally generated quests & content
  • more weapons, armors, items, many more abilities, and generally more things to do
  • ability to send your students on quests and "Training Excursions" so that they can learn new skills and level up in different ways (if they don't die)
  • Mini-games for cooking and blacksmithing
  • Who knows? Other features based on community feedback!
