story:
Survival is a basic human instinct and also the key component of Swipe Chapters: Fallen Mankind. Can you make moral and ethical decisions with severe consequences? Are you ready to sacrifice everything for the greater good? These are the questions you will find the answers for during multiple playthroughs of the game.

In our singleplayer mobile-optimized game you can swipe in the four basic directions to move, do actions, find loot or even fight in the encounters. When you die - and trust us you will die many times - you will gain experience from your previous lives and in the next game you might travel a bit farther away. Over time you will remember which event does what effect on your character but just when you think you know everything, something unexpected happens and you die again. But dont worry, we give you rewards and achievements everytime you find something new on this brutal world.

 

Swipe Chapters: Fallen Mankind is not a lighthearted, family-friendly story. All the narratives, the conversations with other characters and other lore materials deepen the connection with this savage and unforgiving world. We wanted to create a mature storyline for adult gamers, who love challenging and hardcore plays. You are a survivor of the old world, your primary task is to get supplies to your colony, and exploration of the new world driven by curiosity. Not only natural anomalies, mutated living creatures, traps, diseases are a danger to the player but also survivors of other factions.

We drew inspiration from many other creation like Reigns, Fallout, The Binding of Isaac, Mad Max, Stalker and so on. We love these works and we are greatly passionate about creating a similarly spectacular living world.

Which way is the safest to the next supplies? Can I eat that thing on the ground that looks so tasty? Can I make room for another valuable loot to trade with the Nomads if I drop my secondary weapon?

All these decisions are up to you, and every step you make is going to lead towards different consequences, and finally you will see multiple endings of the storyline depending on the path you have chosen during your endeavours. Hidden behind the scenes, a point based system is monitoring everything about your game actions. You gain alignment score for your behavior in different situations and gain honor or hatred points from faction members. When certain circumstances are met, you will get new event cards as a result of your previous decisions.

The basic game mechanics are about surviving in the wild. You have to keep the balance of your main stats: health, hunger, thirst and supplies. If any of these drops to zero, you will suffer the conditions.

There are numerous secondary stats like strength, agility, endurance, intelligence, luck, fame, and alignment points. Each of these stats are gained or lost by card decisions, and lets you choose which way to develop your character. When finding some loot, you can decide to pick it up and manage the simplified inventory.

The basic combat mechanism is similar to the other elements of the game. You can swipe in different directions to take actions, like attack, counterattack (reflect), use special abilities or items from your inventory.

Swipe Chapters: Fallen Mankind awaits you with many encounters on the road that lies beneath your feet. You can solve some of these peacefully, but mostly you will have to fight for your victory. To populate these desolate lands we are creating diverse factions, who have their own motives, lifestyles, habits and goals. Each one of the faction members has their own statistics, some of them always try to trade, others want to eat you. There are a range of options to choose from like talking, trading, gambling or flirting... and if these are not sufficient for your playstyle, you can always fight your way through the world.

 Survivors: You are not the one and only Looter on the surface world. Before you, there were many other members of your community going through the wilderness.

 Nomads: These people are the desert raiders, the looter kings who would sell their own mother for a more shiny loot.

 Wildlife: The surface world has its own mutated and evolutionary developed creatures and vegetation.

 Butchers: Almost like animals, they only have basic instincts like to breathe, to eat, and to f*ck. They believe in blood and bones, and many of them are cannibals.
 Coalition: The remains of the strong military groups after the Great Cataclysm. They have the power and knowledge to create their own society with strict rules and rationed supplies. 

Our Artist has created a breathtaking art style to give life to our project. We are planning to make more than 150 unique and different card graphics with many filters and card animations. Not just cards, but other elements like UIs are a crucial part of the game’s graphics design process. We want to give players a full and consistent view of all aspects. So what is our recipe for a good card design? Check these before-after images to understand our design steps.

We also love long gameplays but if you have only a few minutes to play with Swipe Chapters: Fallen Mankind, you'll still have plenty of fun. Gameplay-wise there are random generated cards and a complex diverse story with different consequences to lengthen the gametime. When the game has ended, you can play again and create more random factors to achieve more goals. In order to increase the replayability factor we include gaming elements such as difficulty levels, multiple endings, unlockable characters with unique traits, card-fitted filters that give new experiences by altering the known mechanics, regular free DLCs, daily and monthly level challenges.

We have been aim to avoid one of the biggest disadvantage of today's mobile games and thrown out the whole energy system so there is nothing to break the constant gaming experience. The game will analyze all of your playthroughs so you can see all the previous awards and statistics before playing again. Of course we implement easy, hard and hidden achievements and highscores for players who love collecting and sharing their results on social profiles.

  1. Start - The initial start of our campaign
  2. First Steps - When we reach our first 150 dollars
    • Reward: Highly detailed desktop and mobile wallpapers in different formats for Everybody.
  3. Rusher's End - All the limited 150 Rusher perks is sold
    • Reward: Special Avatars and Digital Badges for all Rusher perk owners.
  4. Echoes of the Past - Reach 1.000 backers
    • Reward: The Original Soundtrack for all the Survivor perk owners.
  5. Lost Treasure - Reach all the Social Goals
    • Reward: Digital downloadable Art Book in PDF format to all Lore Master perk owners.
  6. Bright Peak - When the campaign is 100% funded
    • Reward: The final game will be relaesed on Android, iOS, and browser to All perk owners.
  7. Beyond the Veil - It will become available soon
    • Reward: ?????

Our Social goals are simple. When we reach one of the Social Milestones we unlock that achievement and give the reward below it. Check out this detailed guide to learn more.

We want to add a lot of cool features to the final game. Check out this list all of our game elements.

  • More than 150 card designs, with handmade unique art-style
  • Explore a primitive and cruel world with random generated events
  • Narrative storyline with deep lore elements and secrets to find
  • Fast-paced action gameplay
  • Roguelike elements, character progress, combat, trading and inventory management
  • Varied NPC factions, each one of them has their own goals
  • Multiple endings from different decisions & consequences
  • Various playable characters with special passive and active traits
  • Different difficulty levels with ending score multipliers
  • Unlockable achievements, earn all of them to open up some rewards
  • Highscores with daily and monthly challenges to compete with other players
  • Endless replayability, different experience with every playthrough
  • Microtransaction and ads free
  • Regular content drops, with new cards and previous bugfixes
  • Free DLC's, with new stories to tell
  • Atmospheric soundtrack and audio
  • And much more to come...

We also ask you all to please share your creative ideas. So send them to us via email or fill out the Ask a Question form on the top of this site.

Bright Hobo Studio is a small Hungarian indie developer team. The passion and creativity comes from our alliance and the desire to create an extraordinary game for mobile platforms. Most of the time when we think of mobile gaming it's the casual games that comes to our minds. And of course when people are browsing the Play Store, the games they find are often poorly designed, include a lot of grinding, filled with microtransactions or just simply repetitive and boring.

That's what we want to change by creating quality mobile games. Ok, but why mobile? Because it is one of the most popular platforms of today and narrative based gameplay just fits it very well. Our team not designed for only one game, we plan to make a franchise out of it. We are currently at the beginning of our development phase and everything you see in the campaign is from the Alpha version. The final version may be different from what you see here, so everything is a subject to change. So we believe in ourselves and we ask You to put Your faith in us as well. You are not going to regret it!

Our team left to right:
Gábor Németh (developer),
Balázs Szöllősi (story),
and Manó Megyeri (art) - a grumpy dude because he can’t grow a beard

Although the game is primarily developed for Android, but we want to expand it and make the game available for iOS and PC, depending on the success of the campaign. After the release the game will be available trough Play Store and App Store, or alternatively you can play them on a PC through a browser. Over time, it will be also release on Steam and other digital distribution platforms for greater publicity.

   

We believe in community power and the greatness of crowdsourcing. The total incoming amount of the campaign funds will be spent on developing the game. We are still in the early stages of development, spending $1,700 and 2 months of planning so far. To finish the final game we need Your support to bring our dream to life. We decided to launch a fixed-goal campaign so that the game will be finished only if we have the full financial security for creating a high quality product. If our campaign does not meet its goal by the deadline, all the backers will be refunded by Indiegogo within 5-7 business days. This chart will tell about the segments of the income distribution.

 

We would like to provide different options for a greater scalability for everyone. With each bundle you receive special digital rewards when the delivery time comes. As you see below the Rusher perk is the only Early Bird that has quantity limitations. When that reaches 150 units it will be deactivated and will be unavailable after that. Every other package will be available until the end of the campaign. So let's see the detailed perk list and the digital rewards for every price tag.

For additional information you can visit us on our official website. Don't you want to miss out on the latest news, consider subscribing to our newsletter.

If you want to like and follow us or to share our campaign via your own social feeds, please follow these links. We need all the possible help to reach our goal, so every message, like, share, tweet, subscribe, comment or reaction is useful to us. Thank you guys! ❤

story:
MECHANICS 

Based upon mechanics designed by Origins-awards winner Alessio Cavatore (Warhammer, Bolt Action, Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game, Terminator Genisys the miniatures game, etc.) The Hunt for Red October uses double sided POSSUB (possible submarine) tokens to allow players to keep the location of their submarines hidden. Players will need to use ASW (anti submarine warfare) technology and tactics to determine the location of their enemies’ subs whilst outmanoeuvring their fleet in order to win. Check out the video below for a short run through of a turn!


THE HUNT
The hunt scenario lets players play through the 1990 masterpiece, one side as Marko Ramius and the other as the entirety of the soviet Navy. Is the Red Fleet enough to stop one silent submarine? Each turn the Red October will travel secretly across the board trying to reach either the American coast or a NATO ship if they can can convince them that they are trying to defect. Both sides are racing against the clock to achieve victory before the DEFCON counter reaches 1 and both players lose the biggest game of chicken in history. 

Each game relies on timing, tactical positioning and excellent bluffing skills with Marko Ramius having the tactical edge with his many abilities and cards, use them all too early however and the Red Fleet will have no trouble finding your beleaguered sub, too late and... well, it will be too late.

THE WAR

In the wargame scenario, each player plays as either the Red Fleet or combined NATO forces trying to win by scoring 40 points that represent their superpower's strategic advantage over the other side. Points are scored in two ways, either by destroying enemy units or by moving your SSBNs (Ballistic missile submarines) into first strike positions. The position of both SSBNs and attack subs is a valuable resource that is kept secret through the use of POSSUB tokens, when moving your subs you can place these tokens down to mask your movements and your intentions. 

When you have moved your navy into the perfect strike position you can flip the scan and fire token to blast your opponent to the bottom of the sea, be warned however that your opponent will be looking to do the same and he who fires first can be at a huge advantage.

The War scenario lets players recreate that 'what if', throwing NATO against the Soviet Navy and seeing whether one side can secure victory before nuclear war is declared and the whole world loses.


STATS 

Approximate Playtime: 60-120 minutes

Suggested age: 14+ 

Number of players: 2

Genre: strategy 

GOALS


RISKS AND CHALLENGES 

Although of course there are risks and challenges to any new endeavour, the foreseeable obstacles on this project are small. We have run several successful crowd funding campaigns before, delivering on time, and are confident that we will be able to deliver this exciting new game on time and with a high production standard.

story:
Pycel is a strategic board game based on the original snakes and ladders. Aside from only using a rolling die, we totally created the whole new way of playing. We use cards instead of dice, we use strategy instead of luck! In Pycel, the snakes and ladders are changed into the movable arrows, which you can move them wherever you want. There are 4 different level of cards. All the cards, boards, and items are carefully designed based on modern material design.

Number of player: 2-6 players

Time: 15-60 minutes

Age: 8+


  • Note: All materials in our video are just the prototype. 
  • The size of board and cards are 297x297mm and 63x88mm respectively.

“Learn how to play in just 30 seconds”

Rules are simple, everyone can learn and play in less than a half minute (but to win would take more than that).

  1. Whoever travel to the center first wins.

  2. To move your token or do actions, you use cards.

  3. To use cards, you pay coins.

  4. To pay coins, you passively collect 2 coins each turn or step on specific paths.

  5. Have fun!


Our Board

The first revolution is our board. In the original board, you have to walk in a zigzag way and sometimes you have to look at the numbers to see whether you have to go left or right. In our material designed board, it is much simpler, you just walk in clockwise direction! There will be 3 kinds of  special paths on the board, more coins, more actions, and draw star level cards.


There are also totems and arrows which will be explained below. For Special Edition Pycel, the board will be made of metal and all tokens, arrows, and totems of will have a magnet attached in the bottom in order for nice contacting with the board and preventing any unintentionally movements. No more problem of accidentally hit the table and all tokens are dislocated.


Cards

Cards are the most important part of Pycel. To win this game, you have to wisely use those cards to walk in the right position, knock down your lovely friends, and find the fastest way to travel to the center. There are 4 level of cards; level 1, level 3, level 5, and star level.


“Controlling your movement”

Level  1 - contains 1 to 6 faces of the dice. Use them to move on your desirable path.


“Using special powers”

Level 3 - action cards, one time use only.


“Flip the situation”

Level 5 - continuous cards, pay coins to use their effects.


“Unpredictable”

Star level - randomly good and bad cards according to your situation.



Three of each Level 1,3, and 5 cards will be face up beside the board, so you can choose which cards you want to buy. If your desired cards are not there, you can choose to buy an ambiguous face down card from the deck but with the special card. You can buy cards for yourself or for preventing others to get them. For the star cards, when you stop on a star path, a star card will be drawn.



Coins

“Plan your strategies according to your resources”

You will get coins from a certain income, certain paths, and ‘maybe’ from a star level card. Use them prudently in order to win the game. During your turn, you get 2 coins as an income. Then, to use cards, you need to pay for it. The costs of cards are indicated in their levels, for example, you have to pay 3 coins to buy one level 3 card, 5 coins for one level 5 card. When you stop on the more coins path, take 3 coins.




Items

“Go up, down or bounce back”

There are 2 kinds of items on the board; arrows and totems.

Arrows - Once your token stops on the path where an arrow's tail lays on, your token immediately warps to the path that its arrow's head lays on. The arrows can also be moved around the board by using a card effect. So you can move them to your desired path, to move your token up, or to move others down. There are 3 different sizes of arrows; short, medium, and long. Two arrows of each size will be placed on the board, total of 6 arrows.

Totems - There will be 3 totems in the board. Totems act like the barriers. If your token must move beyond the totem, it bounces back. For instance, if a totem is 2 steps ahead of your token and you play 6 steps card, your token moves 2 steps forward then bounces back 4 steps. The only way to walk over the totem is to stop just right on its path. After that, that totems is yours, you can move it wherever you want on the board (my advice is to move it to block your friends path). There is also an action card that you can use to move a totem.


Magnetic tokens and metal board

From $49 or more purchased, you will get a metal polished surface finish board and all magnetic based tokens, arrows, and totems. 

.......................................................................



Card list**

Level 1 (42 cards)

  • Face 1 dice card - move 1 step forward x 7

  • Face 2 dice card - move 2 step forward x 7

  • Face 3 dice card - move 3 step forward x 7

  • Face 4 dice card - move 4 step forward x 7

  • Face 5 dice card - move 5 step forward x 7

  • Face 6 dice card - move 6 step forward x 7


Level 3 (40 cards)

  • Freedom Trail - You can choose how many steps to walk, from 1-9 steps.

  • Blade Master - Activate when you stop on the same path with other token(s), kill those tokens.

  • Thug Life - Take a lv.1 or lv.3 used/unused card from another player.

  • The holy Priest - Move 1 arrow.

  • Get high - Jump up 1 respective level.

  • Shield Up(#) - Your tokens, cards, and coins, are protected from any card effects.

  • Double (#) - The value of a dice card is doubled.

  • We will ! We will! Rock you! (#) - Move 1 totem.

Level 5  (30 cards)

  • Keep walking - At the beginning of your turns, you can choose to move your token 1-3 steps forward. If you do, at the end of your turn, move it back by that amount of step(s).

  • King of Action - Pay 2 coins. Your action limit per turn is increased by 1 for this turn only.

  • King of arrows - Pay 3 coins to move an arrow.

  • King of No! (#) - Pay 3 coins to negate the effect of a card.

  • Moonwalk (#) - Pay 1 coin to make 1 of your dice to have negative value or 3 coins for others.

  • Twin Tokens - Pay 3 coins to summon another token.*

  • King of Gu - Once per turn, pay 2 coins to randomly pick a level 3 card.

  • Bustin Volt  - Pay 1 coin to triple the value of a dice card.

Star Level (20 cards)

  • Swap! - Swap your position with another player.

  • Millions - Next turn, your dice result is applied to all players.

  • More Choice - Re-shuffle row(s) of cards of your choice..

  • 50:50 - Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, double your coins. If you call it wrong, you lose all coins.

  • Meet the key of Nature! - Go straight until you meet the first arrow, totem, or mystery room

  • It’s time for renovation - All the arrows on the board are rotated 180 degree.


(#) indicates that the card can be used at any time, not only your turn. For instance you can use ‘Double’ to prevent other players from stopping on his planned path.

*When playing with more than 1 token, when you use cards that affect token(s), you can either choose to apply to a single token or all of your tokens.

**All cards’ details are subject to change with prior notice.




“More than a simple way to play”


Passive skills mode (indiegogo exclusive)

Everyone will get a random God cards, each have a special ability. The God cards use no actions and cannot be neglected or blocked. When playing with God cards, the way the each player plays will be changed. These are the examples of God cards.

  • God of treasure - You can skip your action phase to take 3 coins.

  • God of thief - When you walk pass a player, take 2 coins from that player. If you stop on the same path, take 3 instead.

  • God of Save point  -  Pay 2 coin to mark your current path as a same point. You can pay 3 coins to warp to any save point.

  • God of Bomb - Pay 4 coins to mark a box. The first person who walks pass on that box is killed.

.......................................................................





$29 - Receive a box of Pycel (1 normal board + 6 arrows + 6 tokens + 3 totems + 50 coins and 130+ cards).

$49 - Receive a box of special Pycel edition (1 metal board, all arrows, tokens, and totems are converted to magnetic ones, 50 coins, 130+ cards) in a special price!

$69 - Receive a box of special Pycel edition + 1 selected T-shirt + 1 Pycel Artbook consisting of all our development stories and art works!





$20000 - Secret identity mode - each player will be assigned a character. No one know other players’ character. Each character will have a secret mission.The player who can finish his mission first will win the game.


$50000 - Cursed totem mode - This is the last man stand mode. There will be an extra totem which is the cursed totem. Any player who touch or stop on the same path as the cursed totem will be eliminated. In this mode, at the beginning of the game, the cursed totem will be put at the starting point and all player tokens will be put at the finishing point. The cursed totem is moving inward at the rate of 3 steps for each player turn. The paths that the cursed totem have moved over are also cursed, which means that any tokens that travel to the path that the cursed totem already passed are also eliminated. In this mode, the players can choose to move their tokens forward or backward and any cards that affect normal totems have no effect with the cursed one.


$100000 - Party game mode - Remove all coins from play, all cards have no costs, no face up cards, the action limit per turn is expanded to 2. Each player draw 2 cards from each pile. At each player turn, draw 2 more cards from any piles of your choice and play as normally. To use level 5 cards, pay them with level 1 cards that have equal or higher number of steps than number of coins required. For example, in normal mode, to use a king of arrow card effect, you have to pay 2 coins. In this mode, you have to sacrifice one of face 2,3,4,5,or 6 dice cards. To be more fun, the additional cards below will be added.

  • Flip the Board!! - Discard all your cards, skip your next turn. Starting point is now Finishing point and vice versa. All dice have negative values. You may not use this card if there are any tokens at Start.

  • 3rd round lucky - At the beginning of your 3rd turn after the activation of this card, whoever is in the most front position goes back to the start.

  • Brain control - This turn only, take control of another player token.

  • SphILF’s punishment - Choose a player, that player skips his next turn.

  • Give them to me - Swap your cards with any player.

  • God of Fortune - Once per turn, you can look the top card of 1 card pile

  • Your choice - Draw 3 cards. Select 2 cards and add them to your hand, and give the other card to the person on your left.





If you have any enquiry or any comments please do not hesitate to contact us 

via e-mail: pycelgame@gmail.com 

or our Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pycelgame 

We are really appreciated for any comments and suggestions you have for improving our game. Thank you.
story_txt:
Pycel is a strategic board game based on the original snakes and ladders. Aside from only using a rolling die, we totally created the whole new way of playing. We use cards instead of dice, we use strategy instead of luck! In Pycel, the snakes and ladders are changed into the movable arrows, which you can move them wherever you want. There are 4 different level of cards. All the cards, boards, and items are carefully designed based on modern material design. Number of player: 2-6 playersTime: 15-60 minutesAge: 8+
Note: All materials in our video are just the prototype. 

The size of board and cards are 297x297mm and 63x88mm respectively.

“Learn how to play in just 30 seconds”Rules are simple, everyone can learn and play in less than a half minute (but to win would take more than that).
Whoever travel to the center first wins.
To move your token or do actions, you use cards.
To use cards, you pay coins. 
To pay coins, you passively collect 2 coins each turn or step on specific paths. 
Have fun!

Our Board
The first revolution is our board. In the original board, you have to walk in a zigzag way and sometimes you have to look at the numbers to see whether you have to go left or right. In our material designed board, it is much simpler, you just walk in clockwise direction! There will be 3 kinds of  special paths on the board, more coins, more actions, and draw star level cards.

There are also totems and arrows which will be explained below. For Special Edition Pycel, the board will be made of metal and all tokens, arrows, and totems of will have a magnet attached in the bottom in order for nice contacting with the board and preventing any unintentionally movements. No more problem of accidentally hit the table and all tokens are dislocated.

story:
Quest Hunter is inspired by such iconic games as Diablo, Planescape Torment and Baldur's Gate. But at the same time we want to make our game more casual and comfortable to be played not only on PC but also on smartphones.

 

Welcome to the Dark World. The world that is ruled by its own laws. The world where fire is the main treasure, and a shovel is a loyal friend and assistant. Here is enough trouble for villains but there's double trouble for heroes. As a hero you will have to:

  • Level up and equip yourself.
  • Win from the Dark World a place for your camp.
  • Capture the surrounding area.
  • Assemble a team of friends and helpers.
  • Build and protect your camp.
  • Destroy the insidious plans of enemies.
  • Unearth many treasures, that are buried in the oases of the wasteland.
  • Solve the main mystery of the Dark World.

And remember: you are safe only near torchlight!

The story tells us about the adventures of the pilot of the airship that crashed under mysterious circumstances. Player’s choices will influence the storyline. You will have to prevent evil plans of villains, find love and change the fate of the world of course.

Dialogues and story development of the game are inseparably linked with the completion of various puzzles and quests. Completing them, the player will be able to take a number of paths with a variety of consequences. Combats with enemies of two types, monsters and men, are intermingled in the gameplay. Each enemy type requires special combat tactics. For instance, monsters prefer sticking to darkness and are afraid of the torchlight. The player will have to use it quite often!
 

 

Character upgrade and his skills development are also an integral part of the gameplay. Plus, searching for and management of equipment, weapons and armor.
 

 

We have been working on Quest Hunter for about a year now. That’s the timeline we’ve been able to develop the game story, create the basic framework, creating quests, characters, puzzles etc. We’ve got the first hour of game along with the tutorial, five locations, several NPCs, monsters and puzzles. We’ve developed a combat system and character upgrade. At the same time, the game is being tested on mobile devices with cross platform play in mind.

Currently, we’ve passed Steam Greenlight and we’re heading for the release on Steam at high gear!

We have been creating games as an independent developer for several years. We try to make games that we would like to play! Working on the game we consider gameplay and fun much more important than sales charts. Perhaps this is why we have fallen on hard times... Gamer, we decided to ask you for assistance!

We have created the skeleton of the game and need to attach muscles to it.

What remains to be done:

  • Make the game bigger: new locations, quests and NPC's
  • More customization: new weapons and equipment
  • Greater diversity: new monsters and bosses
  • Character development: new skills and abilities
  • Provide more choice: give the player more opportunities to influence the course of events in the game
  • Even more interesting: secrets and secret zones

We need your assistance to cover all these. Our main goal is to release an interesting game and remain independent.

If the target amount is collected, we will try to adhere to the following plan:

We will not give up and will release the game! We have been living for this game for a year and nothing will break our fighting spirit!


Thank you! - A big thank you from our team! Let us shake your hand!


Digital Wallpapers Pack - You will get a pack of desktop wallpapers based on the game.


Steam copy - Get a digital key right after the release on Steam.


First Contributor - Your name in the credits as "First Contributor".


Backer - Your name in the credits as "Backer".


Beta access - Get access to the current version of the game! Follow the development progress and help us make the game better!


Beta tester - Your name will appear in the credits as "Beta Tester".


Physical Poster - Exclusive physical poster signed by development team.


Physical artbook - Get a digital copy of Art Book with colorful game arts.


Physical copy of the game - Receive a disc with the game signed for you by the game developers.


Wooden poster - Exclusive Limited Edition Wooden Poster with a colorful game art.


Your name on object in game - Your name on one of the object's in game (rock, stone, sign, grave, dead body).


Game designer - Your name will appear in the credits as "Game Designer".


Your weapon design - We’ll create a game weapon according to your description. Just describe its appearance and characteristics. It can be a sword, a club, a hayfork or something of this sort. The weapon must fit in with the game world, comply with the game mechanics and be approved by developers.


Your NPC design - We’ll create one of NPC’s based on your description. Give us its background, describe the appearance and the basic quest for the character. NPC must fit in with the game world, comply with the game mechanics and be approved by developers.


Bury the treasure - Bury the treasure chest in one of the locations. Leave a description of what is there in the chest to the lucky one who will find it. The treasure must fit in with the game world, contain the existing set of collectables, comply with the game mechanics and be approved by developers.


Grand Contributor - Your name in the credits as "Grand Contributor".


Obelisk - Your name on the Monumental Obelisk in one of the main game locations.


Thank you for support! + Exclusive digital wallpapers pack.


Limited low price! Let's Play + Your name in the credits as "First Contributor".


Digital Steam copy of the game + Exclusive digital wallpapers pack.


Became a backer! Let's Play + Your name in the credits as "Backer".


Become a pre-launch beta tester and help us to make the game better. Let's Play + Your name will appear in the credits as "Beta Tester".


Beta access + Exclusive physical poster.


1st Physical + Exclusive physical artbook.


Physical Art + Exclusive physical copy of the game.


All in One Physical + Exclusive Limited Edition Wooden Poster.


All in One Physical + Your name will appear on one of the ingame objects.


All in One Physical + Let you design one of the weapons in the game + Your name in the credits as "Game Designer".


All in One Physical + Let you design one of the ingame NPC’s + Your name in the credits as "Game Designer".


All in One Physical + Let you bury the treasure in game + Your name in the credits as "Game Designer".


All in One Physical + Your name on the Monumental Obelisk in one of the main game locations + Your name in the credits as "Grand Contributor".

2 Zombie Games is a small team of professionals and like-minded people. We’ve been working together for several years, and launched a few games on mobile devices and PC. We took part in some large MMOG projects.

The core of the team - only three people:
2D Art - Oleg Matsokin
Code and game design - Vitaliy Stavtsev
3D Art, game design and story - Dmitry Golub

We are also actively cooperating with freelancers: Art, Animation, Effects, Music, Voice-over, and Localisations.

 

Even if you are not going to help us with coin, but you like the game, feel free to use the Indiegogo sharing button at the top of the page.
You can also recommend us to friends and acquaintances using your blog or favorite social network. Don’t forget to follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Tumblr, Instagram and Youtube.

Any help is welcome! Thank you for your attention!

The weapon must fit in with the game world, comply with the game mechanics and be approved by developers.Your NPC design - We’ll create one of NPC’s based on your description. Give us its background, describe the appearance and the basic quest for the character. NPC must fit in with the game world, comply with the game mechanics and be approved by developers.Bury the treasure - Bury the treasure chest in one of the locations. Leave a description of what is there in the chest to the lucky one who will find it. The treasure must fit in with the game world, contain the existing set of collectables, comply with the game mechanics and be approved by developers.Grand Contributor - Your name in the credits as "Grand Contributor".Obelisk - Your name on the Monumental Obelisk in one of the main game locations.Thank you for support! + Exclusive digital wallpapers pack.Limited low price! Let's Play + Your name in the credits as "First Contributor".Digital Steam copy of the game + Exclusive digital wallpapers pack.Became a backer! Let's Play + Your name in the credits as "Backer".Become a pre-launch beta tester and help us to make the game better. Let's Play + Your name will appear in the credits as "Beta Tester".Beta access + Exclusive physical poster.1st Physical + Exclusive physical artbook.Physical Art + Exclusive physical copy of the game.All in One Physical + Exclusive Limited Edition Wooden Poster.All in One Physical + Your name will appear on one of the ingame objects.All in One Physical + Let you design one of the weapons in the game + Your name in the credits as "Game Designer".All in One Physical + Let you design one of the ingame NPC’s + Your name in the credits as "Game Designer".All in One Physical + Let you bury the treasure in game + Your name in the credits as "Game Designer".All in One Physical + Your name on the Monumental Obelisk in one of the main game locations + Your name in the credits as "Grand Contributor".2 Zombie Games is a small team of professionals and like-minded people. We’ve been working together for several years, and launched a few games on mobile devices and PC. We took part in some large MMOG projects. The core of the team - only three people:2D Art - Oleg MatsokinCode and game design - Vitaliy Stavtsev3D Art, game design and story - Dmitry GolubWe are also actively cooperating with freelancers: Art, Animation, Effects, Music, Voice-over, and Localisations. Even if you are not going to help us with coin, but you like the game, feel free to use the Indiegogo sharing button at the top of the page.You can also recommend us to friends and acquaintances using your blog or favorite social network. Don’t forget to follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Tumblr, Instagram and Youtube.Any help is welcome! Thank you for your attention!

story:
Story

This story tells us about the teenage-girl, who once has awaken in a strange place. She doesn't remember, what's happened to her and she doesn't know, where she is. Will you help her to remember everything? Overcome the fears? Find the way home? Or you will live her alone in such ominous place forever?

Game world

Events take place in a house full of mysteries, fears and unexplained things. Whether the main character will pass this terrible and dangerous way or not – depends on you.

Gameplay

The main factor is finding certain items, solving puzzles and surviving. Looped levels will lead you astray. You will think that deja vu, but in fact it is not. Some puzzles may seem very difficult, but in fact they are very easy, just presented so that it is really hard. The main feature of the gameplay is endless pursuit. An antagonist in every way will prevent you from going all the way, maybe he is not even alone ?!

Mechanics

Everything is simple - you have health, endurance, a flashlight and fear. Fear in the game is the key moment, if it is beyond the limit, the player begins to hallucinate, you can die or be caught by the antagonist (which also entails death). Endurance and flashlight are directly dependent and adapt to the level of difficulty of the game (there are only four levels). Difficulty levels are well balanced to the point that certain scenes (not key) are skipped at a lighter level. There are also items to interact with. Character cold system, which is very easy to interact with. A quick event system (QTE) that requires your reaction. There is also a choice of action, you can choose which way the main character will take, just be careful, everything can be changed from your choice. 

Features

  • Somber atmosphere.
  • Dynamic interaction.
  • Various puzzles.
  • Multi-Language.
  • Several additional endings.
  • PT style.
  • Powered by Unreal Technology.

Goals

  • $1000 — Build PC, Mac, Android and iOS
  • $5000 — Build PS4, Linux and XBox One

System Requirements

  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 (32-64 Bits)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c | 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

Link

  • Gamejolt: Check out
  • itch: Check out
  • Site: Check out
  • IndieDB: Check out
  • YouTube: Check out
  • Facebook: Check out
  • Twitter: Check out
  • Vkontakte: Check out
  • Odnoklassniki: Check out

story:
Hi, I am Shiba Prasad Das. I am a self-taught game developer. I have worked in other people’s game projects, but this one is my first own game project. I have created a prototype to showcase my vision for the game. You can see the video above to get a feel of the game. Final game and characters will be more polished and unique. 

When released the game will be launching on PC, Mac, Steam, Xbox, PS4 (May Be), App Store and Android Store. For mobile devices graphics and game-play will be different.

STORY

Story of “Alien Metal : Zero Order” revolves around you the player. You will be playing a human character who fights for survival of his family, people and for peace against a cruel, greedy clan of machines who believe in domination and slavery. This is just the basic idea of my game. I have planned to hire a game story writer to develop an unique story on this idea, if I reach my funding goals. I have planned to create a story that can give a feel of both a movie and a game and will create emotions.

FEATURES:

  • Sci-fi Sword Close Combat
  • Sci-fi Arrow Bomb Distant Combat
  • Sci-fi Mini gun, Rocket Launcher, Gun Distant Combat
  • Execution Cut Scenes
  • Full game voice dialogues
  • High quality graphics
  • Motion Captured Animations
  • Unique Hero & Machine Characters
  • Offline Multiplayer
  • Mission Mode and Challenge Mode
  • Sound Design

CURRENT GOALS

 

 

 

 

 

 

Currently the game is in prototype stage. I have created 3 levels and some combat movements only. I have planned to release a demo within 3 months of successful funding. I am trying to build this game close to a AAA game. So it will take little more time. 

(Depends on Successful Funding)

  • Demo Release - March 2018
  • Closed Beta Release - November 2018 (Only for eligible supporters)
  • Final Full Release - December 2018

Thanks for reading until this point. If you liked the project, we would really appreciate it if you can get the word out to your friends and family.Just spreading the word about our project is a great help in realizing our game, our dreams, and bring it to life. We’re extremely grateful for the opportunity and support that you gave us.

Thank you very much!

Stay up to date with the development by following us on Facebook, Twitter and YouTube.

               

Thunderclap us - https://www.thunderclap.it/projects/66185-alien...

story:
Who

My name is Rafal Wydra and I'm a professional game developer from more than 10 years. 
I've worked as developer and porting programmer in  many companies (Q-loc, City Interactive, CDProjekt, Flying Wild Hog, People Can Fly). You can easily find me on mobygames.com.

 

What

"Star Domination" is a turn based 2d strategic game for 1-4 players (Hot-Seat or Human vs AI). Each player starts whith one starship and one starbase. The goal of the game is to destroy enemy starbase. During each round players can buy new starships, upgrade them or buy a game cards. 

The core of the gameplay was placed on two different planes (strategic and tactical). The strategic part consists in building starships, installing various modules on them and conquering starbases explored on the galaxy map. The tactical part relies on the battles between starships taking place in one of the 6 types of star systems. Each system has its own unique properties influencing the conditions on the battlefield.

There will be 5 completely different races. Each race has five different starships that can be equipped for 5 different types of modules. Each starship can have different number of modules. Additionally in the game there is the possibility of buying special cards that can be used later both during the battle and during the strategic game

 

Where

You can find more on https://www.facebook.com/stardomination

 

Risks & Challenges

Game mechanics is almoust finished but I need more 2d graphics, sounds and musics so if You like my project please donate me.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please let your friends know about this game. The more people know about it the better

story:
World War What is a single/multiplayer First Person Shooter for the App Store and Android Marketplace that utilizes your cellphone's gyroscope to reflect real world movement in a virtual world. For the first time, you can have virtual reality without the need for other attachments, simply point and shoot.

 

 

The concept of the game is to save worlds at war from unstoppable forces that seek to destroy all life. Each planet consists of a specific number of days of war that bring increasingly difficult enemies with each day you advance. Traveling to distant planets across the galaxy will surprise you with who the enemy is, how advanced they are and even what era they're in.

 

 

In this horde FPS you will drop into each world with ultimate powers derived from your ship, the Altor. Without these powers you may be crushed by the gravity alone on each planet. Due to these restrictions you only have the ability to rotate 360 degrees, but not move forward, backward, left or right. Movement is controlled with real world or touch screen rotation. This allows for extreme precision and accuracy when playing. So whether it be casting spells, shooting arrows or launching grenades you will have complete physical control over the outcome of each projectile in an advanced physics driven environment.

Multiplayer is a king of the hill game mode in which 10 players play as enemy invaders and one player plays as the hero. Outnumbered 10 to 1 you will need to be quick, accurate and smart in order to defeat the other players. Being the enemy allows instant re-spawning and infinite lives, but lack of power. To win as the enemy you must defeat the hero before the sun sets. To win as the hero, you must survive.

 

 

With a wide range of spells, weapons and powers you have the ability to wreak havoc upon your enemies in numerous ways. All weapons have the capability to be upgraded to more powerful versions from the weapon smith based on The Altor. Companions for each world will help you in battling to save their planet. They also provide the option to replay any day you previously completed to achieve high scores and get more shards!

 

 

 

A while back I didn't have the money for a virtual reality system, so I looked for an alternative for a VR game to play that didn't require the additional expenses of extra attachments to my phone, computer or console. I looked and found nothing. So I decided to create a game that gives the look and feel of a VR video game without going through the hassle of spending a fortune.

This is a solo project that I started 2 years ago. It's now in the final development stages and needs the finishing touches. I, unfortunately, am not able to do everything myself so am in need of help. I'll need funds to hire a few professionals to help me with:

  • Creating game specific art
    • Icons
    • Loading Screens
    • UI Elements
  • Improve player experience
    • Reduce Memory Usage
    • Quicken Loading Screens
  • Programming solutions
    • Eliminate current bugs
  • Website Development

Backing World War What will come with its rewards. Not only will you receive unique perks, but you'll also be making an impact on the App Store and Android Marketplace offering a FREE app that looks and feels like a real VR game for those who can't afford one. It doesn't have the immersive VR headset view, but the level design and dialogue definitely make up for it. One of my future goals will be implementing the game to utilize a VR headset if desired.

 

 

 

The only risk with backing my project is if the goal is not met then it will simply delay the time frame in which the game will be completed. No matter what happens, World War What will be available to play at some point in the near future.

Keep in mind this game is about 90% complete. I only need a hand on a few small tasks and it'll be ready for launch! Now, let's go to war with the real enemy here, funding!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Dexter Kennedy, I am a Retired US Army Warrant Officer and former martial arts competitor. After twenty-eight years of competition, in 2003 I came up with a strategy to graduate tournament-level martial arts to professional best-of-the-best team champions by way of a professional point team league.  I am now making my strategy, available nationwide via a martial arts video game, DK's KumiteSport 2020. Through DK’s KumiteSport 2020, I am providing 480 martial artists the opportunity to have their likeness, techniques and fighting strategy incorporated as a team player in the video game. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The campaign is needing to raise $20,000 of which 65% will go to paying for the design, development, programming and packaging of the game itself. The other 35% will go to providing supporters what they paid for in the form of pledges and awards.
  • Our most unique perk is to actually have a martial artists likeness, favorite executable techniques and fight strategy designed as a player in the video game. Thereby increasing their chance to become a martial arts superstar.

The Impact

Football, amateur and professional, is perhaps the most popular spectator sport in the United States. Attracting over 40 million in attendance and many more millions in television viewership each year. I believe that it is more realistic to expand kumite, along with its sports audience via a video game with real world stars then the current tournament landscape. Through this campaign, a player can pledge to help support the creation of the game and later become an overnight sensation from the exposure of the game itself. 

KumiteSport, the video game provides maximum opportunity for martial artists, male and female, ages 21 and up, looking for a platform that will increase recognition and popularity within the martial arts industry. Over time the franchise team concept will be embraced and one day become a reality and emulate the success of other professional league team franchises.  

For decades in America, various genres of the martial arts have languished within the limitations of their respective communities.  Now, KumiteSport and the team idea is making a powerful move in introducing the world to the concept of professionalizing the amateur martial arts tournament-level competition into a major league team sport by way of a video game. 

A nationwide league with the potential to expand globally can be more inclusive of martial artists than any existing martial arts platform. In addition to physical fitness and mental conditioning, KumiteSport is a opportunity to envision the possibilities in a professional martial arts team league which can offer excellent career opportunities for coaches, referees, and front office administrative personnel.  Coaches receive experience by working with competitors and preparing fight strategies while referees are presented with a challenge of officiating fast-paced, action-packed events.  People involved with management aspects of the organization gain unparalleled experience and insight into the operation of a professional sports franchise.  Franchisees also become more involved within their communities by providing a professional sports team, which becomes an active vehicle for recreation, community service and economic profitability. 

Risks & Challenges

"We've been working on professionalizing sport martial arts since 2003, this is our fourth phase with

Phase 1: being franchising which failed,

Phase 2: taking the concept and strategy and outlining it in a book, Taking on the NFL: The National Martial Arts League, which protected the idea,

Phase 3: the reboot and upgrade of the book with, Team Point Fighting: IN a Professional Martial Arts League with the addition of the Investors version

and now

Phase 4: KumiteSport the video game. We have learned many things about the industry, the project, ourselves, and others. Our goal is something that has never been done before; the professionalization of point martial arts. 

We've protected our vision and concept with intellectual property and learned the impact this game can have on the martial arts community once developed, marketed and made available to the industry. 

However, without the proper funding, we will have to table this project for the time being. We'd like get the momentum going with a home run in getting the funding needed to develop the game and give our supporters the opportunity to be the envy of the others in the industry. 

We need funds to continue, or the FIGHT WILL END."

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this page with your friends and family who love martial arts, video games, Bruce Lee, Chuck Norris, point martial arts, sport karate, extreme sports, MMA or anyone who just loves to help the arts! 
  • Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/nationalmartialartsleague/

Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/nationalmartialartsleague/

story:
Introducing IDrink Inc.

iDrink Inc. is founded in Las Vegas, Nevada by two brothers Kyle and Tyler
Roberts.  Kyle is a Sr. Safety Scientist at the National Nuclear Security Site. 
Tyler Roberts is a structural engineer, special inspections engineer, and nuclear high hazard field engineer with a P.E. in the state of Nevada.  Both brothers went to Montana State University in Bozeman Montana and graduated with engineering degrees.  Idea men by nature, this is the first of many projects these two will be bringing to market.A newly formed corporation that is creating a new industry by infusing video gaming with blood alcohol content (BAC) readers, otherwise known as breathalyzers.

iDrink Inc. is launching its first product called the iDrink. iDrink is a
unique phone case that capitalizes on the rapid growth and popularity of
breathalyzers, as well as smart phone gaming. The iDrink case uses a built in
breathalyzer, that runs off of its own separate rechargeable battery.  The app will read the user's blood alcohol content (BAC), which is then displayed to the user.  The user can then use their current location to hail them a cab while they play the only video game in the world that changes difficulty based on the user's BAC level.  iDrink will not only discourage drunk driving, but keep the user entertained while they sober up!

Risks and challenges: The iDrink is on the cutting edge of technology.  As such, it must be released soon to be relevant in the ever changing field of small electronics.  iDrink is prepared with awaiting publications, manufacturing, and distribution to make that happen.

 

Funding Requirements

IDrink Inc. will require start-up funding.  The funds will only be for the initial research and development of the first product launch, the IDrink IPhone case.  These funds will go directly towards creating the prototype, social media and print marketing.  The initial start-up funds will not go towards staffing or living income; nor will it be used for new product development. 

Start-up Funds Required for:

  •     Mechanical Engineering & CAD Modeling
  •     Electronics & Firmware Engineering
  •     iPhone App & Game Development
  •     Working Prototype (1st Round)
  •     Working Prototype (2nd Round) if necessary
  •     Working Prototype (3rd Round) if necessary
     

Total Project Funding Required –150K

Funding Achieved  ~ 60K

Remaining Funding Needed -90K

We have already raised, and spent, $60,000 towards:

  • Initial Product R&D –   60k  (60k unfunded)
  • Patents –   4k - Completed our provisional and started international utility patent.
  • If can raise $20,000 with crowd funding, and combine with the few potential investors acquired, we can make this project a reality!

 

The Perks

 

  • Pledge $25 or more

    A free iDrink customized promotional item to go with your case!

  • Estimated delivery:

  • March 2016

    Only ships to: United States

  • Pledge $150 or more

  •  

  • First Edition iDrink Case for the i6 phone.

  •  

    Estimated delivery:
  • March 2016

     

    Only ships to: United States

story:
What kind of game is ' Pool Rich'?

 

—— “Pool Rich” project is a panoramic 3D billiards game developed and  based on the Unity3D engine. The game aims to highly restore the hitting and playing of real billiards, while adding more game-like free matching mechanisms and various events. The whole game is full of fun.

The project was developed by three major members, a Game designer, a Game client engineer, and a Server-side engineer. It took 3 months to make the initial version of Beta 1.0.0. This version includes the basic eight-ball gameplay. Matching mode can realize the game between the player and the player. After repeated debugging, the touch has been adjusted very well, gives a very real hit. We believe you will love this billiards game.

 

What did "The Billiards Regal" experience?


For this billiards product, our team was initially developed by 4 engineers, 2 designers, and 2 artists. In order to present the game better to everyone, we spent a lot of time and energy in adjusting the impact and perspective, and money. Until now, we only have 3 developers are still insisting, but we still do not want to give up. We are truely believe this is a great 3D billiard game, and we hope she can change Better and fuller! We need your help to complete her together and carve her!

 

The Impact

 

At present, this billiard game has completed the core part, eight-ball game mode and some simple peripheral functions. We need your support to develop the subsequent nine-ball game mode, which will make this game more fun. ! Sincerely, we hope to get your help and make this game more perfect!
We need a sum of money to help us keep running. Then, we can invite more talented developers to join us. This fund is approximately US$ 50,000 to US$ 100,000. We will use this money to develop the nine-ball game mode, event content and some peripheral functions in the next three months. We need more developers to join in.
If we do not achieve the expected funding goal, we will also use this money for the polishing and improvement of existing products, and strive to present the player with the best quality 3D billiard game.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Personnel risks. We need to recruit more friends to join in the project. There are some risks brought by people. For example, new members need times to integrate well, and the code quality needs more energy to maintain, and so on.

Development risk. With the iteration of the version, we will add a lot of social elements. This will involve a lot of data interaction and data maintenance. This is both a risk and a challenge for the R&D team. The team has confidence ensures that the core gameplay is superior and fun, and that the social part will be the best. Let everyone experience the most realistic, most exciting and fun 3D billiard game.

 

How will "Pool Rich" face and solve these problems?

 

From the beginning of the project, we have been dedicated to every function and details. In order to give everyone a better operational feeling, we invited professional billiard players to help us adjust the impact, alignment, striking strength, and arc. content. Although we have to face other more challenging tasks in the later period, we all have the confidence to do a good job. We will recruit more outstanding developers to join in and spend more time studying the game mode and polishing This game, I believe will give players a best and most authentic billiard game!

story:
Guardian Angel is a first person horror game based on strategic use of pathways and decision making. You are a pilot, but something went wrong and you crash on an island. Your goal? you must complete the objectives whilst having to fend off doctor who style Weeping Angels. 
DON'T LOOK AWAY!

Our biggest challenge is to get the word out, many our the You-Tubers who have played the game before are interested in making more videos if we released more levels. We have received mostly positive reviews with an itch.io rating of 4.1 stars out of 5.

We also have the challenge of selecting the right employee for the job, we need someone who is creatively talented, can understand our vision and most importantly get the job done. To address this, we will be running a miniature competition to bring forth the most talented people, from there a one to one interview will be arranged and that is when we will decide who gets the job. This is where you come in to help fund us to complete this project.

Here's a link to the progress so far:
https://spalato-bros.itch.io/guardian-angel

story:
Hello World

I'm glad you're here and still reading :)

My name is Piotr Rafalski and I am a web-developer freshly "shifted" into an independent game creator. I perceive video games not as a mere couch-entertainment medium but rather as a unique form of interactive art and my aspiration is to create games in that spirit.

"Shift" is my first big work which currently exists as a a short 60-to-90-minute game which you can play for free. I would like to extend it and make it feel even more complete.

And that's why I write these humble words to You, Dear Supporter :)

"Shift" story so far

The version of "Shift" you can play on Kongregate is a fruit of my full-time work during the last 5 months. The current free version includes:

  • 30 fully playable levels (60-90 minutes of gameplay)
  • implemented basic game mechanics, such as shifting, saving points and one-use doors
  • a short universal story told with abstract symbols
  • 8 unlockable achievements
  • 30 collectable "slashy thingies" (warning: some of them can be challenging)
  • ...and a mysterious surprise for those who unlock all the "slashy thingies" ;]

Although my intention was to make this version feel "round and complete", in fact it is only a prototype of the game I would like to make. I still have many ideas and aces up my sleeve that couldn't be put into the game simply because of my economic limitations right now.

 

What's more to come?

Well that, Dear Supporters, depends on You.

The minimal threshold of 5120€ considers:

  • Creating a stand-alone version of the game available through Steam/GOG on PC (Windows and Linux) and Mac.
  • Games should be available for everyone. As a highest priority I would also like to include into the game some accessibility options, so that it could be played also by persons with mobility, vision, hearing and cognitive disabilities. These in a great part are features used as well by players without disabilities, such as for example: in-game hints, mouse-only or keyboard-only controls, remappable keys, closed captioning, game speed adjustment etc.
  • Adding on-demand levels and achievements (order available by choosing the corresponding perk)
  • Please note: around 8.5% of the campaign pledge should cover IndieGOGO's commission and bank fees

After reaching the minimal threshold the project will start to grow and bloom :) More features I would like to include are:

  • Extending the gameplay time up to 3-4 hours
  • Including more shifting options and game mechanics
  • Improving the game's visuals
  • "Shift" deserves its original soundtrack!
  • Porting the game to mobile devices and other platforms

I promise to post more specific milestones as we get closer to the minimum threshold!

 

What's the anticipated release date?

If the minimal threshold is NOT reached: You get all of your money back (that's how this page works!) and the game will probably not be released :(

If the minimal threshold is reached: 2nd quarter of 2018.

If the minimal threshold is considerably exceeded: 4th quarter of 2018 / 1st quarter of 2019. It will ultimately depend on the amount raised and the game features that will be developed.

 

I like it! So how can I help?

You can choose one or more from the following list:

  • Choose your perk(s) from the list and become a cool contributor B-)
  • Share this page, the Kongregate page or this Youtube video with your friends, family, co-workers or random passers-by and become an awesome friend of the "Shift" B-]
  • Go to Kongregate page, sign up and rate the game (hopefully positively ^_^') to become a hip fan B-{)

 

...or if you just don't like this game, you can simply carry on and I promise I won't consider you any less cool/awesome/hip  ;)

story:
Hard Helmets is a real time videogame where we will be able to play against others online in exciting games where characters inspired in World War II, will develop a strategy to capture enemy flags during battle by the use of several kinds of supplies and weapons such as riflemen, snipers, mortars, heavy and light tanks, among others.

In Hard Helmets we will make use of several troops that we will need to unlock as we advance in the game by making use of Warbonds that we will find inside supplies boxes that we will earn as we get some victories.

Every unit in Hard Helmets has some particular attributes such as: level of health, attack distance, time to deploy, speed and much more. Those attributes can be upgraded or improved with every new level reached with wich we can customize our deck of war bonds at will.

n Hard Helmets, players are qualified by their range and amount of medals. The highest range is 50. All medals are earnt or lost during PVP (player vs player) battles. Inside battle field the winner will be the first to capture the three enemy towers or flags.

 

 

To develop a strategy in the battle field by the use of war bonds of several kinds in order to be the first to capture three enemy towers or flags and at the same time to defend our own towers in order to avoid those being destroyed or captured by the enemy. Every battle has a limit of 4 - 6 minutes.

  

Every player controls a Commander of the battle front who will be responsible for coordinating the strategy to attack and to defend during the battle and who can also attack by himself. This Commander, by making real time use of collected warbonds, grants several skills to the troop in the categories of Weapons, Defense, Attack, Strong Attack and Epic.

With every battle, the player earns exprenience points that can be used to purchase supplies boxes of different levels. When opening a supplies box 6 random war bonds will be presented to the user that will be added to the war bonds deck and with that increase the chances to win a battle.

Experience points will also help to buy new sets of weapons and skins to customize the commander of the troop.

 

Once a player wins a battle, he will get a "supplies box". The supplies boxes hold war bonds and coins. Depending on the level of the supplies box different amounts of coins and war bonds will be given to the user.

 

Hard Helmets has been designed with the ambiance of the second world war where governments issued a title known as War Bond used to finance militar campaigns and to get funds to support troops during battle.

In Hard Helmets, the playeable units and special attack and defense actions are know as war bonds. Before each game, players will select their deck of ten war bonds to be used during battle in order to defend their own towers and flags and also to attack enemy's towers and flags.

The War bonds in hard helmets are alike a deck of cards classified in the groups of supplies, defense, attack, strong attack and epics.

Supplies Bonds: Will enable the player to use several kinds of weapons with several levels of reach, damage, accuracy, among others.

Defense: Defense war bonds will send support units to the battle field that will only perform defense tasks during battle.

Attack: Attack war bonds will send units to the battle field that will only execute attack tasks during battle.

Strong Attack: Strong attack war bonds will send heavy attack equipment to the battle field that will cause great damage to the enemies.

Epic War Bonds: It sends specialized attacks to the battle field such as bombs or massive troops.

 

The combination of war bonds during the game and the way they are used in battle set the strategy that will define the winner. In lone player mode, AI (Artificial Intelligence) will use its own strategy depending on the battle development in real time .

Hard Hemets has included the change to customize the front commanders through the use of exchangeable skins enabling to combine features such as: hemet, face, shirt, backpack, maks, among others.

Whit the alpha version of Hard Helmets the is a total of 750 possible combinations. With the support of our investors, we will reach much more.

 

 

Hard Helmets enable the players wir the feature to accumulate game coins which can be used to participate in challenges, purchase supplies boxes and special war bonds.

-Playeable with deck of cards (war bonds)

-Several Stages and wheater conditions

-Player can have an level ascend

-Buy supplies boxes

-In App purchases with game coins.

-Several Armies

-Player vs Player

-Customization Options

We make use of latest animation techniques. With this we minimize system requirements to be able to load objects in the game the lightest way possible and to reach a fast response in all devices.

Ingenio Contenido Digital is a 6 years old company located in Colombia specialized in all kinds of digital content, design and software development. We are a qualified and creative team that by using last generation technologies develop high quality digital product and digital services.

story:
Tarot is going digital.
Tarot AI project seeks to offer unlimited Tarot readings on an Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform. We offer a fully customizable Tarot deck that exists in the physical and the virtual, being created to allow the power of Tarot to be even more exciting.

For querents we offer the ability to have unlimited online readings, save those readings, and be able to share their readings. Tarot AI will be able to personalize the readings with a range of decks, styles and personas, from computers and from live human readers. Tarot AI platform will allow a querent to have even greater control of the path of prophecy and readings remembered in the years and decades to come. A lifetime of readings, remembered for a lifetime.

The project brings the tools of a digital economy fully to the world of Tarot and cartomancy.For Tarot  Readers, it will allow unlimited support to read Tarot, Numerology, Astrology, Runes, and other divination systems, for anyone, anywhere, anytime in the connected world

The Tarot AI Team has built platforms that teach a lifetime of education, provide nightly podcasts, and daily video. This project seeks to create a fully digital platform for Tarot, allowing for unlimited readings. When successful, it will allow Tarot and cartomancy to join the emerging Viritual, Augment and AI reality, with great ability and purpose.

By pledging today, you can make this part of your Tarot life.


Current Start of Program Video:



You can get your own reading here.
 

Decks we are offering:

Core Decks:
We have the core deck, Tarot of Hekate, by Don Lewis. We offer the traditional 78 card deck.
Tarot AI is offering the original verson which is a 100 card Tarot deck with five suits and 30 major Arcana Cards. With every deck we add an e-book with full description.

Tarot AI cartomancy expansion Cards:
Runes, with 25 cards
Numerology
Astrology (planets and signs)
Muses (9 muses)
Zener (25 card psychic testing cards)

 

The Tarot AI Big Box includes all the decks we are offering for this campaign. As we meet stretch goals we will be adding expansion cards.

The Tarot AI program access levels

Basic Level (free):
- access to Tarot and Cartomancy reading programs
-simple profile includes online access to all purchased decks and ebooks of the same.

Querent Level:
-full profile
-access to all Tarot and Cartomancy reading programs, including AI
-stores all readings for later recall

Reader Level:
- reader profile with public page option
- access to Tarot and Cartomancy Assistant Programs
- Tarot Deck programs function in reader mode
-Connect with clients through the site
-can store client readings done by reader for later recall
- can provide email, skype, and other direct connections
-Ability to create a Persona, a reading program reflecting a readers style
-including uploading own Tarot Deck with descriptions and combinations

Master  Reader Level:
-master reader profile with public page option
-create multiple persona's,  multiple decks
-develop new reading outlays
-Collaborate with other readers into online network/fairs/services

Avatar Level:
- Moonshot program
-Creating a VR/AR/AI persona on the Tarot AI platform.
Avatar membership level is access to the highest service, including developing into cyberspace expression. As a founding adopter, you will be a lifetime Avatar member.

Impact of Tarot AI

The world of Tarot is filled with knowledge, and in our physical world, so overwhelming as to take a lifetime to read and understand. In our accelerating digital culture, we can use our skills and tools, to generate even better readings, improved reader relationships, and we can make it amazing.

With an AI core platform, we will be able to extend our decks and persona's in Virtual Reality Programs. Into an array of environments including video games and direct avatars. Augmented Reality will allow a reader to always have a deck and a querent always just a click away.

By giving querents the ability to gain access to unlimited readings, they can explore their curiosity. What would you ask if you can ask about anything? This offers the opportunity to test that.

By giving readers the tools to improve communications, to allow them to give anyone, anywhere, anytime a reading, we make it possible to support their career. We can bring readers into cyberspace, bringing something essentially human to the world.


The Tarot AI Team members have previously built The Daily Spell, Witch School, Magick TV and Pagans Tonight Radio. Each has created enduring legacy and continues to operate to this day. The team builds enduring projects that serve their communities well. Tarot AI will be the next great community, with unlimited readings at its core.

Please join us today for a lifetime of readings.
story_txt:
Tarot is going digital.Tarot AI project seeks to offer unlimited Tarot readings on an Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform. We offer a fully customizable Tarot deck that exists in the physical and the virtual, being created to allow the power of Tarot to be even more exciting.
For querents we offer the ability to have unlimited online readings, save those readings, and be able to share their readings. Tarot AI will be able to personalize the readings with a range of decks, styles and personas, from computers and from live human readers. Tarot AI platform will allow a querent to have even greater control of the path of prophecy and readings remembered in the years and decades to come. A lifetime of readings, remembered for a lifetime.The project brings the tools of a digital economy fully to the world of Tarot and cartomancy.For Tarot  Readers, it will allow unlimited support to read Tarot, Numerology, Astrology, Runes, and other divination systems, for anyone, anywhere, anytime in the connected worldThe Tarot AI Team has built platforms that teach a lifetime of education, provide nightly podcasts, and daily video. This project seeks to create a fully digital platform for Tarot, allowing for unlimited readings. When successful, it will allow Tarot and cartomancy to join the emerging Viritual, Augment and AI reality, with great ability and purpose.By pledging today, you can make this part of your Tarot life.
