story:
Hell shouldn't be a bad place for eternity.Since we are stuck in here lets have some fun! This hell is not very different from the land of the living. The media are still a vital part of society. Every year, Channel 7 -broadcast the show and all kind of challengers are accepted. Mister Brown is our beloved host for the show.

All stages are constructed by the Architects, really naughty souls that love to play with the arts of excitement. They are some of the most respected and well known denizens of hell and players that win their games win the grand prize:A golden trophy of their head.But they must catch it first!

The Show:

Every season 8 architects present to the network three stages each.They are constructed to various spots in Hell.Industrial complexes, abandoned fortresses and caves are common places.The team must collect the required amount of tokkens that are placed inside the levels to qualify.On the third stage after they qualify, the Architect reveals himself and contestants must hunt him down inside the level and  catch him.Then the catcher must return at the level entrance intact to finish the stage.

 

Features:

  • Choose from 22 sinners -14 created up until now.The remaining 8 will be humans, some of them familiar...probably :) 

  • 24 levels. Dungeons, caves and factories are an Architect's best friends, full with traps and other monsters that try to stop the team from winning.

  • Single player mode

  1. Finish the levels of the season and replay them for high scores and trophies.
  2. Team interaction with dialogs between the levels in The Lounge.

In this room you can also review each sinner's stats as well as its achievements over the season.

    Perks:

    For detailed descriptions of each perk please see the list on the web page's right panel.

    Who we are:

    Horos Interactive is a newly formed studio based in Athens, Greece.

    Funds:

    Funds will be broken down into the following categories:

    • Programming: Mechanics, character AI and possibly multiplayer.
    • ​Graphics: Stage and character 3d models, UI and motion graphics
    • Animations: Character animations original and from mocap libraries.
    • Music & sound FX: Music and sound editing from two composers.
    • Voice acting: Professional voice acting for some characters. If stretch goal is reached this will be further expanded. 
    • Marketing: Use of promotional tools like YouTube, Google and websites.

    Current state:

    The game is under development for the past 18 months and the state according to field is:

    • Programming: 50%
    • ​Graphics: 40%
    • Animations: 30%
    • Level design: 20%
    • Music & sound FX: 10%
    • Voice acting: 10%
    • Marketing: 0%

      Release time:

      The game will be available for PC at 17/11/17 and if stretch goals are met console versions soon thereafter.

      The Impact

      We always loved the concept of Hell as a place to stage our game and the first attempt should be something funny with a slight sense of humor.Platform games are one of our favorite video game genres, we grew up playing them all the time. How we are trying to differentiate is that we will put emphasis on the characters and their interaction with the environment and with each other so that the players can come closer to the game's world.

      Risks & Challenges

      A lot of work has already gone into Catch the Head over the last 18 months.The game is deep in production and we intend on releasing it no matter what since its too late to abandon this ship even if funding proves unsuccessful. The only real challenge now is time because up until now we were doing it part-time in our spare time without the resources to support a full time production.Strong will is a given and the talent is there. Only time can make these two collide and fly to the next level making this game a reality.

      Stretch goals:

      Stretch goals according to level of importance are:

      1. Multiplayer
      2. PS4 and Xbox One development
      3. Character creator
      4. Professional Voice acting

      Depending of funding results they will be picked respectively.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      We are a very open minded group, eager to hear suggestions and advices for the game that can contribute to its development.Please feel free to contact us anytime.If you like our game you can share it with other people through social media and Indiegogo's share tool.

story:
The Bone is a free-to-play mobile AR game that combines components from RPG and sports in a real-life environment. Using three elements of technology: your smartphone, augmented reality, and electronics, we deliver:

The experience of having superpowers in real life

Here, you are the main character, the world is your stage, and our technology is the medium that will let you live this experience.

We created a Demo for you to take a glimpse into our Universe, and to test out the Mobile Only experience without an Epon, click to download:

 

If you acquire a Caster Gear you will you will have access to both the mobile and real-life gameplay experiences (solo and multiplayer). Train and fight with local players in real life or with the entire player base in an online mode. 

 Actual Gameplay 1vs 1 using the built-in recording & streaming feature. 

 

 

Each time you fight, you will select your loadout from the dozens of available powers. This means that each battle will have different strategies depending on the conditions of that specific match. If you wish, you could deal huge amounts of damage, heal your allies, use shields, paralyze your enemies or hundreds of more combinations for you to discover.

The world is your stage and, as long as you have internet access, you can play anywhere.  Picture yourself in an abandoned building playing a 2 vs 2 capture the flag match,  or gathering with 10 friends in your local park  to play a battle royal, or a 1 vs 1 duel in your backyard.

You select the location and create the rules. We intend to let the community build and create different game modes.

 

The system is based on the idea that this is a sport and should be treated that way. Some days, you will have amazing fights in real-life arenas, but other days you must train.

If you own an Epon, you can battle other players online with specific augmented reality gameplay designed to sharpen your skills while battling with other recruits worldwide.

The Bone is all about superpowers and your ability to summon and cast them. In our universe they are called Power Archives. The other resources revolve around them, and mastering them should be the focus of your training. How many exist is a mystery, but we have discovered 36 so far.

Each Power Archive has a unique series of movements, or Casting Pattern, that you must perform to use them. An essential part of your training is mastering these patterns to perform them precisely.

 

You don’t need a Caster Gear to be a part of our Universe. We developed a stand alone mobile experience where you will explore the world, gather resources, level up your powers and fight other players in the combat simulator.  We think it is better if you test it yourself, therefore we created a Demo. Click to download:

To begin your adventure, you'll only need your phone. Using its camera and our Augmented Reality system, you will explore your surroundings to find superpowers, along with the resources you'll need to level them up.

Consider this is not a GPS-based game. Depending on the actual colors and textures you explore are the resources you will find, so pay attention to your surroundings. Superpowers could be anywhere.

 

If you don't own an Epon, you can access the Combat simulator with your phone at any time.  An online multiplayer arena for you to test your powers, try new strategies, practice with your teammates, and gain experience before going into real-life battles

 
 
Nereas are your virtual companions and training partners.  They are entirely cosmetic and will not have any impact on the game mechanics or your performance. However, they will make you look amazing when fighting online. You know what they say: if you look good, you feel good, and if you feel good, you play good.

Collect them all and show them off with your friends!

 

Recruitment Centers (RC´s) are the real-life point of contact of our community with The Bone.  Through a special section of our app, RC owners will create and organize tournaments and training sessions, and players will find and book matches near them.

In an RC, players will use their smartphones and profiles, and may bring their Caster Gear or rent one at the Recruitment Center, even if you don’t own an Epon, you can still fight with the Power Archives you have worked hard to level up.  This locations are a great way to meet fellow recruits, practice your casting technique, participate in official tournaments and trade in-game assets!

 

We have an amazing international team of people passionate about gaming, esports, technology, and entertainment. The founding team has over 30 years of combined experience in launching and growing different companies and projects in finance, esports, robotics, online platforms, and product development. And we are not alone; we gathered an incredible group of investors and advisors led by the legendary Rod Cousens.

Jugando con Fuerza JCF:

Piercepage

Dev Diaries

New Dawn

Zont

 

 
 

Universal particles are the basis of all resources in the game which are divided into 6 color families. Each family has it's own dominant attributes:  Red damage, Yellow speed, Green balance, Cyan support, Blue resistance, and Magenta illusion.

Our community is everything. Building a project this ambitious needs a lot of people to back it up. We have over 50,000 pre-registered recruits, +35 Houses, and 1,000 selected recruits who have been testing game features for over a year to give us feedback.

What our community thinks about The Bone:

OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

Community member can form houses: groups that players are free to create and establish with their own rules, philosophy, and history. With their actions, players will help their Houses become more relevant in The Bone.

 

Click below to join this fantastic group and help improve the gaming experience.

 

We see The Bone developing into a groundbreaking global sport that combines Esports and Live Action Role Playing elements. Our goal is to revolutionize the world of Esports and entertainment.

For the first time, we will be able to broadcast epic real-life battles, in iconic worldwide locations, and watch the players cast superpowers through two perspectives: first-person (from the player's point of view like most video games) and third-person (just like any other sport).

 We have been working for over 3 years now in the development of The Bone. We are constantly testing and improving our technology by creating various revisions of our hardware and software. We are in the last stages of hardware development, where only some details need to be refined before going into production.

Take a look at the design and prototyping process of different areas in our project:

Mechanical Design:

Software Development:

 

Electronic Design:

 

Art & Animation:

 

Game Design:

story: Spuderö Späderö
story_txt: Spuderö Späderö

story:
"If you are bored with all these hackneyed mobile productions based on the patterns overused till their limits, then Spoko and Poko may positively surprise you. This Polish production is an incredible combination of pinball and basketball, which combined with an interesting convention, differentiated levels and pleasing artwork gives a fantastic result"


"Spoko and Poko is promarily a brilliant idea, very challenging and demanding gameplay and a huge number of levels. ALL THIS makes that we are dealing with a unique production."

It is the opinion of one of the greatest Polish portals dedicated to mobile applications.  antyweb.pl

Spoko and Poko is a story about two beetles carrying balls to their house. The game in its convention refers to many classics from the turn of the 80-ies and 90-ies. It is an entertainment for many hours of playing; sometimes it is surprisingly funny and for sure very addictive.

             

At the beginning of January of this year, we released Spoko and Poko for devices with Android trying to market it on our own; the result achieved by us - a few thousand downloads. We know that our game deserves much much more. Now, richer in experience from the past, we want to release it with some big changes for devices with the iOS, Win, OSX system.

                                    


We would like the users of iOS system to be able to enjoy our game without micropayments. We believe that micropayments effectively ruin fun and often promote only the payers. We want to change it - the balance of the game may not be dependent on the wallet. Do Leaderboards make any sense in such a case?

However, we have to remember every developer spent a lot of time and money to create a game. Therefore, every publisher cares about the number of downloads. We also would like Spoko and Poko to be played by as many players as it is possible.

Therefore, we have decided to ask you to support our project of releasing the game for the iOS, Win, OSX system and our marketing activities related to the promotion of the game about the two wonderful beetles.


                                        


The originality of Spoko and Poko has also been appreciated by the "Steam Greenlight" community; the game has just been approved for distribution through the "Steam" platform



                                       



+ 4,500$    Transfer together with the adaptation of the game to the requirements  of the iOS, Win, OS system

+ 7,500$    Creation of additional 20 levels

+ 10,000$ Marketing of the game in social media

+ 12,500$  Marketing of the game on industry websites, magazines

+ A animated film for the game made using 3D technique with our two      

    protagonists in main roles Spoko and Poko beetle  


                          


Przemyslaw Brodzik, born in Poland in 1977, he received his first computer in 1986 - it was a ZX81 Sinclair with 1kb RAM. As a boy, he spent most of the time at gaming machines with "Moon Patrol", "Bomb Jack", "Popeye"... the second half of his free time he spent by entering game listings to his ZX81. As an adult, he worked by creating many games, including the "Call of Juarez" - Techland and also by several animated films such as "Kinematograph"dir. Tomek Bagiński. For the last 5 years, he has been working by creating interactive applications: one of the most recent is the Augmented Reality made for visa. In private life, a happy husband and a dad of a 6 year old Igor





Be one of the persons to support the beetles in their hard work!

"Spoko and Poko is promarily a brilliant idea, very challenging and demanding gameplay and a huge number of levels. ALL THIS makes that we are dealing with a unique production."
It is the opinion of one of the greatest Polish portals dedicated to mobile applications.  antyweb.plSpoko and Poko is a story about two beetles carrying balls to their house. The game in its convention refers to many classics from the turn of the 80-ies and 90-ies. It is an entertainment for many hours of playing; sometimes it is surprisingly funny and for sure very addictive.             
At the beginning of January of this year, we released Spoko and Poko for devices with Android trying to market it on our own; the result achieved by us - a few thousand downloads. We know that our game deserves much much more. Now, richer in experience from the past, we want to release it with some big changes for devices with the iOS, Win, OSX system.                                    We would like the users of iOS system to be able to enjoy our game without micropayments. We believe that micropayments effectively ruin fun and often promote only the payers. We want to change it - the balance of the game may not be dependent on the wallet. Do Leaderboards make any sense in such a case?However, we have to remember every developer spent a lot of time and money to create a game. Therefore, every publisher cares about the number of downloads. We also would like Spoko and Poko to be played by as many players as it is possible.Therefore, we have decided to ask you to support our project of releasing the game for the iOS, Win, OSX system and our marketing activities related to the promotion of the game about the two wonderful beetles.                                        The originality of Spoko and Poko has also been appreciated by the "Steam Greenlight" community; the game has just been approved for distribution through the "Steam" platform                                        + 4,500$    Transfer together with the adaptation of the game to the requirements  of the iOS, Win, OS system+ 7,500$    Creation of additional 20 levels+ 10,000$ Marketing of the game in social media+ 12,500$  Marketing of the game on industry websites, magazines+ A animated film for the game made using 3D technique with our two          protagonists in main roles Spoko and Poko beetle                            Przemyslaw Brodzik, born in Poland in 1977, he received his first computer in 1986 - it was a ZX81 Sinclair with 1kb RAM. As a boy, he spent most of the time at gaming machines with "Moon Patrol", "Bomb Jack", "Popeye"... the second half of his free time he spent by entering game listings to his ZX81. As an adult, he worked by creating many games, including the "Call of Juarez" - Techland and also by several animated films such as "Kinematograph"dir. Tomek Bagiński. For the last 5 years, he has been working by creating interactive applications: one of the most recent is the Augmented Reality made for visa. In private life, a happy husband and a dad of a 6 year old IgorBe one of the persons to support the beetles in their hard work!

story:
Lillian Gish returns in a brief space adventure!

For many people who have been following me the past two years, you are probably aware of my video game character, Lillian Gish.  She has appeared in numerous game jam games I have created from Flappy Jam to Candy Jam, and I constantly revisit old builds using her knife throwing mechanics as a basis for further gameplay.  Below is a gif and youtube Let's Play of one of the early builds.


What Lillian Needs & What You Get

Even though I have been working on revising the old Lillian Gish build, as well as beginning a new one (with procedural level generation), a recent Pixel Dailies where I had Lillian attacking some Flying Saucers (pictured below) got me inspired to create a new Lillian mini game.

My intent is to create a very basic shump-alike where Lillian, instead of flying herself, must jump from saucer to saucer, all while dodging bullet hell!  A very simple concept, but should be fun!  Oh, and a final boss, instead of dealing with it being an endless shooter like I've done in the past.


The problem is I am very busy starting up a new guitar pedal business and trying to save money to move to a new place.  So although I have free time to do pixel art and chip away at game dev, I don't have time to even set aside a few days to bust out a demo, game jam, or small game.

So I am creating this indie go go as a way to gauge interest and get the word out about Lillian.

Anyone who contributes will get a copy of the finished game, early builds, and updates along the way.

You can play every one of my previous Lillian Gish builds and spin offs as part of my mega game pack from 2015 : http://ptstd.itch.io/deprograms2014

The Impact

If this campaign succeeds, I'll be able to take a week off, for the first time in a long time, to devote completely to game design.  Creating this small game will not only allow me to keep my game dev chops up, but will allow me to explore the universe of Lillian Gish a bit more, which will contribute to my ability to create even better games starring her!

Risks & Challenges

There really isn't any risk to you in terms of the game being completed since I won't be doing flexible funding with this.  That means the only way I'll work on this game is if I can raise the full $600 which will allow me enough breathing room to work on this for a week! :D  If it was any lower I would still have to balance time between this and my pedal business, and that wouldn't be good for anyone. :(

The biggest risk and challenge right now is that I am still relatively green when it comes to build video games.  Although I feel very confident creating tiny games, I'm still weary of making larger ones in which bigger bugs and system compatibility issues will become more and more of a challenge.

There is no doubt in my mind I will meet this challenge, and the games I am making right now, including this one, will be small enough to not warrant too much concern, but it's still on my mind.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about Lillian Gish and my work and consider supporting me on patreon and following me on my various social media sites.

story:
BattleBeasts Story

Planet Shima attracts adventure seekers from all over Galaxy BB-79 due to its unique resources. The mysterious effects on this planet turned the Artificial Intelligence of Shima aggressive towards all intelligent species of animals. You must survive in this new world, full of dangers and hostile environments by collecting resources, building and claiming territory, hunting wild animals and crafting armor, weapons, vehicles and your own bots. But the most important thing is to study the mysteries of Shima in order to fully understand what is happening on this planet.

Since February 10, 2018, we have successfully developed and tested the pre-alpha version of BattleBeasts for all our followers. Using the Unreal Engine 4, we were able to implement all the mechanics of survival with joint construction in a one-time session for up to 150 people. After many tests, we created a foundation for development, and now we are working on content scaling and gameplay expansion. We will transfer the game to Steam's early access after the end of our closed alpha testing period.

APPEARANCE

In BattleBeasts you will be able to choose many types of intelligent beasts as your character, the list of characters will be updated by a vote in the community of the game.

Monthly armor and weapon design kits will also be available.
The world of BattleBeasts is filled with SciFi weapons, which have different settings and skins that will help you find your style of play.
New hoverbike skins are also being designed to allow you to make it more personal to your preference.
Freedom of expression in the form of voting will help give you more power. You can control the appearance of many skins or objects.

MULTIPLAYER

A well-designed system of interaction with the server will allow you to always stay on the most saturated server that corresponds to your level of achievement, using the session-saving system and your own matchmaking algorithm.

WORLD BattleBeasts

The first of the presented game locations is 8 * 8 km of the beautiful forest landscapes of the island. We have created many wild forests and lakes to give a natural feeling. In all these locations, you can build defensive forts and fight, except for safe zone locations. These locations are bases in which there are security zones. In order to obtain resources and development you will have to build your own shelter outside these walls.


Also, game locations include many abnormal areas with high risk to life. Day-night changes allow you to use different gameplay solutions for exploring the riddles of the planet and getting different types of resources. Take back control of the world. Learn the secrets of the planet to gain more new items.

BUILDING

Using available resources such as wood and stone, you can build your own shelters.
First, choose where you are going to build, it is desirable that this would be on an even and large enough area. If the image is red, then you cannot install it there, if it is green, you can. Be sure to improve all the elements of construction: the foundation, walls, doors, and roof, because if at least one element is not improved, it will break and easily allow unwanted entry.


INVENTORY SYSTEM

In BattleBeasts. there is a system for numerous items to research. Branches of study for new items and the study of their settings with their own characteristics, such as weapons, armor, and transportation, will allow numerous settings. Objects contain many unique properties, allowing you to customize weapons and more for your style of play.
We use a grid-based inventory system that allows you to plan, save resources, and create craft items. We made interaction with objects the most realistic. You will be able to unpack boxes of ammunition and open storage with various tools that can be found in the world.

RESOURCES

The main available resources are for construction, while less available are the resources necessary for life (water, food). There are also completely unique quest resources used to recharge batteries in vehicles, upgrading shelters, crafting unique items, and many more.

The more unique a resource is, the less accessible it is. You can get it from dangerous mobs and in remote anomalous places.

HAZARDOUS FORMS OF LIFE

The island filled with monsters and robots is the basis of a new game mechanics, created with C ++.

Combat cyborgs, robots left without owners, show aggression to all intelligent species. We will fill the game with more lively and fast elements of the gameplay, in the form of wild animals that will behave most naturally in their habitat. Only the fastest and most cunning players can catch Mobs. Mobs are equipped with motion sensors, they perfectly see in the dark, they react to sounds, explosions and they are damn hard to kill or catch.

Join now!

BattleBeasts from the very beginning was thought and developed for friends. We could not make the game without community feedback.
Invite your friends to the game, create your teams, get more emotions from the game. With the help of our community Discord you can always find like-minded people. Only with your continued support, can we continue to develop BattleBeasts.

We often publish to our followers information about the production process, as well as accept suggestions for improvement.

Join our Discord server
BattleBeasts game

Subscribe!
playbattlebeasts.com
 

PURPOSE FOR FUND-RAISING

First step: OPTIMIZATION and ADDITION OF LOCATIONS - 15K $

Optimization of gameplay. New game cards, connected by a complex of portals, with a common card will be added. We will add new locations, such as an abandoned robotic factory and mercenary bases. We will also include new vehicles, weapons and new items to diversify the gameplay.

Second step: CREATING YOUR DEDICATED SERVER - $ 30K

The ability to create your own dedicated server for cooperative game mode. We have provided the possibility of creating your own game mode on your computer with the subsequent invitation of your friends to play together.

Third step: NUMEROUS PLOT LINES - 50K $

You can create alliances with other survivors and participate in a large-scale conflict of clans, each of them has its own paradigm, separate plot lines and the study of the new properties of the planet, giving players unique abilities.

Fourth step: AUCTION and WOMEN'S CHARACTERS - $ 85K

We will be able to realize the auction. Sell and buy products created by other players for in-game currency

New 3d models of female characters will be formed for each type of animal. Hair styling and selection of eye color. You can choose the gender of your character at any time.

 

Any ideas?

We're always open to the feedback from our fans and sincerely appreciate the support that we have provided so far. We have an international development team from Russia, Germany, USA, Canada
Thanks to everyone who supports us.

story:
The story

We are the "KAVA Project" – a team of young developers from Ukraine. These days we want to pay your attention to the key features of our current project "Lingermia".

In this single-user horror intertwines the mysterious mythology of ancient Egypt and the gloomy side of Victorian England – its folklore and events. Particular attention is given to a dreary, oppressive atmosphere, which was formed on the base of an epidemic, famine and mysterious murders. From the very first minutes it becomes evident that the situation around is no longer to be saved and it is worth only thinking about saving ourselves.

Wandering through the eerie corners of the «Lingermia" world, you will face with not only the natural problems of England of that time, but also spiritual forces, from which it is not so easy to escape ... However, in spite of the horror that has already filled everything up to the foundation, you will play for the main character, who can still bring a piece of light into this dark realm of death. Moreover, in the game you will find lots of references to real or fictional events that have become a dispensable part of the history of Victorian England. At the same time, the events are not developing chaotically here, but according to the plot in the spirit of the best films and books of similar themes. We, as developers, were inspired by such famous works as «Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde» by Robert Lewis Stevenson, «Dracula» by Bram Stoker, «Plague» by Albert Camus as well as such films as «Van Helsing» by Stephen Sommers, «Sweeney Tod: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street» and Tim Burton's «Sleepy Hollow». It should be noted that the backgroound music of «Lingermia" is also an important aspect. The mysterious, uncanny, often frightening and tense music will accompany you during the game.

The gameplay itself will not distract the players from the addictive plot, but will not let you relax either – there are many different dangers in the game which you will have to cope with regularly, and only at times you will be able to take a breath.

In general, the «Lingermia» horror is a gloomy essence of fear, skilfully mixed with the no less friendly atmosphere of the reality of the past centuries. As developers we want to pay attention to all of the existing aspects of the genre of horror, and introduce something new creating a unique project of its kind. No doubt, it will be difficult for us to do it without your support, our dear players, therefore, we count upon your help

The gameplay

During the game you will hardly have the opportunity to fight, and therefore the main task is to survive. Walk around obstacles, hide, run, use the game world by which you are surrounded to your advantage, unravel secrets and find ancient relics including a strange bracelet.

The stealth mode will be implemented in this game for the greater efficiency of which you will have to take care of the details. Otherwise, you have to run like hell hoping that you will not be caught. And the most interesting is that you do not know what each of them will do with the character. ''Sometimes death is too boring''.

Do not forget that in order to learn more secrets you have to take risks more often and make up ways to solve problems. With each step there will be more secrets and it would be better not to miss the opportunity to trace at least one thread in this vast web of secrets.There will be a rather unusual mode of complexity of the game. There will be available a choice of a bone structure for the main character in addition to lighting, which will directly influence her abilities during the game. Make your way like a mouse, or run wherever your eyes go around. But what if you can not do either…

The objectives

55 000$ – the base version of the game. It includes a full translation into Russian, Ukrainian and English. The plot of the game will bring 30 hours of the gameplay on average, everything is in your hands and depending on your choice the consequences will vary. We do not limit you to the passage of one location, you can go in different ways, and therefore change the history of your character.

60 000$ – a voice in French and German. The recording will take place in the recording studio with hiring of the actors suitable for voice acting.

70 000$ - versions of the game for X-Box One and Sony Playstation 4.

80 000$ – "Hard Edition". The edition includes additional material: rooms, dungeons, secret storerooms, new traps, riddles, as well as updated textures, models and sounds. Designed for more powerful computers.

85,000$ - Shadow Mode. The mode contains additional content and gameplay for real horror fans. This addition should bring at least 10 hours of gameplay with new locations and monsters.

93 000$ - "Secrets of Sutech". The edition which contains a history of almost 6000 years ago about how the First Werewolf King was born. New quests, materials, references and stories. All this will be in this big update.

105 000$ - Extreme Edition. The edition which contains several modes of extreme survival. The point is not to win. The point is to survive.

125 000$ - "Open World Edition". After a certain closed chapter in the game, a player will be given the opportunity to freely explore the world which we will present to you in free mode. The regime includes numerous new quest lines, stories, materials and certainly places for visits and studies. Now you are not limited to the horrors of certain locations, your eyes are opened to the whole valley, the city, the castle, caves, dungeons, abandoned temples and much more. The most important thing is that at this stage the whole concept is thought out and interconnected. You do not have to think about the fact that you will lose the road – just play and the game will answer you.

135 000$ - Survival Multiplayer Mode. Have a horror night with your friends, unite, try to get out, and help each other to confront monsters. Or frame each other on purpose for the sake of your own survival. Games of common walk-through will give you emotions, adrenaline and the desire to repeat this game. There are many locations, plots, tasks and features. All this and much more will be waiting for you in this edition.

200 000$ -  The best is yet to come.

The rewards

  • $ 5 - mention and gratitude in the titles.
  • $ 10 - a poster of the game in e-form + a mention in titles. 
  • $ 17 – e-version of the game + the first update for free. Also, it includes a reward        for $ 10.
  • $ 35 – a matirial copy of the game with an autograph. Limited edition + 1 free update.
  • $ 60 - a poster and a material copy of the game with autographs + 1 free update.
  • $ 250 - e-book on the basis of which the game was created. Also, it includes a reward for $ 60.
  • $ 425 - the opportunity to write a letter that will be found in the game. The reward is limited. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Game Consultant".
  • $ 600 - the opportunity to write a letter that will be found in the game. The reward is limited + T-shirt with the "Kava-Projects" symbol. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Game Consultant". Also, it includes a reward for $ 60 + physical copy of the book.
  • $ 950 - the ability to write your own quest that will be adjusted by  the developers, and it will be implemented in the game. The reward is limited. In the titles , you will be referred  as "Scenario Consultant".
  • $ 1100 - the opportunity to send a description to the developers, or a drawing of the room, which, after adjustments via the Skype conversation, will be added to the game. The reward is limited. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Design Consultant".
  • $ 1350 - the opportunity to send a description to the developers, or a drawing of the room, which, after adjustments via the Skype conversation, will be added to the game. In the credits, you will be mentioned as "Design Consultant". The reward is limited. + T-shirt or shirt with the "Kava-Projects" symbol with the corresponding anagram. Also it  includes a reward for 60.
  • $ 2000 - the opportunity to make own location for the project with developers' corrections. The location can be made in two ways: made by you in 3D’s Max (any other 3D modeling program), or you can build the game straight in the game centre, then send your work to the developers. The reward is limited.
  • $ 2500 - the opportunity to make own location for the project with developers' corrections. The location can be made in two ways: made by you in 3D's Max (any other 3D modeling program), or you can build the game straight in the game centre, then send your work to the developers. The opportunity to write your own quest with developers' adjustments, and it will be implemented in the game. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Design and Scenario Consultant". + T-shirt or shirt with the symbol of the developer "Kava-Projects" with the corresponding anagram.  The reward is limited. Also includes a reward for $ 60. 
  • $ 3500 - the opportunity to send a photo to the developers, which after processing and with minimal changes will be "stuck" on the face of one of the people - limited, or on the face of one of the infected plague in the game. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Design Consultant". The reward is limited. Also includes a $ 250 reward.
  • $ 3750 - the opportunity to send a photo to the developers, which, after processing and with minimal changes, will be "stuck" to the face of one of the infected plague in the game. In the titles , you will be referred  as "Design Consultant". + T-shirt with the symbol of the developers "Kava-Projects" with the corresponding anagram. The reward is limited. Also includes a reward for 250.
  • $ 5500 - the opportunity to send a photo to the developers which will be added to the game and  "stuck" to the face of one of the infected plague after processing and minimal changes. The ability to send developers a description, or a drawing of the room, which will be added to the game, after adjustments via the Skype conversation. The ability to write a letter that will be found in the game. In the credits, you will be referred to as "Design Consultant And Game Consultant". + T-shirt with the symbol of the developer "Kava-Projects" with the corresponding anagram. The reward is limited. Also includes a reward for $ 60. It is also partially possible to influence the plot.

 

 Team members

Andrew Didenko – everybody who is familiar with this fellow personally knows about his passion for games and observation developers' approach to different detail. Thanks to his  ambitions and principles, he  helps to realize the team's first dream. And he has already taken very important place of all our project: one of the founders of the team "Kava-projects", programmer, author. Despite of the difficulties, this guy is ready to move with the times and work generously took the time. To find out something new, to learn, to implement, to attempt, to seek a way out of the impasse. Perhaps, these words can emphasize his  qualities.

Andrew Karpov – from the very first second when this person has already been adult enough to keep in the hands a PC mouse everything that he did was aimed to the fact to find out as many games and their origins as possible at all. If there is at least some new, or unexplored nuance, or aspect in game development, he will be willing to learn it quickly or he will find a person, who will help him to tell and teach others. One of the founders of the team "Kava-projects", programmer, author and just a person who loves games so much that can give you some of them.

 

Anastasiia Kostina is the young lady who one of the few people was able to refute the theory "in order to create games – you should play a lot». From the childhood she has been the person interested in design, whose eyes see the missing trivia and are able to turn a beautiful item into the masterpiece. Unlike many of us, she was looking for herself too long, but she   has found the place where she is interested to work in. Lots of what you will see in this game is created by this person, who worked hard and tried to implement something great in the team development.

 

Bohdan Hrishchenko is a talented singer who thanks to his musical accompaniment will keep you in the voltage. Author of a number of ideas, adjustments, stories, which will let the world be more real, more than this, more interesting.

 

 

 

 

  

 

Julia Smakovskaya is a translator, reminiscent to the game’s developers that even in the awful nightmare a romance should take place. And a little bit of erotic. And the most important is to bring this game as many different native language speakers, as she will be able to.

 

 

 

 

 

Viktoriia Bespalova is another person who helps to share our project with a lot of people. What can be better than the author's translation? Correct! Only the author's translation with voice acting. From the very childhood she was fond of learning foreign languages and at the same time wanted to work on the radio. These days she is with us trying to apply her skills, talents and the desire into something really head-spinning.

 

 

 

Oksana Azarova is an artist who loves games with good quality no less than drawing for them. In breaks between drawing arts for the game she draws Till Lindeman and hopes that in this horror there would be a place for the terrible German musician. Thanks God, not to the most awful German artist. So far.

 

 

 

 

 

Ksenia Sokolovskaya - one of the most faithful critic-consultants of the game. Using her startling voice, she helps the team to affect, to interest and even to scare you much more.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Taisiia Silkina is an artist whose images inspired developers with a sense of the majestic, mysterious, dangerous and tempting places which you have to see in the game. It is very important in our ocupation to pass all the game's atmosphere and environment for a player , and without good artist in such a case it is hardly possible.

 

 

 

 

Risks

Risk and challenges. The development of any project is not risk free and there are no guarantees in life. Despite the fact that we are really a small team and every day we face with new difficulties, we always find the solution. We know and see how to achieve what we want and the closer we approach to our goal, the better we do it. We see a lot of ideas, their implementation and potential, but for the creation such a high-quality and volume game, we need to spend a lot of time and resources. The resources are limited and that’s why it is not enough to the embody the ideas in such way as we feel it, or for their implementation at all. Financial support is essential for us, because due to it depends the diversity and technical component of the game and speed of their implementation.

Raised funds will be used to improve the lighting, diversity and quality of the materials, number and quality of the characters, their animation, a variety of high-quality and picturesque scenes, as well as a variety of games as a whole. We are confident in our strength to implement our dream, which, of course, will be able to please fans of the genre of horror with new open game world.
story_txt:
The story We are the "KAVA Project" – a team of young developers from Ukraine. These days we want to pay your attention to the key features of our current project "Lingermia".In this single-user horror intertwines the mysterious mythology of ancient Egypt and the gloomy side of Victorian England – its folklore and events. Particular attention is given to a dreary, oppressive atmosphere, which was formed on the base of an epidemic, famine and mysterious murders. From the very first minutes it becomes evident that the situation around is no longer to be saved and it is worth only thinking about saving ourselves.Wandering through the eerie corners of the «Lingermia" world, you will face with not only the natural problems of England of that time, but also spiritual forces, from which it is not so easy to escape ... However, in spite of the horror that has already filled everything up to the foundation, you will play for the main character, who can still bring a piece of light into this dark realm of death. Moreover, in the game you will find lots of references to real or fictional events that have become a dispensable part of the history of Victorian England. At the same time, the events are not developing chaotically here, but according to the plot in the spirit of the best films and books of similar themes. We, as developers, were inspired by such famous works as «Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde» by Robert Lewis Stevenson, «Dracula» by Bram Stoker, «Plague» by Albert Camus as well as such films as «Van Helsing» by Stephen Sommers, «Sweeney Tod: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street» and Tim Burton's «Sleepy Hollow». It should be noted that the backgroound music of «Lingermia" is also an important aspect. The mysterious, uncanny, often frightening and tense music will accompany you during the game.The gameplay itself will not distract the players from the addictive plot, but will not let you relax either – there are many different dangers in the game which you will have to cope with regularly, and only at times you will be able to take a breath.In general, the «Lingermia» horror is a gloomy essence of fear, skilfully mixed with the no less friendly atmosphere of the reality of the past centuries. As developers we want to pay attention to all of the existing aspects of the genre of horror, and introduce something new creating a unique project of its kind. No doubt, it will be difficult for us to do it without your support, our dear players, therefore, we count upon your helpThe gameplayDuring the game you will hardly have the opportunity to fight, and therefore the main task is to survive. Walk around obstacles, hide, run, use the game world by which you are surrounded to your advantage, unravel secrets and find ancient relics including a strange bracelet.The stealth mode will be implemented in this game for the greater efficiency of which you will have to take care of the details. Otherwise, you have to run like hell hoping that you will not be caught. And the most interesting is that you do not know what each of them will do with the character. ''Sometimes death is too boring''.Do not forget that in order to learn more secrets you have to take risks more often and make up ways to solve problems. With each step there will be more secrets and it would be better not to miss the opportunity to trace at least one thread in this vast web of secrets.There will be a rather unusual mode of complexity of the game. There will be available a choice of a bone structure for the main character in addition to lighting, which will directly influence her abilities during the game. Make your way like a mouse, or run wherever your eyes go around. But what if you can not do either…The objectives55 000$ – the base version of the game. It includes a full translation into Russian, Ukrainian and English. The plot of the game will bring 30 hours of the gameplay on average, everything is in your hands and depending on your choice the consequences will vary. We do not limit you to the passage of one location, you can go in different ways, and therefore change the history of your character.60 000$ – a voice in French and German. The recording will take place in the recording studio with hiring of the actors suitable for voice acting.70 000$ - versions of the game for X-Box One and Sony Playstation 4.80 000$ – "Hard Edition". The edition includes additional material: rooms, dungeons, secret storerooms, new traps, riddles, as well as updated textures, models and sounds. Designed for more powerful computers.85,000$ - Shadow Mode. The mode contains additional content and gameplay for real horror fans. This addition should bring at least 10 hours of gameplay with new locations and monsters.93 000$ - "Secrets of Sutech". The edition which contains a history of almost 6000 years ago about how the First Werewolf King was born. New quests, materials, references and stories. All this will be in this big update.105 000$ - Extreme Edition. The edition which contains several modes of extreme survival. The point is not to win. The point is to survive.125 000$ - "Open World Edition". After a certain closed chapter in the game, a player will be given the opportunity to freely explore the world which we will present to you in free mode. The regime includes numerous new quest lines, stories, materials and certainly places for visits and studies. Now you are not limited to the horrors of certain locations, your eyes are opened to the whole valley, the city, the castle, caves, dungeons, abandoned temples and much more. The most important thing is that at this stage the whole concept is thought out and interconnected. You do not have to think about the fact that you will lose the road – just play and the game will answer you.135 000$ - Survival Multiplayer Mode. Have a horror night with your friends, unite, try to get out, and help each other to confront monsters. Or frame each other on purpose for the sake of your own survival. Games of common walk-through will give you emotions, adrenaline and the desire to repeat this game. There are many locations, plots, tasks and features. All this and much more will be waiting for you in this edition.200 000$ -  The best is yet to come.The rewards
$ 5 - mention and gratitude in the titles.
$ 10 - a poster of the game in e-form + a mention in titles. 
$ 17 – e-version of the game + the first update for free. Also, it includes a reward        for $ 10.
$ 35 – a matirial copy of the game with an autograph. Limited edition + 1 free update.
$ 60 - a poster and a material copy of the game with autographs + 1 free update.
$ 250 - e-book on the basis of which the game was created. Also, it includes a reward for $ 60.
$ 425 - the opportunity to write a letter that will be found in the game. The reward is limited. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Game Consultant".
$ 600 - the opportunity to write a letter that will be found in the game. The reward is limited + T-shirt with the "Kava-Projects" symbol. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Game Consultant". Also, it includes a reward for $ 60 + physical copy of the book.
$ 950 - the ability to write your own quest that will be adjusted by  the developers, and it will be implemented in the game. The reward is limited. In the titles , you will be referred  as "Scenario Consultant".
$ 1100 - the opportunity to send a description to the developers, or a drawing of the room, which, after adjustments via the Skype conversation, will be added to the game. The reward is limited. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Design Consultant".
$ 1350 - the opportunity to send a description to the developers, or a drawing of the room, which, after adjustments via the Skype conversation, will be added to the game. In the credits, you will be mentioned as "Design Consultant". The reward is limited. + T-shirt or shirt with the "Kava-Projects" symbol with the corresponding anagram. Also it  includes a reward for 60.
$ 2000 - the opportunity to make own location for the project with developers' corrections. The location can be made in two ways: made by you in 3D’s Max (any other 3D modeling program), or you can build the game straight in the game centre, then send your work to the developers. The reward is limited.
$ 2500 - the opportunity to make own location for the project with developers' corrections. The location can be made in two ways: made by you in 3D's Max (any other 3D modeling program), or you can build the game straight in the game centre, then send your work to the developers. The opportunity to write your own quest with developers' adjustments, and it will be implemented in the game. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Design and Scenario Consultant". + T-shirt or shirt with the symbol of the developer "Kava-Projects" with the corresponding anagram.  The reward is limited. Also includes a reward for $ 60. 
$ 3500 - the opportunity to send a photo to the developers, which after processing and with minimal changes will be "stuck" on the face of one of the people - limited, or on the face of one of the infected plague in the game. In the titles you will be mentioned as "Design Consultant". The reward is limited. Also includes a $ 250 reward.
$ 3750 - the opportunity to send a photo to the developers, which, after processing and with minimal changes, will be "stuck" to the face of one of the infected plague in the game. In the titles , you will be referred  as "Design Consultant". + T-shirt with the symbol of the developers "Kava-Projects" with the corresponding anagram. The reward is limited. Also includes a reward for 250.
$ 5500 - the opportunity to send a photo to the developers which will be added to the game and  "stuck" to the face of one of the infected plague after processing and minimal changes. The ability to send developers a description, or a drawing of the room, which will be added to the game, after adjustments via the Skype conversation. The ability to write a letter that will be found in the game. In the credits, you will be referred to as "Design Consultant And Game Consultant". + T-shirt with the symbol of the developer "Kava-Projects" with the corresponding anagram. The reward is limited. Also includes a reward for $ 60. It is also partially possible to influence the plot.
  Team membersAndrew Didenko – everybody who is familiar with this fellow personally knows about his passion for games and observation developers' approach to different detail. Thanks to his  ambitions and principles, he  helps to realize the team's first dream. story:
What is Wellcalm Master about?

There are many shops that offer material things for our pleasure. However, happiness isn't limited to what we can hold in our hands. Sometimes, meeting people that accept and support our ideas, which empower who really are, is what we really need to be satisfied in life. Despite knowing that, It is rare to find people that will provide these. Hence, we created a professional service that will meet and fulfill your needs.

Introducing Wellcalm Master.  An Online Virtual Host Club, that focuses on providing a convenient and easy way to meet professional host that will highlight your potential as a person and provide the emotional and psychological needs that you are searching for. 

The Entrance for a Secure Log-in to your Personal Account

Website Features that is made for a Master

  • Easily accessible with a google chrome browser, no downloads or plugins required
  • Relaxing music box to accompany your browsing experience
  • Personal and Secure login feature
  • Sky Bar Theme - for Love and Belongingness
  • Beach Cafe Theme - for Esteem and Recognition
  • Cocktail and Coffee Tokens used to initiate a session
  • Different Male and Female Anime-style Hosts to choose from
  • Real Person with every session, no bots. 
  • Private Room for a 1 on 1 voice chat
  • Flexible interaction via text, voice or video chat capabilities
  • Your Personal MiniBar and Personal Master Ledger
  • Control your session time and resume your session easily when disconnected.
  • Tip your favorite host and gain a valuable companion

Two Main Themes to Choose from - More coming soon

 

Who needs this service?

  • Relationship Problems, or not having any relationship at all
  • Not understood by peers, not having a place to belong. 
  • Workplace problems with your colleague or boss
  • Need a pep talk before a big event or important presentation
  • Worried about a decision or situation in your life, let's talk about it. 
  • A sensitive topic you can't open to anyone you know, we are here for you. 
  • School problems or examination that you are nervous about
  • A haunting guilt that can't be resolved
  • Failures in life that is keeping you down
  • Your Topic is our Priority, test us and you will not regret it. 

1 on 1 Interactive Private Chat Room with your Host

The Token System

A Master is given tokens to initiate interaction with a host. Cocktail Tokens are used in the Sky Bar, while Coffee Tokens are used in the Beach Cafe. You have full control on how you spend your tokens, and each token is priced at $3 (discounted to $2 for backers). Initiating a session costs 1 token with a 10-minute countdown, easily visible over the website. You can easily extend your time with the Extend Timer button at a cost of 1 Token. You can also give tips to your host with your tokens. All Transactions are easily tracked and recorded instantly in Master Ledger inside your Master Sanctum.  The Token System will give full control on your experience with us, as we want to give you freedom and transparency to enjoying our service. 

About  Us

My name is Roberto, and my career as a nurse lead me to realize the holistic need of humans.  I have personally experienced how stress and emotional strains can bring you down and prevent you from being effective in your goals. Furthermore, accumulation of these bad vibes makes us more susceptible from being tired and failure due to exhaustion. Some are lucky to have a support group to help them in need, but support groups are not always available.  So together with my trusted friends and professional freelance instructors, we want to create a virtual host club where you can easily and conveniently find a professional to help you in the difficult situations and recharge yourself. 

Together with our team of graphic designers, programmers, business administration consultants and our expert hosts, we would like to bring you a comfortable, secure environment to express yourself and have a companion ever supportive and caring for your needs. 

Our Goal for the Service:

Inspiration is something that you can never have too much of. We all go through life, trying to achieve our professional goals, trying to find rewarding relationships, trying to reach a spiritual understanding, and sometimes, the challenges before us can seem a little overwhelming. You can get food, water, and shelter any number of ways, but when it comes inspiration and internal support, the path forward is not always quite so clear-cut. This is where Wellcalm Master comes into the pictures. 

A Virtual Host Club, Welllcalm Master makes companionship more accessible than ever. Helping you to do all that you want to do and be all that you can be. Our platform is designed to move people away from their negative habits and toward their best possible selves. There is no reason that you need to go on daydreaming about rising up from your current situation: you can turn that daydream into reality, and we can help you along the way. Your emotional needs will finally be under your control!

Our Funding Goal Explained

We have come to you, Indiegogo, in order to raise the start-up capital that we need to bring Wellcalm Master to life. Our current funding goal is $500, and every dollar that we raise toward that goal helps tremendously. $500 will help us maintain a secure domain, free of advertisements and harmful things throughout your Master Experience. To provide easy and interactive functions on the website, we will need to purchase premium apps for an easy and dynamic experience for our users. We set our goal to the minimum as we would like to invite users to use the service and have a continuous partnership towards making an amazing journey on a Master's life. 

As a thank-you, we have put together some exciting rewards, just our way of showing our appreciation for your crucial role in getting this inspiration platform up and running!

How do you quantify support that will make it possible for you to find emotional and spiritual peace? This is a priceless commodity and one that we are excited to make more accessible than it has ever been before. Water, food, these are things that you can get anywhere: inspiration is harder to find, and when you do find it, you want to hold onto it. Wellcalm Master is going to make it dramatically easier for people throughout the world to find the inspiration they so seriously need in their lives.

Because Wellcalm Master is based on such a novel idea, this idea that inspiration does not need to be so difficult to find, it is going to take some effort to find an audience at first. We are convince, however, that once we start building our initial audience, people will start to take to the platform in droves. Whatever challenges arise along the way, we will be ready to face them intelligently.

Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by spreading the word about our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people know what we are doing, the smoother our launch will go. Your support is appreciated. Thank you!

Blog posts: 

"WELLCALM MASTER – A NEW BROWSER-BASED SIMULATION GAME" by Otaku Diary

http://otakudiary.com/wellcalm-master-a-new-bro...

"Wellcalm Master is a new platform that introduces a modern take on Humanistic Psychology in a personal and life-changing session conveniently accessed through a web browser." by Freelancer Garden in Medium

https://medium.com/@freelancergarden/how-psycho...

story:
I am the mother of a child, his name is Kevin, his passion is video games for some time he has asked me to give him a computer to play and make live videos like what boys do today, since January I have been without work for which I have resorted to making this fundraiser to be able to buy for my son what he wants so much and that for him is a passion and what I want most is to support him.

Thank you.
story_txt:
I am the mother of a child, his name is Kevin, his passion is video games for some time he has asked me to give him a computer to play and make live videos like what boys do today, since January I have been without work for which I have resorted to making this fundraiser to be able to buy for my son what he wants so much and that for him is a passion and what I want most is to support him.
Thank you.

story:
Support Fectar for building the new AR Creator Tool: Fectar Studio

Fectar is a successful app to view interactive 3D presentations in reality, so called Augmented Reality. And it works on average smartphones, both Android and iOS. You download the app to view all sorts of amazing content for free.

Now you can create your own Augmented Reality (AR) experiences!

We need your funding to build the next version of Fectar Studio, a no-coding AR Creator Tool.

Users love Fectar:
almost a million installations worldwide!

We started building Fectar about a year ago and launched the app on January 20, 2020. With more than 2,500 reviews we get a 4.2 rating. Now you too can join Fectar to set up your own channel and get followers for your 3D presentations.

Augmented Reality will change the way we game, learn, shop, collaborate and more

Currently more than 1.4 billion devices worldwide are able to support Augmented Reality applications such as Fectar. How big is a polar bear? What is the difference between an African and an Asian elephant? Travel through space and visit all the planets in our solar system.

 

This is a great way of experiencing whole new things. There are tons of AR spaces available. And now you can also create your own interactive Augmented Reality presentations.

 

Create your own Interactive 3D Presentations

without any technical skills
The Fectar app is free for viewers, so that everyone can enjoy Augmented Reality and share knowledge. That is why we are developing Fectar Studio, an AR Creator Tool for creators and for companies and schools to make their own presentations, course ware and fun games.

 
 

Fectar Studio: AR Creator Tool

AUG '20
RELEASE NEW VERSION FECTAR STUDIO

1. Design Your Presentation

  • Get inspired
  • Make content​

2. Create 3D Space

  • Upload your content
  • Place in 3D​ using Spatial Editing

3. Publish​ & Share

  • Publish to free app
  • In your own channel
  • Share with the world
  • Get followers for your channel

4. Analyse

  • See your results
  • Review and change

COMING SOON:
Fectar Studio with VIRTUAL REALITY!

We have prepared the first beta Fectar app for the Oculus Quest, a powerful standalone VR device. Depending on your funding, we are planning to release the VR version of the Fectar app in November 2020. Here is a sneak preview of Virtual Reality with the Fectar app:
 

The same content you create in Fectar Studio for Augmented Reality, you can now use for Virtual Reality as well (and vice versa). We keep you posted when you buy a license for Fectar Studio. Get all the updates and be the first to launch your Virtual Reality experience!

Create and Manage your AR Presentations

Multi User, Multi Device and Cross Platform with Real Time Dynamic Content

If you want to learn about Augmented Reality and new learning journeys, you can now start with Fectar Studio.​ This Content Creator Tool comes with statistics to measure your success in AR and VR.

Special Feature (already working in Fectar Studio):
Holographic Teacher or Presenter

Use your smartphone to add a holographic teacher or presenter to your presentation. Stand in front of a green screen, film it with your smartphone, upload the movie in Fectar Studio, adjust the settings and you're done. Fectar Studio removes the green background, no video editing afterwards.

 

Get Your Own Branded Channel and Followers

With Fectar Studio, you get your own channel in the free Fectar app. We have more almost a million installations of our app after the launch January 2020. Now you can show your interactive 3D creations to the whole world or to a restricted group of viewers. And you can build up your own crowd of followers in the app.

​

  • Add your logo
  • Show a header picture
  • Featured spaces
  • Overview of all your other content

Add all Sorts of Content in AR

Start your interactive presentation with the push of a button. You don't need to install any software, because it all works in your browser. Just click on the type of content you want to add:

  • Pictures
  • Videos
  • Audio
  • 360 photo & video 
  • 3D objects (OBJ, glTF and Unity Asset Bundles)
  • Questions with feedback
  • Buttons
  • Hyperlinks
  • and more.

No Programming

You don't need to be a programmer or designer to make great AR (and soon also VR!) presentations.​ Fectar Studio is a no coding solution. And because it is cloud based, you don't need to install any software.

Share Your Creations

When you publish your creation, it is immediately available for devices to view. And when you change it, it changes real time on all devices. You are in control of your content.​

And you can share your creations, on- and offline. With deeplinks, QR Codes and unique Space Codes.

----------------------

Fectar contributes to a Sustainable Future

Reduce carbon footprint and waste
Fectar enables working together on an average smartphone from everywhere and save time and energy. Augmented Reality reduces carbon footprints by negating the need for travel and by reducing resources used to plan real-world activities. People can share their work in Fectar and collaborate effectively in an AR workspace unconstrained by the need for physical spaces. 

Test and use a virtual product before its build
Fectar also allows us to imagine and test new machines and objects long before the need to build them. With the Fectar app you can do training simulations to perfect design of new tools. AR technologies can help reduce the number of physical prototypes required in the visual design process, thereby reducing material waste.

Learning made easy
Learning with virtual object means less use of physical resources. 

Fectar can help you imagine a better future
Our 3D presentations can improve understanding of sustainability issues. 

----------------------

This is us ;-)

During the lockdown (we are based in the Netherlands) we continue working from our homes.

We are building the next version of Fectar Studio, the best tool ever for creating AR presentations. We are Unity Experts, Full Stack Developers, Game developers, 3D modellers and Marketeers. Together we have more than 25 years of AR and VR experience.

First Priority when growing:
a more diverse team that is a better representation of the world we live in!

Your help to take Fectar to the Next Level: Pledges and Presentations

Your contribution is extremely important to us. Before the COVID-crisis we had an investor on board. However circumstances changed and this investor in no longer able to help us to the next level. Since a few months we are on our own. At the same time our app is growing and growing. Each day new videos appear on social media and YouTube from happy users. That motivates us and our families to move forward. Please help us take Fectar and Fectar Studio to the next level. You can help us by sponsoring us in these challenging times. And you help us when you create amazing presentations in Fectar Studio.

OUR TIMELINE '20 - '21

JAN '20 - LAUNCH FECTAR APP
                   Free app for Android and iOS 

APR '20 - 100,000 INSTALLATIONS
                   worldwide installs and great reviews

JUN '20 - 500,000 ANDROID INSTALLATIONS
                   4,2 rating 2,500 reviews

JUL '20  - LAUNCH FECTAR STUDIO V1
                   First creators setting up channels 

JUL '20  - INDIEGOGO CAMPAGNE
                   we need your help

AUG '20 - RELEASE VERSION 2 FECTAR STUDIO
                    create your own 3D presentations

NOV '20 - RELEASE FECTAR VIRTUAL REALITY
                    Fectar available in Oculus VR App Store

2021 - GROWING TO 5 MILLION INSTALLATIONS

-----------------------

Risk & Challenges

We have been working really hard for these past 12 months to make the best Augmented Reality app possible. And it is working. People love our app (in less than 6 months time almost 1 million installs with a 4.2 rating with more than 2,500 reviews). And we made a choice to keep the app free. No annoying pre-roll ads or other form of advertising, because this will stand in the way of our users to experience AR.

Technically we are experienced with the risks involved in running a fast growing app. The whole platform is built on Microsoft Azure, a scalable and secure foundation for further growth. The architecture of Fectar is based on Privacy by Design in order to comply with international privacy standards. 

With Fectar Studio we want content creators, such as businesses and schools to create engaging content. That is why we have set up a licensing business model. And we have started selling our first licenses and this increases each week (even during these challenging COVID times). However our pricing is low, so we need to get a lot of businesses and schools on board to get a higher business turnover. On the other side, our costs a relatively low and limited in relation to our growth.

The first schools are starting with Fectar Studio!

We are convinced that we are on the right path. Because every  business model begins and ends with the experience of the user of our app! And we have more than enough proof that our users are on board, worldwide! And with your help, we can take it to the next level!

-----------------------

SPECIAL PERK:
EARLY ACCESS AR GAME PACK

'Wait! I am not a content creator! How can I sponsor your project?'

We have a special perk for you: fun Augmented Reality Games.  Get early access to a special game pack we are going to release.

Four different games in 1 package for just € 10 

  • Noire 2 - Escape Room

  • Walking the Plank

  • Save our Village

  • +one bonus games

NORMAL PRICE € 25  ONLY NOW € 10

Shoot the Dragon (included in Early Acces AR Game Pack)

"Our village is under attack! Can you help us kill the dragon with your canon?'
Solve the puzzle and kill the dragon!

AR Escape Room: Noire 2 (included in Early Acces AR Game Pack)
Play the world's first Augmented Reality Escape Room: Noire. Part 1 is already available for you to try. Part 2 is almost ready for the launch. Get early access and see how long it will take you to solve this crime.

Walking the Plank in Augmented Reality (included in Early Acces AR Game Pack)
Scared of Heights? No? Are you sure?

And one more mystery game!
Get Early Access to this Special AR Game Pack with this special perk.

-----------------------

OUR PERKS

Help us build Fectar Studio and keep the Fectar app free for our viewers.

EARLY ACCES AUGMENTED REALITY GAME PACK
NORMAL PRICE € 25  ONLY NOW € 10

THREE MONTHS LICENSE FECTAR STUDIO 
NORMAL PRICE € 15  ONLY NOW € 5

ONE YEAR LICENSE FECTAR STUDIO
NORMAL PRICE € 60  ONLY NOW € 15

LIFE TIME LICENSE FECTAR STUDIO
NORMAL PRICE € 1.000  ONLY NOW € 49

Download the free app to see more examples or visit our YouTube Channel to see many different demo's: www.YouTube.com/Fectar
