story:
Berehalem The Orikan Stone is a side scroller RPG that takes place in a magical world called Ormonh.
The player will explore amazing  game mechanics like complex battle system based in real martial arts (Kendo, Aikido and Karate Goju Ryu). All the while exploring many places as a sandbox with an upgradable caravan driven by your buddy Doulh the Frog.

Enter this journey of a new generation side scroller with amazing art direction.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Berehalem The Orikan Stone is an indie game currently in development with a kick starter campaing that will soon be released on Steam Store.
This game is a side scroller RPG that takes place in a magical world called Ormonh.

This world is divided between two divine factions: The Azariah and the Zuggul.

Two different forces that have opposed ideals! 

Azariahans cohabit in peace with all living beings and they believe Ormonh was created to be a place of harmony in the universe. Their duty is to protect it from all evil, especially the Zuggul.

On the other hand, Zuggul are against the Azariah. They believe living beings were created to serve them and to be hunted.

You will play as an Azariahan  called Sahnu  and embark on a journey to a fantastic medieval and technological world with RPG and sandbox mechanics, and a complex battle system created using motion capture tech with the colaboration of real martial arts masters.

 

The Orikan Stone and Berehalem are somehow separated.

The Orikan Stone is the first chapter of a big storyline that we will release. Berehalem is the main title of a large story written by Guilherme Silva and also the name of one of the most powerful divine creatures within the games' universe.

The Orikan Stone takes place in the country known as Sirhils. This is where the player takes control of Sahnu, a 19 year old boy that was brought up under the name of an old swordsman, Hyune, since he was a child.

The story begins when a group of Zuggul attack Hyune and steal the amulet which contains the Orikan Stone.

Your main quest will be travelling to another country and tell other Azariahans  that The Orikan Stone has been stolen.  You will encounter many challenges throughout your path and will discover that you are an ancient Azariahan soul.

You will fight very powerfull bosses during your travels and try to retrieve The Orikan Stone before a cataclysm happens in Ormonh.

 

  • Deep and immersive narrative
  • Character progression and customization
  • Ability to make choices that really affect your progression
  • Quest based gameplay structure
  • Rich and interactive maps
  • Caravan with housing / travel mechanics 
  • Complex battle system with both weapons and bare hands 
  • Magic, loot, XP and level up systems  
  • Gear with variable stats

Magic in the Berehalem universe is very unique and you cannot become a mage merely by practicing or studying it.

In the world of Berehalem, magic is a divine seal to the Azariahan soul. Each Azariahan possesses spells and powers based on his element.

In Orikan Stone, Sahnu has the element of fire and three magic skills:

  • Fireball

 

  • Fire Shield

 

  • Fire Chain

 

 

In the Berehalem universe, Azariahans and Zuggulls have their main weapons connected to their soul. Each weapon is unique and has its own characteristics. You can use other weapons but they are not as effective to kill a Zuggul.

You also have access to melee and ranged weapons:

Melee weapons

  • Axes
  • Daggers
  • Hammers
  • Iron fist
  • Nunchaku!
  • Short, medium and heavy swords
  • Spears
  • Sticks

Ranged weapons

  • Bow
  • Crossbow
  • Mechanical hand that shoots darts
  • Rocks
  • Shuriken

We wish to increase the arsenal made available to the player but these are the current options.

 

(being textured)

The Caravan will be a very important feature in the game.

With the Caravan, you will be able to travel to other places, furnish it with your loot during travels and other events.

The entirety of the caravan is upgradable.

What can you do with those upgrades?

  • Armor improvements
  • Customize its exterior look
  • Get faster wheels  
  • Upgrade storage room
  • Upgrade weapons 

 

 

We intend to make every single object related to the caravan interactable​. 

Also, you are not alone in the Caravan. You will be accompanied by Doulho the Frog.

 

This project began some months ago by a small team of three people, after the completion of a good storyline and game concept.

The plot was created by Guilherme Silva, as well as the art and musical composition. In-game  code is being written by Luís Miguel. SFX are being handled by Ivo Simões. Also, we received some help for concept art and building sketches by Marcela Santana.

We are passionate about the gaming industry and have been working hard on this project. This campaign is very important because, with the kickstarter funds, it will be possible to fully develop this game and, if everything goes the right way, one day establish our own game studio for further releases.

We aim to mix art and gameplay in an incredible gaming experience.

 

We've divided our objectives in 3 main stages. This is prone to change due to how early in devolopment the game still is. Updates will be released as progress is made.

 

 

All the funds go to Berehalem The Orikan Stone' s devolopment, even if we cannot reach our set goal.

​

The game is being developed with Blender and Unity.

We started with Autodesk Maya (student version) but due the comercial license pricing we are working with Blender.

We are in an initial phase, building the world of Berehalem. We already have some models and code done:

  • Noguya a magical creature  (done ✓)
  • Initial behavior trees for npc and characters  (done ✓) 
  • Environment elements (mountains, nature elements, etc) 
  • Initial models and props
  • Written story line (done ✓)
  • Proper game design 
  • Pick up item system  (done ✓)
  • First level nature 
  • First and second village concept art 
  • Game sound track  (done ✓)
  • Game animals and environment sound design  (done ✓) 
  • Game name and logo licence 
  • Death system and check point  (done ✓) 
  • Main menu prototype (done ✓)
  • Save and load game (done✓)

 

 

We are in the beginning of a project which has our full commitment. However, we lack the necessary resources to reach our full development capacities.

Other than the funding, we find it important to build a passionate community which Indiegogo can provide us with.

If you like this project and you would like to see the game being released, we would be very grateful if you'd participate in this campaign, sharing this and perhaps purchasing a perk.

Perks are our way to gather the resources needed to build the game. Choose the perk that suits you best and contribute to our crownfunding directly.

You will get special items with every perk. For example:

  • The Blacksmith if you like weapons art work 
  • The Reader if you are interested in reading the game's storyline 
  • The Luthier if you want to have the soundtrack arrangements for classical guitar
  • The Orikan Stone amulet perk to wear it whenever you want

You can see all the perks in the right corner, at the beginning of the page. There are 13 perks to choose from.

Note 1 - All backers will have their name in the game's credits (except the Beggining of a Journey perk) and receive game updates in their mail box.

Note 2 - Delivery time is only for the perk's title. The correspondent perks items' delivery time may vary.

Our game will not be only a game but a piece of art.

 

One of our biggest  setbacks may be the lack of funding which will delay the proposed launch date.

We know it is a challenge to build a game from scratch, but we have already taken ourselves up to this task of finish it.

 

Funding us is not the only way you can help us.

Share our Facebook/Twitter pages and our kickstarter page and be updated!

Feel free to share your critics and opinions with us.

We need your feedback to build a better world of Berehalem for the community!

We need your feedback to build a better world of Berehalem for the community!

story:
Historia

 Vinilo eSports Club 

La primera convocatoria a la piscina de inversión se inició el 5 de enero del 2020 con el afán de llegar a construir un equipo de eSports ecuatoriano que sea referente en el país y Latino américa. El equipo nace el 26 de septiembre del 2019 como prueba para ver el desempeño y la posibilidad de rentabilizar un equipo de e sports ecuatoriano multidisciplinario con una inversión de $8118 dólares la cual a la fecha asciende a $19320 dólares entre computadoras gamers, arriendo del establecimiento, torneos en los que se ha participado, servicios básicos entre otros, los equipos de computación están instalados en nuestra sala gamer dedicada únicamente para entrenamientos del equipo de Fortnite el cual se reclutó mediante torneos con costo de 10 dólares. 

Dentro del equipo ya contamos con 12 jugadores de Fortnite divididos en 2 divisiones las cuales son 8 en división de aspirantes (segunda división) y 4 en división reclutas (tercera división) de los cuales una vez logren pasar las pruebas y logren demostrar ser los mejores del equipo ascenderán al equipo profesional (primera división) 4 jugadores que recibirán un pago mensual de $200 dólares más auspicios a torneos nacionales e internacionales, pero para mantener el nivel se someterán a pruebas y se dará la oportunidad cada 3 meses a jugadores nuevos que demuestren ser mejores; en la primera y segunda división se firmaran contratos con cada jugador para respaldar el capital y también se exigirá exclusividad como jugadores con sanciones como inhabilitaciones como jugadores de esports y en caso de pasar a otros equipos se cobrará el costo inversión que se realice para cada jugador más el 500%; de todo el capital que se genere de ganancias en premios descontando impuestos y cualquier tipo de retención, el 50% se distribuirá entre inversionistas (25%) y sueldos del equipo entre otros gastos (25%), el 50% será para el jugador o equipo que ganó dicho premio. También estamos realizando una convocatoria para el 11 de enero del 2020 para jugadores de Super Smash Bros el 25 de enero del 2020 será para jugadores de League of Legends y se continuarán agendando fechas para equipos de Fifa, CSGO, Call of Duty, Dota 2 entre otros. 

Torneo Fortnite hotel Sheraton Guayaquil

Torneo Celerity Guayaquil

Entrevista team Vinilo

Sala de entrenamientos team Vinilo

Este proyecto nace con Esteban Armendáriz a la cabeza como manager del equipo al ver el potencial de los jugadores del Ecuador y la falta de incentivos y preparación profesional que existe a pesar de ser uno de los negocios que más ganancias ofrece en la actualidad, a continuación citamos algunos vídeos de referencia que explican un poco más del tema: 

2017 Una explicación interesante de los esports: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fu6zWemA3co&amp... 

Los Worlds 2019 de League of Legends: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wX4m6G56iS4 

Los campeonatos más prestigiosos de eSports en la actualidad: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AdqfxO9sJZA 

LOS 5 JUGADORES MÁS RICOS DE LOS ESPORTS 2018: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5XxgygcM0-U 

Bugha gana 3 millones de dólares en un torneo de Fortnite y asciende el pozo de premios a 100 millones de dólares: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WKl4EoRIlz4 

Conozcan un poco a algunos de los jugadores del team Vinilo eSports Club https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UMKaokBPOHI 

El modelo de inversión se basa en un modelo de niveles en el cual desde los 100 dólares hasta los 5000 dólares puedes ingresar a la piscina de inversión y mantener tu posición durante el tiempo deseado ya que los 4 primeros niveles se renovarán cada año y el quinto nivel será una inversión de por vida; los cupos de inversión serán limitados a 360 socios los cuales tendrán una posición de por vida siempre y cuando renueven su posición al 31 de enero de cada año.

Vinilo eSports Club es el primer equipo del país (Ecuador) que busca profesionalizar y firmar jugadores en Fortnite, LoL, Dota 2, SuperSmashBros, CSGO, entre otros, Estamos buscando socios capitalistas los cuales obtendrán un % de las ganancias de los premios monetarios que el equipo logre ganar para esto tenemos 5 opciones de inversión. 

● Nivel Bronce: Inversión anual de $10 dólares disponible para máximo 250 inversionistas los cuales obtendrán una posición en nivel plata, oro o diamante cuando lleguen a la meta de referir 10 inversionistas en nivel plata, 2 inversionistas nivel oro, 1 inversionista nivel diamante y 1 inversionista nivel épico recibe subidón a nivel oro, una vez completado podrán ir subiendo de niveles mientras más referidos lleguen.

● Nivel Plata: Inversión anual de $100 dólares disponible para máximo 250 inversionistas los cuales obtendrán el 5% de premios divididos entre todos los que aporten con capital. 

● Nivel Oro: Inversión anual de $500 dólares disponible para máximo 50 inversionistas los cuales obtendrán el 5% de premios divididos entre todos los que aporten con capital. 

● Nivel Diamante: Inversión anual de $1000 dólares disponible para máximo 50 inversionistas los cuales obtendrán el 10% de premios divididos entre todos los que aporten con capital. 

● Nivel Épico: 1 Inversión de por vida de $5000 dólares disponible para máximo 10 inversionistas los cuales obtendrán el 5% de premios divididos entre todos los que aporten con capital. Si deseas conocer nuestras instalaciones o obtener más información contáctenos y programamos una cita también puedes seguirnos en nuestros canales de youtube, facebook, twitch, mixer, etc los días miercoles y domingos a las 7pm se responderán inquietudes sobre la inversión en vinilo, los esports en el país y lo que se viene para el equipo. 

En este link puedes conectarte a los directos y entrenamientos del team Vinilo: https://www.facebook.com/viniloesportsclub/ 

#VamosVinilo

Riesgos y desafíos

En la actualidad contamos con una fan page con mas de 2100 seguidores y 1800 likes en apenas 3 meses demostrando el interés de la gente por nuestro team, por ese motivo iniciamos la campaña de crowdfunding. Como en todo proyecto existe riesgos nosotros nos esforzamos día a día en minimizarlos creando contratos para nuestros jugadores en los cuales se comprometen a jugar única y exclusivamente con el equipo al igual que con la opción de brindar apertura a nuevos jugadores de retar y tomar el lugar de los que están dentro del equipo profesional cada 3 meses obligamos a nuestros gamers mantener y mejorar su nivel constantemente y asi garantizar la inversión que se realiza en cada jugador, y también su contribución del 50% de lo recaudado en premios. Este proyecto al tener una reinversión anual en los 3 primeros niveles nos aseguramos una constancia de capital para así lograr alcanzar los objetivos de world cups de los diferentes juegos

story:
Probable poker is an app that gives you the edge at the online poker table by giving you the odds that your hand will be the better hand.

The best part ? It's completely automated and once set up you can let it run from hand to hand -  it will automatically detect cards through image recognition and calculates your chances of success.


Does this spoil the fun ? Absolutely not!  There will always be the element of chance to leave you on edge... and if this app will make you more profit who's going to complain? 

Easy to Use

We have made the app really simple to use, simply select the cards on screen and let the app do the rest. 


You won't even have to select them each hand, let the app detect card changes and update the odds!


Odds Calculation

The app will show you the chance of beating the average hand. How is this done -  efficient probability calculation is used to go through all possible hands and calculate the chances of winning. 


Use Of Funds

The app is currently in late development stages and a working prototype can be seen in actual use in the app video. However, there is still considerable investment required before the app is retail quality. Quite a bit of testing and overall refinement is left, not to mention the ongoing server costs together with our time and effort.

If targets are not met, all funds raised will be refunded automatically as per standard IndieGogo procedures.

Current Application Limitations 

We have achieved a card recognition accuracy of over 99%, though we rarely have any wrong card detections - we can't eliminate this possibility. However, we'll always tell you what cards have been recognized so you'll know if we've got it wrong.

Also, card recognition requires the cards selected to be a reasonable size - the more you enlarge the poker screen the better we can recognize the cards.

Share 

Let your poker friends know about this app , they'll surely thank you for it.. we will too !

story:
BigTalk – The Card Game That Ends Small Talk

A card game for you to enjoy meaningful conversation, make real connection & have fun



Are you tired of talking about the weather?

Or answering “how are you” the millionth time?

Then BigTalk is the card game for you.

BigTalk is born because we have had enough small talks just like you.

There are way more interesting things to talk about. 

Meaningful conversations should be made easy for everybody.


BigTalk allows you to build a deeper connection with your date, friends or families, while enjoying great conversations and having a fun time together through a series of engaging questions and hilarious game rules.


 

                         ✔ Start meaningful conversations with anybody easily
                         ✔ Make real connections with people
                         ✔ Have lots of laughs and a great time
                         ✔ Get to know your date, friends or families deeper than ever
                         ✔ Never run out of interesting conversation topics
                         ✔ Turn any boring social gathering into a memorable experience
                         ✔ Spend quality time with your loved ones
                         ✔ Break the boundaries and talk about anything


1. To start the game, each player draws a Question & Action Card into hand.


2. Next, one player draws a Rule & Penalty Card and reads it out loud. Every player must obey the rule for one round.


Each icon represents a category of questions:

3. Every player then takes turn to answer the question on his/her Question & Action Card, while complying with the rule.


4. What if someone breaks the rule or refuses to answer?The player would have to perform whatever penalty is on the Rule & Penalty Card.


5. After answering a Question & Action Card, you earn the action on the card. Put the card on table in front of you, and activate the one-time action at any time.


6.  After one round, draw new Question Cards and a new Rule Card.




BigTalk basic game contains:


BigTalk Deluxe Edition Leather Bag:




The games is brought to you by a team of event organizer and marketer who are passionate of games and enjoy meaningful conversation. This game is created because life is too short for small talks, and we ought to make real connections with one another. Please help make this game a reality if you resonate with us. Many thanks and hugs.


Risks & Challenges

There may be a risk of delays (up to 30 days) during shipping, so the delivery date is estimated with a pessimistic approach.

story:
Land of Echoes is a turn based post-apocalyptic survival game for PC. Estimated release date - March, 2017

This is a hobby project of mine that I have been working on for quite some time now. As a big fan of post-apocalyptic theme eventually I decided to make it more complex and immersive and added a bunch of new features. The video shows you what is done so far to give you the maximum information about the project. Your feedback and support will determine if this project has a future so please comment - any thought, opinion or suggestion will be greatly appreciated. If you have any questions please leave it in the comment section or contact me through the "Ask a question" option - I will gladly respond to everyone as soon as I can.

 

March, 2018
An unknown virus begins to spread throughout the world. It was more devastating than anything we have ever seen before sweeping hundreds of millions of lives into oblivion.

As governments fall pure chaos ensues. Military arsenals around the world are left in hands of paranoid generals. Fear and political mistrust mounts with each hour!

October 5th, 2019

Claiming that the virus is actually a biological weapon and the first step of U.S. strategy to establish control in South East Asia, North Korea launches a nuclear attack on its southern neighbor targeting U.S. forces locations.

U.S. counter-strikes trigger a chain reaction that drags in China and Russia and escalates into a mutually destructive nuclear showdown!

...and so, plunging the world into nuclear apocalypse we swiftly finished what the disease had started!

20 years later survivors are living mostly in countryside. The water is polluted and food is scarce. Factions are formed to provide security from bandits. As more gangs and factions emerge from the wasteland violent conflicts erupt.

 

You begin as a member of a faction called “Skiff”. A faction eliminated by a powerful rivaling gang calling themselves “Federals”.

You now roam the wasteland trying to survive, looking for friends and allies to help the resistance forces stop the reign of “Federals”.

 

  • Locations

Find and search different locations. Abandoned buildings, old vehicles, crash sites, survivor camps, secret locations etc. There will be up to 80 different locations.

 

  • Search

Search every location for items and special encounters. Use tools like crowbars and flashlights to increase your search success. Search forest for mushrooms, berries, plants etc. Use axes, machetes etc. to gather woods for campfire or material to craft different items.

 

  • Meet people

Meet different people from different factions. Talk, trade or fight to get what you need.
 

  • Food and Water

Find food and water to stay alive. You can find plants, berries, mushrooms. Catch insects, snakes or build traps for small animals. You can also trade or kill other humans to get their food. Look out for old or raw food. Most foods can expire and get worse with each turn. Eating old or raw food can cause health problems.  You can cook raw food.

 

  • Health

Look after unit health, physical condition and morale by providing medicine, bandages, trauma kits and painkillers. Coffee, cigarettes and alcohol can be used to boost morale. Physical condition can be regained by setting up camps and resting. Low health and trauma decrease the amount of moves your unit can make per turn. Low stats increase chance of getting diseases and traumas while wandering the wasteland. Higher stats minimize the chance of getting injuries while searching locations and allow you to use your weapons more effectively.

 

  • Equipment

Equip your units with weapons, helmets and armor. There will be 8 weapon categories available – melee weapons, bows and crossbows, pistols, shotguns, sub-machine guns, assault rifles, machine guns, and hunting rifles. More than 50 weapons in total. Use bags to increase the amount of items and weight that your unit can carry. Clothes provide warmth and prevent from getting sick. Use binoculars and clothing with camouflage to increase your chances of avoiding bandits and other hostile elements. Use different tools to increase your search abilities. Some places need special tools to be searched (Wrench, Screwdriver, Pliers etc. are needed to search for spare parts in old vehicles).

 

  • Vehicle

Vehicle can be equipped with weapon and armor. Spare parts are needed to repair systems like engine, chassis, transmission etc. Fuel and oil is needed to drive. Driving without oil damages systems. Damaged systems increase vehicle fuel consumption. Using roads minimizes fuel consumption.

 

  • Camp

Create camps to rest your units and regain their physical condition. But look for the right weather conditions – starting a fire in bad weather can be difficult. Some weather conditions require a shelter in order to build a camp. For that you can use abandoned buildings, tents or build a shelter yourself. Vehicle can be used as shelter too. Use axes or machetes to gather dry woods for the fire. It is hard to build a fire with wet woods. Wet woods make you look after the fire more that is why your units will regain less physical condition when using wet woods for fire. Food and water is also required for a camp – the more pristine food you will use the more condition you will regain.

 

  • Weather

Different weather conditions have various consequences – in bad weather units can lose up to 2 moves per turn. Vehicle can lose 1 move per turn. Morale and physical condition decreases faster in bad weather conditions.

 

These are the features and stuff needed to finish the project.

  • Fighting

A fighting system must be created to resolve any conflicts you may have with the nice wasteland people.

 

  • Trading

Trading feature may come in handy when you do not have the ability to just take what you want.

 

  • Crafting

A crafting system is essential to make different useful items and weapons - cook food, make bandages from old rags, create medicine from plants, berries and mushrooms, build traps for small animals, create improvised shelters etc.

 

  • Content   

Other major part of the project that has to be created besides the Fighting, Trading, Crafting and other smaller systems is the content of the game.

-Map: Currently only 1/20 of the map is created. The game supports up to 6 such maps. If the project keeps growing new maps will be added with time allowing to explore huge areas and find interesting stuff and people.

-Locations and objects: at least 80 searchable objects and locations are planned.

-Lots and lots of items: at least 50 weapons are planned. Most firearms will have at least two types of ammo and attachments like scopes, lasers, suppressors etc. Armor, Helmets, Clothing, Vehicle parts, Food, Drinks, Medicine, Tools, Bags and many more.

-Characters and dialogues: Wasteland must be populated with different kind of lovely and not so lovely characters from different factions. Dialogues have to be created to make meeting with people more interesting.

-Sound: Sound effects must be added to liven the gameplay and overall experience.

 

  • Your name in game credits

A special section for backers only will be created to express gratitude for supporting the project.

 

  • Digital copy of the game + Name in credits

You will be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.

 

  • Name in an in-game document

Your name in a document that can be found and read in the game (Phone book page, Missing persons list etc.). You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.

 

  • Your name in Item description

You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.

 

  • Shared article

Your name in a fictional article or document together with other backers names. You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.

 

  • Individual article

Fictional article or document just about you. You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.

 

  • In game poster with your name

You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.
 

  • In game character (Friendly or Hostile)

An in game character with your name that players can trade or fight with.
You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.
NOTE: Hostile characters are not possible to trade with!!!
 

  • An in game character with dialogue (Friendly or Hostile)

Players can also trade or fight with your character. Additional information can be provided by you to personalize the dialogue!
You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.
NOTE: Hostile characters are not possible to trade with!!!
 

  • VIP Character

An in game character with your name that is part of a story and influences the game world. You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.

 

  • Raised funds

 

 

 

  • Game development

While I am willing to continue the work on the development using my own savings there are things I simply can not do on my own. In the above chart you can see the main areas where help from outside is needed. As this is quite a big project certain amount of money is needed to finish it, therefore FIXED funding option was chosen to assure backers that their money will be refunded if the goal isn't met.
story_txt: Land of Echoes is a turn based post-apocalyptic survival game for PC. Estimated release date - March, 2017This is a hobby project of mine that I have been working on for quite some time now. As a big fan of post-apocalyptic theme eventually I decided to make it more complex and immersive and added a bunch of new features. The video shows you what is done so far to give you the maximum information about the project. Your feedback and support will determine if this project has a future so please comment - any thought, opinion or suggestion will be greatly appreciated. If you have any questions please leave it in the comment section or contact me through the "Ask a question" option - I will gladly respond to everyone as soon as I can. March, 2018An unknown virus begins to spread throughout the world. It was more devastating than anything we have ever seen before sweeping hundreds of millions of lives into oblivion. As governments fall pure chaos ensues. Military arsenals around the world are left in hands of paranoid generals. Fear and political mistrust mounts with each hour!October 5th, 2019 Claiming that the virus is actually a biological weapon and the first step of U.S. strategy to establish control in South East Asia, North Korea launches a nuclear attack on its southern neighbor targeting U.S. forces locations. U.S. counter-strikes trigger a chain reaction that drags in China and Russia and escalates into a mutually destructive nuclear showdown!...and so, plunging the world into nuclear apocalypse we swiftly finished what the disease had started!20 years later survivors are living mostly in countryside. The water is polluted and food is scarce. Factions are formed to provide security from bandits. As more gangs and factions emerge from the wasteland violent conflicts erupt. You begin as a member of a faction called “Skiff”. A faction eliminated by a powerful rivaling gang calling themselves “Federals”.You now roam the wasteland trying to survive, looking for friends and allies to help the resistance forces stop the reign of “Federals”. LocationsFind and search different locations. Abandoned buildings, old vehicles, crash sites, survivor camps, secret locations etc. There will be up to 80 different locations. SearchSearch every location for items and special encounters. Use tools like crowbars and flashlights to increase your search success. Search forest for mushrooms, berries, plants etc. Use axes, machetes etc. to gather woods for campfire or material to craft different items. Meet peopleMeet different people from different factions. Talk, trade or fight to get what you need. Food and WaterFind food and water to stay alive. You can find plants, berries, mushrooms. Catch insects, snakes or build traps for small animals. You can also trade or kill other humans to get their food. Look out for old or raw food. Most foods can expire and get worse with each turn. Eating old or raw food can cause health problems.  You can cook raw food. HealthLook after unit health, physical condition and morale by providing medicine, bandages, trauma kits and painkillers. Coffee, cigarettes and alcohol can be used to boost morale. Physical condition can be regained by setting up camps and resting. Low health and trauma decrease the amount of moves your unit can make per turn. Low stats increase chance of getting diseases and traumas while wandering the wasteland. Higher stats minimize the chance of getting injuries while searching locations and allow you to use your weapons more effectively. EquipmentEquip your units with weapons, helmets and armor. There will be 8 weapon categories available – melee weapons, bows and crossbows, pistols, shotguns, sub-machine guns, assault rifles, machine guns, and hunting rifles. More than 50 weapons in total. Use bags to increase the amount of items and weight that your unit can carry. Clothes provide warmth and prevent from getting sick. Use binoculars and clothing with camouflage to increase your chances of avoiding bandits and other hostile elements. Use different tools to increase your search abilities. Some places need special tools to be searched (Wrench, Screwdriver, Pliers etc. are needed to search for spare parts in old vehicles). VehicleVehicle can be equipped with weapon and armor. Spare parts are needed to repair systems like engine, chassis, transmission etc. Fuel and oil is needed to drive. Driving without oil damages systems. Damaged systems increase vehicle fuel consumption. Using roads minimizes fuel consumption. CampCreate camps to rest your units and regain their physical condition. But look for the right weather conditions – starting a fire in bad weather can be difficult. Some weather conditions require a shelter in order to build a camp. For that you can use abandoned buildings, tents or build a shelter yourself. Vehicle can be used as shelter too. Use axes or machetes to gather dry woods for the fire. It is hard to build a fire with wet woods. Wet woods make you look after the fire more that is why your units will regain less physical condition when using wet woods for fire. Food and water is also required for a camp – the more pristine food you will use the more condition you will regain. WeatherDifferent weather conditions have various consequences – in bad weather units can lose up to 2 moves per turn. Vehicle can lose 1 move per turn. Morale and physical condition decreases faster in bad weather conditions. These are the features and stuff needed to finish the project.FightingA fighting system must be created to resolve any conflicts you may have with the nice wasteland people. TradingTrading feature may come in handy when you do not have the ability to just take what you want. CraftingA crafting system is essential to make different useful items and weapons - cook food, make bandages from old rags, create medicine from plants, berries and mushrooms, build traps for small animals, create improvised shelters etc. Content    Other major part of the project that has to be created besides the Fighting, Trading, Crafting and other smaller systems is the content of the game.-Map: Currently only 1/20 of the map is created. The game supports up to 6 such maps. If the project keeps growing new maps will be added with time allowing to explore huge areas and find interesting stuff and people.-Locations and objects: at least 80 searchable objects and locations are planned.-Lots and lots of items: at least 50 weapons are planned. Most firearms will have at least two types of ammo and attachments like scopes, lasers, suppressors etc. Armor, Helmets, Clothing, Vehicle parts, Food, Drinks, Medicine, Tools, Bags and many more.-Characters and dialogues: Wasteland must be populated with different kind of lovely and not so lovely characters from different factions. Dialogues have to be created to make meeting with people more interesting.-Sound: Sound effects must be added to liven the gameplay and overall experience. Your name in game creditsA special section for backers only will be created to express gratitude for supporting the project. Digital copy of the game + Name in creditsYou will be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section. Name in an in-game documentYour name in a document that can be found and read in the game (Phone book page, Missing persons list etc.). You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section. Your name in Item descriptionYou will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section. Shared article Your name in a fictional article or document together with other backers names. You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section. Individual articleFictional article or document just about you. You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section. In game poster with your nameYou will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section. In game character (Friendly or Hostile) An in game character with your name that players can trade or fight with.You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.NOTE: Hostile characters are not possible to trade with!!! An in game character with dialogue (Friendly or Hostile) Players can also trade or fight with your character. Additional information can be provided by you to personalize the dialogue!You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section.NOTE: Hostile characters are not possible to trade with!!! VIP CharacterAn in game character with your name that is part of a story and influences the game world. You will also be able to download the digital version of the game and your name will be added to the credits section. Raised funds   Game developmentWhile I am willing to continue the work on the development using my own savings there are things I simply can not do on my own. In the above chart you can see the main areas where help from outside is needed. As this is quite a big project certain amount of money is needed to finish it, therefore FIXED funding option was chosen to assure backers that their money will be refunded if the goal isn't met.

story:
Short Summary

Hi there. I'm Patric Henson, a card and board game designer from Wichita, KS. I grew up playing card games and board games, and I am very passionate about them. When I was younger, I often found myself noticing that certain rules could be improved, or slight alterations to games could be made to make them more fun. That naturally led into me making my own games!

This campaign is to produce the first of many games that I have designed; A deck-building game with a street racing theme. You purchase new parts for your vehicle and use a variety of driving maneuvers to speed past your opponents, but do mind the curves in the road! The game is complete with conditions such as rain, traffic, and police chases!

This game is, with the exception of a few minor and mostly cosmetic alterations, a finished project. It has been play-tested for countless hours, critiqued, improved, critiqued some more, and then improved some more etc., etc.

What We Need

If the funding goal is met the expenses will look like this:

  • The cost per unit is $43.24, plus $9.20 each to ship them to backers (that's what the shipping costed me to have the demo sent to my house)
  • Indiegogo Fees: $150
  • PayPal Fees: $150
  • This is a fixed funding project, so it will not be funded if I do not at least reach the funding goal (since I would lose a ton of money fulfilling backer rewards if I can't reach the bulk discount amount)
  • Total: $2,922 for 50 units of the game.
Obviously, my profit margin is nonexistent. The goal is just to get this game out to those who would enjoy it. I've put a lot into this game and I want to get it out there.

Stretch Goals

As it goes in production; Higher volume equals lower costs per unit, so the more money I save on production, the more value I will add to your rewards.

  • $6,000: Hand delivery! If we reach this goal, I will personally deliver backer rewards to local backers. This would apply to those living in the Wichita, KS metro area, but, given enough interest and support, I may be able to go further. Message me if you have any questions. Note: I reserve the right to opt to mail the rewards in the event that I cannot make contact with the backer or they are not present at agreed upon delivery time, or the delivery would be unsafe (dog in yard, etc).
  • $9,000:  RPM Street Poster! At this level, every backer who pledges at least $15 will receive a unique RPM Street poster along with any other applicable rewards!
  • $12,000: Big time quality upgrade! The game will be produced by Quality Playing Cards, Inc.; a company that has unparalleled quality and an A+ with the BBB (Better Business Bureau)!!
  • $15,000: The DUB Goal! Everyone will have their games doubled! Did you order 10 copies? If we hit $15k you'll get 20 instead! Even if you just ordered 1, you'll have 2 copies headed your way!

The Impact

This is a launching point for me to start doing something I really enjoy. I have about a dozen games at various levels of development. My goal is to make games that people will love to play as much as the games I grew up playing and the ones I play today. If I can get this game out there and get my foot into this niche field, it will segue into making many more games for everyone to enjoy!

Risks & Challenges

I have put so much time and effort into this game. Hundreds of hours spent around work, volunteering, and family obligations. It was a challenge to get this far, and I couldn't have done it without the support of my wonderful wife. The vast majority of the work on my end, development and design, is already done. I've already Trademarked my logo. All I need is the money to get my dream off of the ground.

If I reach the $12k stretch goal, I might have to change the format of my files somewhat, which could take some time. So if that is the case, it may or may not be delivered by the estimated date. Beyond that, I can't foresee anything else that has any reasonable chance of going wrong. If I run into anything unexpected, I will adapt. I have put far too much work into this game to give up that easily!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, if you like what I'm trying to accomplish here, please share this with your friends, especially those into cars or games. You can use social media, perhaps even share a link to the Facebook Pages of local gaming stores. So, please, use those share tools and make some noise about this campaign!

Thanks

I want to take the time to thank the authors from the robust creative commons community for their collective works that make up the images for this game.*

Note: The licencor's do not endorse this game. All photos used in conjunction with the creative commons license.

There are 4 Levels in the demo. more levels will be available on full version.

http://www.kosinsoft.com/demo/wtf.exe

story_txt: WTF Game! is 2D platform game with unique gameplay. I need to complete development the game. story:
About this Project

We need help making an English version of Pini engine.

We need $12,000 to translate from Korean to English.



What is Pini-Engine?

Pini engine is a game engine. You can make any games with it, but It is most focused on making visual novel and text adventure genres.

It helps developers who do not know in-depth programming to easily create games.

It supports <Windows>, <Android> and <iOS> builds and IDE can run on <Windows>, <Mac> and Linux.

You can add any feature of engine via Lua script.




Why use Pini-Engine?

There are various powerful features that can help non-programmers to create games.

These are Pini engine’s remarkable features :

  • Include script language that is really easy to learn.
    But it’s totally written in Hangul (Korean). We need to globalize it by using English.
  • And also includes powerful auto complete environment.
    When you write down codes, Help window will always follow your cursor
  • In-app-purchase (pay-to-win) feature can be added with just 2 lines of code
    You can make free-to-play game very easily. 
  • Ads cab be added with just clicking on a project setting menu
    You can use optimized ads from ADOP Inc to make profit
  • Guide lines for visualization of code flow
    Usually, the flow of visual novel is pretty complex. So we support flow chart manager for it. 
  • Pini engin also gives free resources that include background images and background musics. 


Why do we need your help?

At this moment, there is only a Korean version. But we want it to help every developer in the world. Getting a good quality translation takes money and efforts.

Without your help we can’t make the English version. Because we are not going to make it commercial. It be free for indie developers foever.


Indiegogo goals

If our Indiegogo is funded, we will translate the following in Pini engine

  • Every API
  • Every texts in IDE
  • Every Documents in official wiki (http://nooslab.com/piniengine/wiki)
  • Every examples in Pini engine


Stretch Goals
We really hope we can meet many of the following stretch goals.
Please help us bring Pini engine to the next level.

  • $20,000 Reached
    Make an example <Dating simulation game> with tutorial!
    With Pini engine, you can make various genre games. However, it can be difficult to beginners.
    So we will make a complete project for beginners who want to make dating simulation games with the tutorial that tells you how to make it step by step.
  • $30,000 Reached
    Make a video tutorial in English. the video tutorial will include the following:
    ○  Script basic usage for beginners
    ○  How to make free to play game and monetize
    ○  Advanced usage for making complex games
  • $40,000 Reached
    Hold workshop at San Francisco!
    We will hold workshop to communicate with developer at San Francisco. We will accept who have invitation reward first then accept who want to come.
  • $60,000 Reached
    Add features for <Oculus> and <MMD>
    At this moment Pini engine doesn’t support 3D. But we will add 3D features if we reach $60k.
    Then You can make game like <Summer Lesson> (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vlnUYt8DyBk)

story:
It's all about Design 

Even easier to hold and take with you anywhere. 

A lightweight build with a fresh design adds a touch of elegance to the Morphus X300, while making it easy to hold and comfortablePlus, we design all the power and volume keys to be easier to operate. all the Keys under you finger. 

X300 Glasses Free 3D

The next phase for mobile devices is glasses-free 3D.And it's not just on the horizon;it's already here.Leveraging the same technology used in the large cinema 3D systerms ,Morphus brings brilliant and beautiful 3D images and its display. 

Professional Mapping Software

Sometimes, we need to run or play a game which doesn’t match our X300 controller function.So Using X300 Professional mapping software, will help you to easy to Re-Function and save profile for any game very fast by " Drag and Drop "

X300 Gaming Console

X300 is not only using as personal gaming tablet,it also using as gaming console,contact with your TV using 4k micro HDMI,and use the wireless gaming controller up to 10 meters distance,enjoy your game with your family or friends any time.

Who is talking about Aikun Morphus X300

Full Specifications

Production  timeline

Our Team

Company Profile

Since Aikun Corporation has founded in 2004, our commitment and passion have not changed .Today Aikun is a global leader of personal computer peripherals.  

Aikun maintains an exceptionally strong commitment to develop, for it's within the discipline of development that yesterday's fiction becomes tomorrow's reality.

We strive to identify things which, when made better, improve people's life style.

Aikun a standard factory in Bao’an, Shenzhen, with an area more than 12000 square meters. Meanwhile, from year 2006, we adopted lead –free production craft.

All the products can meet the CE standards and ROHS. Now we are one of the biggest and most professional Keyboard, Mice and Camera manufacture in China.

With perfect operating system from product design, mould produce, management, QC inspect to marketing and financial calculation.

Aikun is a global provider of Overseas Market, with products available in over 50 countries to many of customers. Committed to powerful R&D,

 effective production and strict quality management, since entering the international market in 2005, Aikun has become more and more invested in the international market.

and a host of other advantages, representing a new level of achievement in Aikun's development.

Aikun makes many different shapes and sizes of pointing devices and ships over 8 million units per year. With high capacity manufacturing in China, 

Aikun has the ability to “build to order”. With natural beauty environment factory, Aikun's worker has the spirit to develop and assemble.

Because the need of quality award winning product is universal, Aikun believes that the expansion into the global market is an essential link between product and people.

story:
About Me And The Project

    Hi, I'm Zsombor ! I'm a 30 year-old male, living in Hungary, Budapest.
    I have learned graphic design but making/designing video games is closer to my desires.
    I have many many game ideas but one of my favourite is Almag, so my dream is to make this RPG and release it on PC-MAC-Smart phones  and a Nintendo home console!

    It is a classic 2D JRPG style game based on photos.
    The environments, music and the story are influenced by European folk tales,Role Playing games of the 90', Anime and puppetshows-clay animations.


    With your help, I can make a game which revives a forgotten era of children's tale from the 60's-70's-80's with keeping the style in modern 2D RPG style, using never seen solutions such as making enemies from organic objects you can see every day on the ground .

                                  My Goals

 I will need to ask for 40 000 USD to be sure that I can finish this game. I need to rent a studio place where I can make this with the artists I hire and where I can work with my programmers. I have to re-make the figures you can see in the trailer and make a much better animation for them using Esoteric Software Spine. I need to pay for the sound effects and my brother who makes the brilliant music. Beside PC - Mac and Smart phones, I would like to release it on Wii U or to the next gen home console as well, so I need to buy the dev kit set and pay for the ports. If things are going well, I will consider other home consoles as well or maybe even a handle.


                               About Perks                                         


    The campaign have perks which let you own a personal password that makes the game longer and expands its features. It also lets you become part of the game by using the letters in your name or you can own actual items or enemies/characters used in the game!


    The funds will go entirely on the costs of the materials, studio renting and paying out people but the most important is, to fulfil all the promised things in perks.

                                Story Of The Idea

When I got this idea in 2008, the only unique thing was the graphics first. We had seen a couple of 2D RPG's already using hand drawn graphics and sprites and we’d seen 2D RPG's using 3D rendered graphics as well. So my idea was to make a real, photo based tile set for an RPG but in the end I left the tile set idea and I started building up the whole picture instead.  I thought and I’m still thinking today that today video game graphics are almost on a life-like level but still, if you look at a photo next to a CGI, your eyes will tell the difference somehow.  However, as time passed I had got more and more ideas and now I have many unique ideas for the story, characters, enemies and lands also. There is a part of the project which is as unique as the art style, and it’s the folk tale influence. I was lucky that I was born in a European country which has countless ancient folk tales and our neighbouring countries have also many folk tales. When I was a kid they still showed them on TV and told them in schools or as bed time stories. Every folk tale has something brilliant in it. Like a strange weapon, a character, or a clever solution. Personally, I think folk tales have almost bottomless ideas. The game: Legend of Zelda has many unique and famous elements and items but believe me, in folk tales there are ten times more items like those. So will my game use those things directly from those folk tales? Not quite. Everything in the game will be completely from my fantasy, but now I have a long list I collected from tales and I will definitely try to seed them into the game some way. So as for the music. My whole family is connected in some way to folk music and my brother is a professional musician. So as with the music, there also will be a strong folk influence beside of the usual medieval fantasy game influence. The other influence from this mixture is the Japanese RPG and Anime. My favourite era in video games was the snes-psx era, mostly because of their RPG titles. Secret of mana, Crono trigger, etc... are still my favourite RPG games and since I want to make a 2D RPG game, it is obvious that I will try to plant some feelings from those games into mine. As for the graphics again, using real life models and natural objects like stones, nuts and cones I think I can reach a really charming look which fits very well also with the folk tale line and with the traditional JRPG line as well. Building complete towns-forests-castles sounds very hard and it certainly is. However if I make something, I can use it again in a different perspective so it would be like a real life 3D tile set in the end, which makes it more and more easy as I go further in the making.

The game will have definitely a colourful look but my aim is to make it enjoyable not just for the younger audience but for the more matured ones as well since I'm planning to use many elements and symbols with deep meanings. It definitely won't be bloody or heavily dark but some things still could be "scary".

My aim with the story and the world is to reach an atmosphere which feels like an endless lost world with places where nobody ever set foot on before or they are abandoned long ago. I have many ideas for strange atmospheric places or never seen creatures.

                            Challenges Of The Project

    I need to be a man who can control many people and direct the game as a professional who isn't just the writer of the story and the dialogues but has to take a serious part in the making of the figures-animations as well while thinking about unique solutions and characters at the same time.

    I have many artist friends, sculptors as well. If I can reach my goal here, then I can hire them and then the weight on my shoulders will be shared. That way I can concentrate more on the directing and the design.

                            Other Ways You Can Help

     

    If you like my game please spread the word and share the campaign!
    Make sure to visit the facebook page as well!

story:
THE OPPORTUNITY

Till date, conventional motion capture rigs, using visual markers and an assortment of infrared cameras for Full Body Motion Capture was strictly limited to big studios with major funding, costing tens of thousands of dollars and making it prohibitively expensive or restrictive technology.

Now you can have a full body motion capture studio in your office space, basement, sound stage, or lounge. Once the motion capture data is recorded, it can be easily translated into full body animation rigging for VFX, Film, Video Games, Commercials and more.

Graphic Monk is a multidisciplinary production house located in Auckland, New Zealand incorporating UI/UX Design, Motion Graphics, Film Production & Editing, Martial Arts Swordsmanship Training as well as Stage Combat Training for Actors and Performers. We use creative and tech solutions to bring your ideas to life.

It is exciting times ahead for Graphic Monk as we venture into the realm of Full Body Motion Capture for Film, VFX, Games, Commercials VR / AR.

We need your help to bring the power of full body motion capture for full immersive story telling via the medium of VR Filming, Game Development, and more.

As a contributor you can help us achieve our goal of research and development of this technology, equipment purchases and setup. In return you get the opportunity to test drive the tech gear with us. 

When we think of motion capture these days, most of us think of high budget, high tech films like Avatar, Lord of the Ring, Hobbit, King Kong, Planet of the Apes. Behind the scenes footage from films of this kind are responsible for putting motion capture in the eyes of the non-animator public.

Often any project be it a new game title, a short film or feature film is restricted due to funding for the project. The realm of high quality Visual Effects, Animation, Post Production is a daunting feat to over come for most story tellers.

THE SOLUTION

 

 

An entire motion capture studio in one marker-less suit enables creators on all levels to turn any space into a professional motion capture stage anywhere, anytime and at short notice.

We want to help Indie Film Makers, Game Designers, VFX Artists, Animators to make high-quality content without the funding restrictions.

The actor / performer puts on the suit like regular clothes, we calibrate the software to visualize the sensors on the suit. At the hit of a button professional MoCap is now affordable as never before.

The technology behind the mocap system is wireless and with a range of up to 100 meters, thus eradicating the need of bulky wire systems. This enables anyone to capture human motion data anywhere.

The intuitive software allows for real time visualization of your motion capture to track real-time movement and to translate it into popular 3D animation software like MAYA, Blender, Unity 5, Unreal Engine 4, Motion Builder.

We are crowd funding to help us purchase the body suits including the marker-less technology sensors, computer and software solution to visualize real-time mocap data. The funds will help create a series of prerecorded mocap setups for use in film VFX, game, animation, etc.

In order for us to achieve this, we need to raise $23,000+. This will enable us to offer this innovative service to indie filmmakers, studios and game developers.

By backing our campaign you are helping us make motion capture more readily accessible and affordable for all. Plus you get motion capture services for your next project be it an Indie Film, Game, VFX MoCap Workflow for your Film Post Production, MoCap for your next Animation project. Check out the amazing perks we are offering.

*NOTE: If none of the above perks suit your particular requirements, feel free to contact & discuss it with us, including out of New Zealand requests. We are happy to create special perks for your needs.

We need up to three months to setup the MoCap service into a fully immersive story telling medium.

We also aim to offer premade MoCap sequence templates of numerous armed, unarmed, stunt and similar actions ready to be purchased by filmmakers, game developers to rig their 3D characters with the MoCap data ready to render.

*These perks do not include any data modification and re-targeting of the recorded data.

TEAM

Graphic Monk Ltd is lead by Jeasy Sehgal, with a background in 3D Animation and Character Development, Advertising, Graphic Design, Film Editing, VFX, UI/UX Design along with a passion for Martial arts, Swordsmanship, teaching and training Actors and Performers in the art of performance combat for Film, TV, Stage and MoCap. With this campaign, we want to add this innovative technology to our range of services.

You can help support us by sharing our campaign with your friends, colleagues, family members and social networking followers. Help us spread the word to bring this campaign to reality. 

We would like to thank Rokoko for their support and for supplying all visual material for our campaign.

Check out the amazing perks we are offering.*NOTE: If none of the above perks suit your particular requirements, feel free to contact & discuss it with us, including out of New Zealand requests. We are happy to create special perks for your needs.We need up to three months to setup the MoCap service into a fully immersive story telling medium.We also aim to offer premade MoCap sequence templates of numerous armed, unarmed, stunt and similar actions ready to be purchased by filmmakers, game developers to rig their 3D characters with the MoCap data ready to render.*These perks do not include any data modification and re-targeting of the recorded data.TEAMGraphic Monk Ltd is lead by Jeasy Sehgal, with a background in 3D Animation and Character Development, Advertising, Graphic Design, Film Editing, VFX, UI/UX Design along with a passion for Martial arts, Swordsmanship, teaching and training Actors and Performers in the art of performance combat for Film, TV, Stage and MoCap. With this campaign, we want to add this innovative technology to our range of services.You can help support us by sharing our campaign with your friends, colleagues, family members and social networking followers. Help us spread the word to bring this campaign to reality. We would like to thank Rokoko for their support and for supplying all visual material for our campaign.

story:
Short Summary

We has just  graduated from Computer Science. We want to create a educational funny game not only children but also adults because lessons and school boring things.  We want to solve this problem. We can learn by amusing.

 

Story

He lay unconsciously on the floor when he opened your eyes. He didn't see anyone other than himself when he regained consciousness and looked around. When he started wandering around to find out what was going on, he found a machine he had never seen. He went to its side and noticed that the device can move the planet at the universe.

The third level civilization in our universe broke the Universe peace contract without knowing the other 3rd-level civilizations, All the undeveloped civilizations began to be thrown into this universe in order to have all the energy sources. I think, they have forgotten the broken black hole directors on your planet. We have to connect with other planets and communicate with 3rd level civilizations in other universes and describe what is happening in our universe.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

STRETCH GOALS -

 

$35000 - minimum content.

 

(We need 18 months approximately.)

The Impact

Awards

Turkey IT Foundation - Code Awards 2017 - Second Prize. 

http://www.kododulleri.com/sonuclar/

 

Risks & Challenges

We are not worry a lot to technical issues.( We have just  graduated from Computer Science.)

We are planning to write a book for the game(Game will include this story.). That can be fail, because we don’t have any experience for this.

story:
Demo Gratuita

http://digilabsoftware.it/DeLucaRun2Demo

Demo per i supporters

Supportaci per avere accesso alla demo completa

 

Il nostro progetto

Dopo il successo di De Luca Run, il nostro governatore ritorna in una veste rinnovata pronto ad affrontare la fase 2 al meglio, in De Luca Run 2  ci saranno nuovi nemici, nuove meccaniche di gioco, grafica completamente rinnovata diverse ambientazioni e livelli di gioco, con le solite esilaranti frasi del governatore di contorno.

 

Come mai avete bisogno di soldi?

Per realizzare tutte le idee che abbiamo in mente purtroppo è necessario tanto lavoro e il coinvolgimento di collaboratori questo comporta dei costi per lo sviluppo, un vostro piccolo contribuito ci permetterà di coprire tali costi e fornirvi la migliore esperienza di gioco.

 

Quanto costerà il gioco?

Il gioco sarà completamente gratuito come il primo capitolo, donando avrete la possibilità di accedere a tutte le versioni di test del gioco e permetterete la realizzazione del progetto!.

 

Su che piattaforme sarà distribuito?

il gioco sarà disponibile su Android/IOS e Desktop.

 

Cosa puoi ottenere supportandoci?

Supportandoci puoi ottenere accesso anticipato al gioco e dei fantastici gadget!

 

I membri del team

 

 

Seguici sui social per rimanere aggiornato

story:
Game Features

  • Unique cars
  • Multiple game modes
    • Brawl Racing
    • Trick-Or-Treat
    • Candy-Bowl
  • Unique weapons
  • A humorous Halloween theme
  • Multiplayer

Game Details

Game modes
Brawl Racing
Compete for first place in this race against all the creepy competition. Use power-ups to get that boost of speed you need to overtake your competition, or take with a surprise weapon or an aggressive bump.

Trick-Or-Treat
A new spin on the Halloween tradition as you race around the map collecting candy to devilry to the unsuspecting houses as you crash their party, bursting through the front door with a monster racer interpretation of trick-or-treating

Candy-Bowl
Compete alone or in a group as you fight to prove who has the bigger wheels. Add dents to the other creepy

 

Unique cars

Boo Hoo

Nuts-N-Bolts

Witches Hat

DracMobile

Skullcore

Werewolf car

Unique Weapons

Black Feather x1 – temporary boost the vehicle on use

Black Feather x3 – temporary boost the vehicle for up to 3 uses

Candle – move faster temporarily, cannot be hurt by other cars or weapons, bumping into other cars will cause them to catch fire

Bull Horns – move faster temporarily (for extended period of time), cannot be hurt by other cars or weapons, bumping into other cars will cause them spin out

Fireball x1 – shoot fireball on use, on contact with enemy causes them to slow down and catch fire

Fireball x3 – shoot fireball on use, on contact with enemy causes them to slow down and catch fire. Can be 3 times

Soul – black homing fireball. Homes in on the nearest enemy in front and explodes on contact. Causing them to spin out.

Evil Soul – a homing fireball that aims that chases down and incapacitates the person who is currently in first place

Spider web – Create sticky web behind you on use, causes the car that runs it over to get stuck and slow down

Ectoplasm – puts slime on the screen of car it makes contact with. Temporarily impairing your vision

Special – A unique ability based on the type of monster car being used.

 

The Team

London Sports Game Studio was started by Paolo late last year. It’s a new company that focuses most of the efforts on sports style games. Earlier this year 3 on 3 Super Robot Hockey was released on steam, it can be found here. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/988080/3_on_3_Super_Robot_Hockey/

Paolo

Paolo has an extensive background in Game Development and the founder of London Sports Game Studios, with over 10 years experience making games for multiple platforms and an avid gamer himself. Paolo has spent the last 3 years teaching courses related to Game Development at triOS College, and on the side slowly building up London Sports Game Studios.

Jonathan


Jonathan has over 5 years experience in business management and is intending on combining that with his Game Development education to collaborate with like minded people who have a passion for all things video game related.

Jake


He has spent the last 6 years in school around computer science and Game Development. Like the rest of the team he has a passion for games and a creative side. Jake has a passion for competing in Game Jams and can always be counted on when a deadline approach.


The three of us have known each other for almost 2 years. This is the first time we are collaborating on a project together. With the combined skills and education of our unique team, we have begun working towards our careers of creating fun and interested games that we can share with everyone.
 

Time Line

August 30th 2019  – Alpha Demo
September 15th 2019 – First Version Release on Steam

Game updates will include more vehicles and maps.

 

Financials

We wanted to use the money to help get a better space to work, allowing us to work closer, collaborate better and take the first step in growing our business by officially getting an office space, rather than working out of our homes.

story:
Short Summary:

Quadra Combat is a puzzle/fighting game that combines the color-matching, tile-clearing action of games like Bejeweled or Columns with the character meta and competitive nature of games like Mortal Kombat or Smash Bros. It's easy to learn, hard to master, and rewards both wit and reflexes.

We plan on implementing the following features should we reach initial funding:

  • Local multiplayer
  • 10 or more characters with unique stats and abilities to play as and master
  • An authentic chiptune soundtrack, composed by SpectralAves
  • Plenty of tough but fair gameplay, loaded with replay value

Our aim is to create an arcade-inspired game that focuses on immediacy and replay value. To accomplish this, we've decided to use the Godot Engine, as it is free, lightweight, open-source, and its dedicated 2D mode allows for a pixel-perfect execution of our desired retro aesthetic.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Currently, Quadra Combat is sitting at about 50% completion. We've already gotten all of the base game's mechanics down, as well as a lot of the more basic, UI-related stuff. Our AI is functional, but certainly needs more time in development before it becomes competent enough to play our game well. Currently, it's more-or-less playable, but we need additional money and time for more features, art, and polish before our game hits the market.

What we're asking for is about $5,000 USD and about six to seven months time to get our game ready for the limelight. Seeing as how our game is about half-finished, this ought to give us enough time to add all the features we want and really polish this game to a shine.

We also have some stretch goals in mind, these goals include the following:

$5,000 USD - Our game is released on PC and Linux, with all the aforementioned features, sometime in the middle of this year.

$7,000 USD - We add the option for Network Multiplayer.

 

The Impact

While the concept of a puzzle/fighter isn't exactly new (see Dossun! Ganseki Battle, Columns III, Doctor Mario, etc...), it's certainly not something you see done much any more. Many games that fall within this genre aren't playable on modern hardware without emulation, which is a shame because we feel that the puzzle/fighter genre is one who's time never came, and one with a mountain of untapped potential. We're hoping to resurrect the concept of the puzzle/fighter and do it proper justice! 

The concept of Quadra Combat came about when Dead Stuff's producer/designer discovered an English ROM-hack of the previously Japan-only game Dossun: Ganseki Battle.

Dossun is a troublesome game to get attached to. On one hand, it has tight combat and a challenging AI with plenty of replay value. On the other hand, it only has 9 characters (three of which are made redundant due to the way they're balanced), the soundtrack is either grating or uninspired, and the themes and characters are your generic fantasy fare. We plan to take what we like about Dossun (mainly its mechanics), preserve that, and change the rest into something more unique and interesting.

-Lackluster soundtrack? We've got chiptune composer SpectralAves to solve that problem.
-Unbalanced character roster? We've got a 16+ move roster, speed stats, as well as an upcoming Discord server full of project backers and beta testers to help balance characters before launch.
-Generic fantasy theming? We're leaning into a more sci-fi direction, with far wackier and unique characters from across the galaxy.

We plan to to take Dossun and games like it and learn from them, improve upon them, and carve out our own identity using our own ideas in the process. We hope you'll be along for this ride.
 

Risks & Challenges

So far, our producer/lead designer has been funding development alone using the disposable income generated by his day job in the IT industry. As the project has grown, and as we've hired more freelance artists and programmers, that method has proved to not be sustainable at this stage in development. In fact, everyone currently involved with production has their own day job as well as other projects that require their attention.

We're going to need this money to speed up development and retain the talented people that we've hired. Otherwise, production will slow to a crawl and all this hard work might end up being for nothing in the end.

We can't sit idly by and let that happen, and THAT is where you come in.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know anyone that you feel might be interested in this project, please feel free to share this campaign with them in anyway that you can. We can only make this happen if we all pitch in together.

Here are some links that might prove handy in this regard:

Dead Stuff Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1MRQvc7L0wB20...
Dead Stuff Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeadStuffDevs

Thank you for your time!

story:
Ever Evolving:

Welcome to Ever Evolving the next VR game. Inspired by The Binding Isaac. Taking the bullet hell world to the VR. Be able to Upgrade your weapon, Combine every weapon to create the ultimate weapon, level/room randomize, and more!!!

Pledge now to get access to weapons, asset droid, and mods!!! These will only be given to people that pledges. Codes will be emailed out to you to give access.

The game can be downloaded and played on our discord. Copy and paste link!!

https://discord.gg/As7sE5K

Instagram:

https://www.instagram.com/ever_evolving_vr/

Platform Support:

  • Oculus Quest
  • Steam VR
  • Phones
  • NonVR Mouse Controls

Stretch Goal:

  • Playstation VR

Story:

Your the newest top of the line Battle Adapting Droid or B.A.D. for short. You are being tested to see you capability and how good you adapt during battle. You have been given an AI to assist you name Sara. You put against waves and waves of enemies and bosses. The AI will be corrupted and try to kill you during the testing. It must be put to a stop and you will need to find the computer and end its life.

Game features:

  • Level/Room Randomize
  • Many upgrades, abilities, and droid
  • Bullet hell Keeps you on your feet
  • Weapon upgrade paths
  • Map
  • Strong enemies
  • Different bosses
  • Stats

Damage: Amount of damage done by bullets

Movement: How fast the player moves but only not by much I know it is oculus

Fire rate: How fast the gun shoots

Bullet speed: Travel speed for bullets change

Luck: Effect mods chance becomes more often        

 

Movement:

  • Teleport
  • Smooth Walk

 

The State of The Game:

The demo has been completed and we are ready to start the full game. We currently need the funds to create and make the game shine. We believe this can be an amazing game with many different possibility.
